New
View Object
Controller
Wireless Controller
Preset
A predefined settings preset for different levels of hardware performance.
Antialiasing
Smooths out jagged edges, reduces shimmering, and improves overall visual quality.
Resolution Percent
Reduces the internal resolution used to render the game, improving performance at the expense on visual quality.
Upscaling
Method used to convert rendering to display resolution.
Shadows
Affects the quality and visibility of in-game sun shadows.
Textures
Affects the resolution of in-game textures.
Anisotropy
Affects the clarity of textures viewed at oblique angles.
Terrain
Affects the quality of in-game terrain textures and geometry.
Effects
Affects the quality of in-game visual effects.
Lights
Affects the quality and visibility of in-game lights and shadows.
Postprocessing
Adds additional effects to improve the overall visual quality.
Bloom
Simulates scattering light, creating a glow around bright objects.
Eye Adaptation
Affects the exposure of the image based on the brightess of the scene.
Creates a darker border around the edges for a more cinematic feel.
Chromatic Aberration
Simulates chromatic abberation due to camera lens imperfections around the image's edges for a more cinematic feel.
SSAO
Simulates the darkening ambient light by nearby objects to improve the depth and composition of the scene.
Reflections
Adjust the quality of in-game screen-space reflections.
View Distance
Affects how far the game will render objects and effects in the distance.
Object Detail
Affects the number of less important objects and the overall level of detail.
Framerate Counter
Displays a framerate counter in the upper-right corner of the screen.
Sharpness
Affects the sharpness of the image
Master Volume
Sets the overall audio volume.
Music
Sets the volume for the music.
Voice
Sets the volume for all voiced content.
Sounds
Sets the volume for the sound effects like gunshots and explosions.
Ambience
Sets the volume for the non-ambient sounds like the sounds of waves and rain
UI
Sets the volume for the user interface sounds.
Mute when Minimized
All sounds will be muted when the game is minimized.
Radio Station
Language
Sets the game language.
Camera Shake
Allow camera shake effects.
Fullscreen Mode
The game may run in a window or on the entire screen.
Resolution
The number of pixels rendered on the screen; higher resolutions provide sharper and more detailed images.
Vsync
Synchronizes the game's frame rate with the screen's refresh rate thus eliminating screen tearing. Enabling it may reduce performance.
Graphics API
The DirectX version used by the game renderer.
Graphics Adapter
The GPU that would be used for rendering. Please use the dedicated GPU if possible.
Frame Rate Limit
Limits the maximum number of frames that the GPU will render per second.
Display Area Margin
UI Scale
Affects the size of the user interface elements, such as menus and text.
Brightness
Affects the overall brightness level.
Changing the Graphics API or Graphics Adapter options will only take effect after the game is restarted.
None

Don't be shy, I don't bite... unless you want me to.
Not from around here are you? Come, let me give you a warm welcome.
Come closer, cutie! Let me tell you a story with a happy ending.
No kissing. Everything else is negotiable.
New in town? Let me show you the sights. The sights are what I call my boobs.
You like girls, boys or something in between?
You like girls, boys or something in between?
I give scalp rubs, foot rubs... and everything in between.
Pleasure is pleasure! Come have some!
Don't go to Diamond Red. I know for sure that the foreman of that mine is a vampire who bathes in the blood of his slaves!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_01 Text  universal - not met Graaf >> give DiamondRed

Text: Vampire?! Oh, my. Let me see... we'll need garlic, holy water, and wooden stakes.
We gotta fight a goth kid to get that mine? I'm alright with that.
Oh no! You have a demon with you, the one who hunts people and nails horns on their heads! Made a deal with the devil, have you?!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_02 Text  universal - have Flay

Text: Yes, I made them sign a contract in blood. If you are not busy, we need a little more ink.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_02 Text  universal - have Flay

Text: Hehehe... I love this guy! He is very fun guy to have around! I like him.
Do not tease the poor woman. You are a servant of Shaitan who now serves us... until I change my mind.
Do you know Captain Pierrot? If you see him, please tell him that Megan is missing him and wants her skirt back!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_03 Text  universal - launched M.E.R.C. boat

Text: Oh, honey, trust me - you're never seeing that skirt again.
I do not mean to judge, but I do not think it was right for the Captain to take skirt. He does not have good legs for skirt.
If you ever see Captain Pierrot, please tell him that Avril wishes he would rot in hell! Or at least that one part of him would rot.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_04 Text  universal - launched M.E.R.C. boat

Text: Have you met Captain Pierrot? Do you know where he is? I need to warn mon petit perroquet that my husband wants to kill him!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_05 Text  universal - launched M.E.R.C. boat

Text: Tell your husband that I already chopped off your perroquet's pecker. That ought to calm him down.
You are with the Maquis, right? Do you think they would take me, make me a freedom fighter? I don't want to spend my life doing laundry.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_06 Text  universal - Maquis are allies

Text: There is little in life that is more enjoyable than properly cleaning, drying, and folding laundry.
If you are a fighter, you will fight. If you are a launderer, you will launder. It is pointless to ask permission.
You brought together the Savannah Lion and Maman Liliane! How romantic... My own husband does not roar like a lion, he just belches like a pig.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_07 Text  universal - Young Hearts

Text: Stay away from me, you murderers!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_08 Text  universal - world flip or killed civilians

Text: You... You murderers!... Why did you kill my friends? What did they ever do to you?!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_09 Text  universal - killed civilians >> Guilty

Text: They got in our way.
I gotta explain every goddamn thing I do?!
Do not ask why death comes. It will come when it wishes, and no earthly logic will keep it away.
The TV said that our President was saved! I believe he will put everything back in order, and murderers like you will be punished!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_10 Text  universal - President saved

Text: The TV said that horrible monster, The Major, got what he deserved! Finally!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_11 Text  universal - Major defeated >> Proud (once)

Text: I like to think he deserved even more than that.
He no longer tortures this country. That is all that matters.
I will never see my husband again... He took a loan from Jackhammer. We missed one payment and they dragged him to the Good Place! This is wrong!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_12 Text  universal - >> give quest Prison (Luigi)

Text: I heard a silly rumor about les Cadavrs in the jungle. Haha, les Cadavrs do not exist, right? ...They do not exist, right?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_13 Text  Clueless Padme meme reference universal - Sanatorium given

Text: Best to stick a knife into any corpse you find, just to be sure.
Who did you talk to? Were they sweating? Fevered? Would you be willing to give a blood sample?
I never liked Alphonse LaFontaine. He just wants to take money from my pocket and look good doing it. Not MY president.
You mean to kill the Major, right? I know from a very reliable source that he is hiding in Camp du Crocodile deep in the swamps! Don't tell anyone I told you that.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_16 Text  universal >> give lead to Elliot

Text: Ahahaha... that is THE Major, alright! He is a MAJOR Major!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_16 Text  sarcastic; Catch 22 reference universal >> give lead to Elliot

Text: You are here to save those ridiculous M.E.R.C. commandos, right? Don't deny it, everyone knows it.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_17 Text  universal >> give quest RescueBiff

Text: I have heard your friends stole a green diamond the size of an ostrich egg! You foreigners have no right to it. It belongs to Grand Chien!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_18 Text  universal - green diamond

Text: There is a Hermit in the jungle who teaches how to live a more fulfilling and happy life! I stopped visiting him when I learned the old bastard is life-coaching the Legion as well.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_19 Text  universal - give quest Hermit

Text: My father wants me to marry one of those creepy Van Tassels at the Twin Manors, but I would rather run away than settle in that cursed place! I have no wish to be murdered by vengeful spirits, thank you very much!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_20 Text  universal - give quest Twin Manors

Text: Those Legion bandits may be dangerous, but at least they are flesh and blood. Out there in the Cursed Forest lurks a Beast that eats your soul and turns your bones into an effigy of pure evil!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_21 Text  universal - give quest Beast

Text: I heard you killed those men who were abusing the girls from the Lys Rouge. It's nice to know someone is looking out for those ladies - their work is dangerous enough as it is!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_22 Text  universal - Abusers quest done

Text: You think you're rich, but you are nothing compared to old farmer Baggz! He owns all those Middle of Wherever farms, among other things. I'm sure he buried his money on one of them.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_23 Text  universal - give quest Middle of X-Where

Text: I've heard they have a lot of "Diesel" in Landsbach, but it is not the normal kind.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_24 Text  universal - give quest Landsbach

Text: I hope the army intervenes and stops those Big Pharma experiments in our country! We don't want a zombie outbreak in our town like in the Grimer Hamlet.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_25 Text  universal - give quest Grimer Hamlet

Text: I heard you've been fighting les cadavrs... Get away from me! If you bite me, I will scream!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_26 Text  universal - fought "cadaveres" at the Grimer Hamlet or Sanatorium

Text: I only bite women who ask me to.
Well, how else are we supposed to eat your braiiiiiiiins? Hehehe... Sorry, I guess that's not funny.
Whatever you do, stay away from those murderous teddy bears. They come alive at night and kill people!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerFemale_27 Text  universal - give quest Ted

Text: I knew it! They're out of control!... Ted, we have to find them and talk some sense into them.
Oh, I've been where you are right now. It's just a bad trip. Drink some water and think happy thoughts.
I hear you are actually paying miners? I mean, with money, not food. Can I work for you?
My wife told me that you hire workers and pay well. I'll come and sign up tomorrow! Tonight, I will celebrate my new job with my friends.
I heard you already mined a trillion dollars worth of OUR diamonds! The whole Western world grows fat on our riches. How dare you!
I heard our Militia kicked the Legion's ass! I bet our fighters could beat anyone.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_05 Text  universal - have Militia and they have beaten the Legion

Text: Is it true the slave master of Diamond Red was a vampire who bathed in his workers' blood? Did you destroy him with wooden stakes and garlic?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_06 Text  universal - killed Graaf

Text: We used something even better! Our weapons are imbued with magical powers because our cause is noble.
He was a servant of Shaitan, but no vampire. The only thing he bathed in was misery.
My people know vampires - he was not one. We killed him in the usual way. His body is being very dead as of this moment.
The slave master in Diamond Red is a vampire who bathes in the blood of his workers! Why did you let him live?! Stay away from me!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_07 Text  universal - let Graaf live

Text: Don't go to the Poacher Camp, it's cursed! A demon from hell is hunting the poachers for their sins. They say that when it kills and eats their souls, it nails horns on their heads!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_08 Text  universal - not met Flay >> give quest Hunter, Hunted

Text: You made a deal with the devil. Now a demon stalks the land, nailing horns to the heads of those Legion bastards! Good... Good!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_09 Text  universal - Flay is hunting the Legion

Text: Last month, a brave pirate attacked an American battleship and almost sunk it! The filthy Americans showed no restraint and destroyed it with a nuke. That pirate was a real hero, fighting the good fight against the filthy imperialists!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_10 Text  universal - found M.E.R.C. boat

Text: He's certainly memorable, I'll give him that.
Yes, it's a wonder his "irresistible charm" didn't win him the fight.
Is it true what they say about the Christmas Elf in Camp Savane? The one making toys for the Legion?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_11 Text  universal - have Larry

Text: An elf making toys... Oh, you mean me! Hahaha, yeah they liked to put jingle bells on me to make sure I didn't wander off. Hmmm, that was kind of fun, actually.
There is an elf in Camp Savane? I WANT TO GO BACK!!!
Larry... no.
Larry, just... no.
Are you the ghost busters that lifted the curse on the Mansion? Your proton packs look a lot like ordinary guns.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_12 Text  universal - played Ghost Stories

Text: These are our steel guns, but we also have silver guns for monsters!
We ain't afraid of no ghosts.
You're with those Maquis commies! Don't you steal my chickens.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_13 Text  universal - Maquis are allies

Text: It's about time someone kicked the assess of those Maquis commies. During the civil war they "nationalized" and then ate my cow.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_14 Text  universal - Maquis are enemies

Text: Is it true that old Chimurenga retired and made you leaders of the Maquis? What do you call that, hereditary communism?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_15 Text  universal - succeeded Chimurenga

Text: . It is how communism works.
I call that "none of your fucking business".
Do you have some of those Maquis Manifesto pamphlets? The ones with the, uh, illustrations? I want to learn more about, err, Communist ideals.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_16 Text  universal - have Maquis Pamphlets with Ad

Text: I wish I could go and see the Carnival celebrations in Pantagruel. Is it true there are naked girls dressed only in flowers? I'm asking for a friend.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_17 Text  universal - know about the Carnival

Text: I heard you're working for the Rimville mafia. I already made my protection payment, so don't bother shaking me down.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_18 Text  universal - partners with Boss Blaubert

Text: Innocent people are dying because of you! Go fight your stupid war where civilians won't get hurt!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_19 Text  universal - killed civilians >> Guilty

Text: You're the ones who massacred all those people in the Refugee Camp! Please, don't kill us.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_20 Text  universal - world flip, Major not defeated

Text: You have taken our mines, and now you are murdering innocent people! Can't you bandits just fight each other and leave us in peace?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_21 Text  universal - world flip or killed civilians

Text: The TV said you killed all those people in the Refugee Camp, but I don't believe it. You don't look scary at all.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_22 Text  universal - world flip, President not encountered yet

Text: Is it true that the real Alphonse LaFontaine is dead and you just used a stunt double to replace him as President?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_23 Text  universal - President saved

Text: Good thing you saved the President. We need him to put a stop to some real problems. I'm talking about chemtrails! They appear three times more often since he went missing!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_24 Text  universal - President saved

Text: Good thing that old Alphonse died. We need a strong President, not one who lets himself be kidnapped and killed!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_25 Text  universal - President dead

Text: Amen to that.
The TV said that the President was shot and killed, but then they said the Major is still alive... I am confused. I thought they were the same person?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_26 Text  universal - President dead

Text: The Major did nothing wrong.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_27 Text  universal - Major dead

Text: The TV said the Major was captured and sent to jail. They must think we are stupid to believe that!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_28 Text  universal - Major in jail

Text: They say that the Major was killed by Grand Chien special forces, but I'm sure it was his own people who turned on him! I have my sources.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_29 Text  universal - Major defeated >> Proud (once)

Text: Not far from the truth, when you think about it.
Some badass commandos infiltrated the Major's fortress and kicked his ass! You should be careful not to get in their way.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_30 Text  universal - Major defeated >> Proud (once)

Text: Best advice I've ever heard.
We are in a civil war again, aren't we? I heard that a whole Battalion of Grand Chien special forces was slaughtered to the last man here in the Adjani!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_31 Text  universal - Faucheux defeated

Text: Don't go to Ernie! I know from a reliable source that the Americans sent an aircraft carrier full of Seals and Delta Forces, and wrecked the place! It is a cover up for something huge, I'm telling you.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_32 Text  universal - Corazon defeated >> Proud (once)

Text: The end is nigh! They have unleashed a zombie virus at the Sanatorium and it's only a matter of time before the outbreak starts!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_33 Text  universal - >> give quest Sanatorium

Text: I know, man! THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!!
Man, if I was loaded right now, I'm sure I'd be jumping up and down and saying something stupid.
You are searching for the Major, right? Listen carefully. His secret base is in the mires. It's called Camp du Crocodile. Just between you and me, okay?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_35 Text  universal - Eastern settlement >> give lead to Elliot

Text: I know everything about your secret mission. You have to kill the M.E.R.C. people, right? Because they know too much! I know you have to deny it, it's fine.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_36 Text  universal - >> give RescueBiff

Text: If you ask me, the President is already dead.
The only thing fighting ever solved was a boxing match... or a hockey game, I suppose.
This country needs strong leadership. I don't like guys who get kidnapped, I like the guys who DO the kidnapping!
Sorry about these Legion thugs, but when your country is named "Big Dog" you expect to find some big fleas, n'est-ce pas?
We both know that you are not here to save the President. You are after the green diamond, right?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_45 Text  universal - green diamond

Text: You know nothing, John Doe.
I don't know, man... I don't know why I'm here.
I was hoping that one day I would earn enough money to visit Le Lys Rouge, but you know what some guy did? He just went there and kidnapped the prettiest girl in the brothel! Just like that!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_46 Text  with approval universal >> Lead_Rumor (Smiley)

Text: There is a great Shaman at the Refugee Camp who can heal anything! He can even make a man's peepee grow bigger.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_47 Text  >> give Faith Healing

Text: Hmmm, I never knew I was qualified to be a shaman.
The Legion may be robbing us, but at least they don't kill us. But you foreigners - you have no regard for human life!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_48 Text  universal - killed civilians >> Guilty

Text: You mercenaires, you are the worst! Why have you killed all those innocent people? Doesn't human life mean anything to you? Am I just another target to practice your shooting skills on?
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_49 Text  universal - killed civilians >> Guilty

Text: Ehehehee... Yes.
If you dumbasses can't keep your heads down, it ain't my fault!
Well... Yes.
I have a name! I am a person!
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_49 Text  universal - killed civilians >> Guilty

Text: Good! Good! Killing a person is much better.
This rain is not natural, mark my words. Those voodoo wackos at the Chalet de la Paix are performing satanic rituals in the dark of night and messing with the weather.
Context: BanterDef NPC_VillagerMale_50 Text  universal >> give "voodoo" false lead (Chalet de la Paix)

Text: The boat is full of explosives. If someone were to push it upstream, it would do a lot of damage to the Legion blockade at Camp La Barrire.
If life gives ye a boat of explosives, just give it a push!
Fidel is feeling like it is good time for a boat ride!
You can call this little boat "The Minnow" because it's about to be lost.
The barrels are labelled "BOOZ FOR CAMP LA BAREER. NO DRINK OR WE KILL U!!!". However, it doesn't say anything about not adding laxatives.
Please don't drink the moonshine. Those assholes from Camp La Barrire will kill me if I don't deliver it.
Me? Never!
Don't drink. Got it... Don't drink, don't drink, don't drink...
You hear that, Ted? If we can drink all the moonshine, they'll NEVER believe he drank it!
Thanks to the addition of copious amounts of laxatives, drinking the moonshine will cause many Legion soldiers at Camp La Barrire to be "indisposed".
This is shame. Forgive me, drink! I do it for medal.
Shame we won't be able to watch what happens after they drink it, he-he.
Hey, we just made a new drink! "The Grand Chien Mudslide"!
Ugh... My stomach's gurgling just thinking about what's about to happen.
Thank you, boss. I'll go and tell them to pack their stuff. We will start a new life, I promise!
Don't shoot, don't shoot, boss! I don't want to fight for those fucking slavers. Just don't shoot me, okay?
Look, I know you mean business, but a few of the guys are not that bad. We are just looking for a way out of this merde!
If you are brave enough, you can always choose to walk a new path.
It's easy to convince them to slip away from Camp Bien Chien, but we'll need cash to hide our tracks. Le Major's officers are really nasty to anyone deserting the Legion.
As they should be.
You mean to tell me there are people they AREN'T nasty to?
You are not going to take us to the mines, right? You set us free... for free?!
That's right. Now get your punk asses out of here before I change my mind.
Hey, freedom isn't free. Okay? You're gonna have to earn it every day for the rest of your lives.
May the spirits bless you for your kindness!
Yes! I feel the Old Ones approve.
At night, we shall dance. May we all share the dream of the Old Ones.
Borassus root planted.
The truck is hopelessly stuck in the mud and loaded with... dead bodies?
Totally not a trap.
Oh no, I know where this is going. Zombies, man!
There is movement under the cover!
Aaaargh! They want my brains!... Wait, where are they going?!
Uh... I really hope these are extras from horror movie!
Come on man. Deal the damn cards. We have to head off to the camp soon.
Context: BanterDef CrossroadsCamp_GuardpostObjective_CardGames Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: Ah, putain. Enough with your whining. Just play the damned game.
Context: BanterDef CrossroadsCamp_GuardpostObjective_CardGames Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: There are playing cards scattered on the table. Someone was here recently.
Hey! I love Texas Hold'em... But these guys obviously don't know a thing about poker.
Pfff. Cards are a waste of time! Now, Rugby - there's a game that separates the wee bairns from the men!
What were they playing? Poker? Well, that's disappointing. Why is it that no one ever plays Bridge anymore?
Have you heard about Molotov?
I can't stand that guy. Please, tell me he's dead.
No, dumbass. I heard he and his gang stumbled on something big.
How big? Like your momma's ass?
Shut up, moron. I'm serious. They say Siegfried has been doing something with the Diesel he buys from us.
Doing what? A week-long bender? I'm not surprised, based on the quantity he's buying.
You're impossible. I mean they are using it for something else... Hey... Quiet. I think I heard something.
Context: BanterDef CrossroadsCamp_GuardpostObjective_CardGames_Overheard Text  whispering in the end

Text: If someone built an effigy this close to Camp Chien Sauvage, it may lure some Legion soldiers out to investigate.
That's it, enough with this merde. That fucking Beast has crossed the line.
This is too far for the Beast to roam. Someone is just playing a sick joke... right?
M-maybe it's gone already, eh? Do you think it's still around here, lurking in the shadows and... waiting for us?
That's the whole point, man! Get your merde together!
It's just that these effigies give me the goosebumps...
I ain't afraid of no Beast!
Goddammit, assholes, who set the fucking place on fire again? Joseph, how many times have I told you to be careful where you smoke your shit?!
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioSavannaFire Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: I don't need your excuses, just take some of your fuckers and go check it out.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioSavannaFire Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: If a body meets a body coming through the grass... if a body killed a body, someone kicked his ass.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioSavannaFire Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: Okay, boss, we're at the well...
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioWaterWell Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: ...No, boss, we won't be smoking anything...
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioWaterWell Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: Yes, boss, we'll just pump water and come right back.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioWaterWell Text  sat. map radio  radio

Text: ...Fucker.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_RadioWaterWell Text  (lower voice) sat. map radio  radio

Text: There are muddy footsteps in the grass. Someone was carrying water last evening towards Camp Savane. Maybe someone could ambush them here next time?
Careful, you fucker, you got my smokes wet!
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_WaterWell_Legion Text  G6 Water Well banters

Text: A bath will do you good, I can smell you from here. Now stop smoking and give me a hand.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_WaterWell_Legion Text  G6 Water Well banters

Text: I can't, I am allergic to water.
Context: BanterDef SavannaCamp_GuardpostObjective_WaterWell_Legion Text  G6 Water Well banters

Text: Inside the lining of the chair, there is the unmistakable sparkle of brilliants.
Yes, mon! There be the necklace!
Hey, let me try it! Does it look good on me?
Fidel thought it was bigger. Stupid necklace.
There is no necklace inside of the chair.
There is no sign of the necklace we are looking for.
Where is that damned necklace?! Stupid chair!
This is a luxury chair - not as clumsy or random as a plastic chair. An elegant piece of furniture for a more civilized age.
Well hello, mates! Captain Jacques Pierrot at your service! I suppose you might have heard of me.
I'm afraid not, Mr. Pierrot.
Nope.
You're who?
Anyone can mistake a destroyer for a mega-yacht. They both got helicopter pads. Same silhouette, savvy?
I'm no seaman, but I am fairly certain that is not even remotely correct.
Perhaps attacking a destroyer with a boat armed only with a machine gun and my irresistible charm wasn't the brightest contribution to military tactics.
You are correct. It was stupid.
"Irresistible" wasn't the word I was thinking of.
My only pastime here has been to make snowmen out of sand. And those Legion ruffians kept coming and kicking them! That's why I put a ticking surprise in that one.
Ready to set sail! I can give you a ride anytime, but I'll need a little bit of something to keep her running, savvy? A boat of this class requires fuel, maintenance, and a bottle or twelve of rum.
Booze cruise!
I will take care of her until her rightful owners return, I give you the word of a dishonest man.
I promise not to attack any warships, at least not with you on board... Unless, of course, we have a clear chance to win, or I'm drunk, or it's Wednesday.
Da. I think along very much same lines.
Where would you place a machine gun on "M.E.R.C.'s Pride"? It's just a hypothetical question.
On the bow. You want to rake them as you come in fast.
On a tripod. In a nest on top of the cabin. Full 360 traverse.
On the stern. You want to make sure nobody gets any ideas about following you.
In a locked chest under a blanket in the cargo hold.
Do you happen to have a piece of black textile and some white paint?
The "M.E.R.C.'s Pride" seems to have been wrecked on shore. There is no sign of any mercs.
"M.E.R.C.'s Pride"? I didn't know such thing existed. I mean I didn't know they owned a boat.
Man, that suuuure looks familiar. I mean... you guys see the boat, too, right?
"M.E.R.C.'s Pride"... So, M.E.R.C. was here, huh?
I lost my own boat a while back to, er, natural forces. Nothing more natural for a boat to do but sink after she's been raked stem to stern by a destroyer's autocannon.
Si, natural causes.
Since then, been skipperin' this beauty you see here. That is, I mean to, once I get her back in the water.
Ownership is such a fluid concept, isn't it? Hehe. Get it? Guys?

Right, see, she's not precisely mine. However, since the previous owners so callously abandoned her here, I have taken it upon myself to become her sort of foster-captain, savvy? If you help me fix her, you can be my first quite-reasonably-priced charter.
Operation is available: Launch Boat

I bet that was a feat of engineering equal to the feat of stupidity that originally beached this boat! How about we take her for a ride? I promise not to attack any warships that come our way. Honestly.
Context: BanterDef Beach_MercBoat02_success Text  radio banter when activity is completed

Text: A snowman made out of sand.
Please don't judge me, I was bored. And, uh, I don't advise you to fiddle with Mr. Sandman. He's got an explosive personality.
Yer gonna blow up some poor wee bairn doin' stuff like that!
Art. High art, man.
I am never one to judge, but I think when you look at it objectively, that is perhaps the dumbest and most dangerous thing you could have possibly done.
Ah, now my sandman is disarmed and defenseless. Please don't kick him.
Why would you do that? What'd that sandman ever do to you, eh?
Mayday, mayday! Over here! We're over here! Oh my god, we're saved! We're finally saved!
Context: BanterDef Biff_InitlaApproach Text  Biff is happy that someone is coming to rescue him and his soldiers

Text: Apscott, shut your yap already! We're comin'.
You don't have to say "mayday", Biff. You're not on the radio.
Dang it, Apscott! Pipe down! You're acting like you're lost at sea.
Do not worry, seor Apscott. I have come to rescue you!
Hey, that's Biff! Why is he all green and... wavy-like? Oh, man, he's in worse shape than I thought.
Hey, it's Biff! Hold on, Biff! Don't worry, we've got plenty of drugs - I mean, medicine.
I think... I think that's the last of them. I can't believe we're still alive! Now tell me, where is the extraction point?
Context: BanterDef Biff_PostCombat Text  Biff is exhausted and excited and can't believe the enemy didn't kill him and the player

Text: Oh my God! They are coming! We're all going to die! MAYDAY!
Context: BanterDef Biff_StartOfFight Text  Biff is quite scared

Text: Biff, if you say "mayday" one more time, I'm gonna knock your teeth out.
You don't have to say "mayday", love, we're standing right here.
Mate, you could do me a real big favor and stuff a sock in it.
My brave Maquis! Let us help our comrades mercenaires in their struggle against the filthy capitalists!
The mutilated corpse of a poacher. A pair of antelope horns have been nailed to his head, although it is unclear if it happened before or after the man was murdered.
Who would do such sick thing, mon?!
Oh, nice! Notice how the horns have pierced the skull right below the temples? This was artfully done.
Not rigged to explode. Fidel is disappointed.
Partly decomposed corpse of a poacher. A pair of antelope horns have been nailed to his head.
The cold, stiff corpse of a poacher. A pair of antelope horns have been nailed to his head.
The body of a recently deceased poacher. A pair of antelope horns have been nailed to his head.
The time of death is between four and six hours ago.
Watch out, we're getting close.
Curious to meet this guy!
The body of a dead poacher, still warm to the touch. A pair of antelope horns have been nailed to his head.
Be on your guard, he must be still nearby.
I'm so excited.
Looking for me?
Wipe those smiles off your faces, you scum! No one is liberating YOU. I told you already - your only way out of Diamond Red is in a coffin!
Context: BanterDef DiamondRed_Boss_01 Text  initial when starts shooting slaves

Text: They... They all need to die... Legion! Kill them all!
Context: BanterDef DiamondRed_Boss_02 Text  while sector still in conflict

Text: No one needs someone like you. Not ever.
Only help I need is to bury you, and you can't help with that.
Time for you to be quiet. And dead.
Eheheheee... What? You said he deserve to die.
What? This dumbass was asking for it.
That's it, Scooter. Won't talk his way outta this.
Congratulations on the promotion! Go meet our HR in hell.
It's him! It's Larry the Unyielding! I knew that he would escape and come to free us!
What's this now, mon? You got a fan club?
Friends of yours, Larry?
Larry has a title?! I want one!
Heyyyyy, what's up?
Heyyyyy, what's up?
Larry Roachburn! The relentless one! I see you have led your elite troops back here to save us! With a hero like you, the Revolution shall prevail!
Relentless? Revolution? Larry, I have some questions...
Larry, what the hell kind of drugs did you give these guys?
How did Larry get heroic commendation and I did not?
Yeah, man! The Revolution! Totally did it. Um, remind me who you are again?
Yeah, man, sure... That was the plan, I guess.

When you resisted the interrogations and the injections - telling them nothing but fairy tales about pink elephants and dinosaurs - you became an example to us all! A true communist must be as strong as you, Larry Roachburn!
That actually makes a very weird kind of sense.
Brilliant! Reminds me of the time I drank an entire pitcher of martinis to counter the effects of a truth serum. Good show, old chap!
Is this true, Little Larry?
Oh yeah! Totally!
Oh yeah! Totally!
Are you friends of Larry the Unyielding?
Larry the... What? You surely don't mean Larry Roachburn?
I can think of a lot of names for Larry. "Unyielding" ain't one of 'em.
I am friends with Larry the Little.
Of course you are friends of Larry Roachburn, the relentless one! He must have sent you here to rescue us! With a leader like that, the Revolution shall prevail!
Larry? Revolution? Leader?! What the...
When I see Larry again, I be havin' questions.
Larry? A leader? Of people?

That is what we call him, because he never yielded! He resisted both the interrogations and the injections - telling them nothing but fairy tales about pink elephants and dinosaurs! A true communist must be as strong as Larry Roachburn!
I suppose that's one way to look at it.
I think you mean a true communist must be as confused as Larry Roachburn.
I had no idea Larry could be so inspirational!
Are you friends of Larry the Unyielding?
Larry the what?
Larry the who?
Who is this Larry the Unyielding? He sounds dangerous.
Of course you are friends of Larry Roachburn, the relentless one! He must have sent you here to rescue us! With a leader like that, the Revolution shall prevail!
Larry Roachburn?! Leader of a... revolution?
Can't possibly be the same Larry Roachburn as... Can it?
Larry Roachburn leading a revolution? Now that's a magic trick I gotta see!

They have taken Larry to the Camp Savane, because he never yielded! He resisted both the interrogations and the injections - telling them nothing but fairy tales about pink elephants and dinosaurs! A true communist must be as strong as Larry Roachburn!
If this be the Larry I know, he got some explaining to do.
Larry Roachburn in the role of his life!
If this is the Larry I know, he's frontin' big time.

<wisdom-f>
The smell... The smell never changes. Apart from the extreme sensory assault, there appears to be nothing of interest in the outhouse.

<wisdom-s>
Someone prepared the latest issue of "Long Distance Relationships" to use as toilet paper. After minor assembly, the magazine is as good as new.
Ghost or human, we know you're inside! Come out, or I swear we'll bury you in grenades!
Ha! So that's the famous ghost of the mansion!
Just a silly old man. I knew it all along!
Yeah, right, that's why it took half a jug of moonshine to bring you here.
Shut up, Jules. Hey, you! Give us the treasure and nobody will get hurt!
Get away from here! There is no treasure!
Then I guess we'll just have to kill you and take whatever we can find.
We're ghost busters, yiii-haw!
This marauder is still holding a blood-stained map of the landmine positions around the mansion. Many notes and red crosses seem to indicate someone keeps changing the location of the mines.
Flee! This place is cursed! Run while you still can!
Was that... a g-g-ghost?
Oh, man. I think I'm hallucinating again.
Oh, man. I thought I was clean, and now I'm hallucinating again.
This is just someone trying to scare us... right?

Someone has been preparing land mines on this desk. Occupying one corner of the cluttered space is an old photo of a group of people standing in front of the mansion, obviously taken before the house fell into ruin.
Fidel don't understand. How use photo to make mines? Fidel has yet to learn of explosives.
Whoever is making these mines knows what he's doing. Not likely to be any of those daft Legion types.
Creepy photo!
Someone made a hidden compartment in the floor of the old van and has been using it to store explosives. Discarded old grocery bags hide the compartment from casual inspection.
The old grocery bag trick. Not bad.
Pressing the tail of the Hippo unlocks the storm cellar door with a click.
I just knew it, mon!
Could be other parts of the Hippo.

<mechanical-f>
This looks like a storm cellar door, but it seems to be sealed shut.

<mechanical-s>
The storm cellar door is locked from the inside, but the locking mechanism looks like it could also be triggered remotely.
This be wired to open from a distance. Hmm... Could be a trigger close by.
Must be those Hippos, man. Their eyes are following me in the park!
It seems to be locked from the inside, but the Ghost has just touched something on the nearest Hippo statue and the door opened for him.
I see! The tail of that Hippo over there is very suspiciously connected with hinges.
The raft seems to be assembled by this year's winner of the Darwin award for fishing.
Closer inspection shows the towel is embroidered with the logo of Le Lys Rouge, a prominent brothel in nearby Pantagruel.
Look at the spots on this towel. Is this...? Ugh, disgusting.
This must be taken from where this Smiley has been. We're on the right track.

<wisdom-s> 
The sap oozing from the tree drives the wildlife mad.

<wisdom-f>
There is a childish drawing of dancing stick figures and... perhaps mushrooms?
What looks like a childish drawing of dancing stick figures and mushrooms is actually a map of a mine field right in front of the entrance.

<wisdom-f>
Someone has drawn a rectangle with an... ugly flower on it?
What seems to be a picture of a flower is actually some childish drawing of a skull on a door. This is a booby trap!

<wisdom-f> 
Grand Chien is a crazy place.
The skeletal hand at the bottom of the lake clearly belonged to a lady.
<wisdom-f>
What would one expect to find when rummaging through the remains, save from pain and misery?
<wisdom-s>
The carcass has nothing more to yield.
<wisdom-s>
Who would expect that a treasure may be found in a pile of dead bodies?
These guys really like to show off, Ace.
Someone tries to overcompensate for something, then ends up with the horns. It's an age-old story.
Putting horns on their own cars... What did I tell you? These buckheads are the prey, not the hunters.
Valuable item discovered
They didn't even hunt this one, just chased away scavengers. See the teeth marks? And if I remember right... Yeah, stupid old Hyena still uses it for a stash.

<medical-f>
The condition of the poacher shows no visible improvement.
A poacher has been wounded and seems to be in great pain. A good medic may be able to help him.

<medical-s>
Immediate relief is seen on the poacher's face. He smiles faintly and dozes off.
Aaah, I remember I invite Chuck Norris to play bad guy in "Much Dust, Many Bullets". He decline. He say he play a bad guy once, but then the bad guy win. No one watch.
Ah, Bruce Lee is great inspiration to me! "Be like water" is life philosophy for me: I only run downhill... That was joke.
Karate very tough to film. I prefer gun fight. Less chance to bruise face.
Man, I loved this movie! It gave me a whole new respect for the restaurant business.
I did not understand this movie. Where was the dragon?
Mr. Lee was blessed with an overabundance of both wisdom and testosterone. A unique individual.
I remember when I met Mr. Stallone for the first time, and told him we should make a movie together. I will never forget his kind response: "Yeah, right! Who are you?"
Rambo so good with explosives! I once try to use explosives in movie. Many props blow up. Much shouting. I stick to six shooters.
I wanted to use rocket launcher in "Attack of the Clydesdales" but director said no. She fear explosions cause stampede. Stampeding clydesdales very bad.
I wanted to be John Rambo when I was a kid. I spent hours rescuing P.O.W.s in my backyard until my dad made me stop tying up my cousins.
Rambo is big American hero! It is funny to me. He cannot do half the things the average Dolvich can do.
When I saw that scene in "First Blood" where Rambo disguised himself as a bush, I knew what I wanted to do for a living.
Remember that scene of "Have Honda, Will Travel" when I say "Hasta la vista, baby"? Sound familiar, right? I not say nothing. It honor to be imitated by Arnold-san.
I wanted to make movie about a terminator-cowboy, but producers say Yule Brenner already did.
This was very good movie, but it did not have enough cowboys.
Did you know Arnold has to lose muscle mass when he does a movie? It is to make all the puny guys who do not lift feel better.
I have such a huge crush on Linda Hamilton! It's one of the things that brought me and Stella together.
There is a letter found on the body.

"Charlotte, my love,
They told me that if I prove myself, they will take me in the Legion! I will soon be able to provide for us and marry you as I have always dreamed."
Watch out, man! You're treading on my, uh... art stuff!
Cynicism perk activated
WTF is... this? Let's NOT Play around with it.
Who are you?! Don't tell me you're here to set us free or some crap like that.
I believe we are here to shoot enemies. It says so in the contract.
We're on a rescue mission. We're here to help.
Nah, man. We're musicians. We play death metal. Our instruments are guns and bullets.
What? Are you about to ask me if I feel fine? No, I don't feel fine. That's the whole point of being a prisoner. Now let me enjoy it properly.
I don't give a flying crap how you feel. That better?
Now this is the power of positive thinking!
Why would you come here and ruin everything? We had food and the prospect of a job, and now? Nothing.
We had such good prospects ahead of us before you arrived. We were valuable assets. I was hoping they would send me to the mines! Now what? No guards, no food, no nothing.
You've still got your health!
A world of potential has been opened for you! Seize it!
You're daft!
Me and King Chicken, we are just fine here. I pretend to work for him, he pretends not to see when I steal his eggs.
Context: BanterDef CampBienChien_Pangloom05_ KingChickenAlive Text  KingChickenAlive liberated

Text: King Chicken is dead, long live the king! Now I have all his chickens. I hope they can fend for themselves and just give me sweet precious eggs.
Context: BanterDef CampBienChien_Pangloom05_ KingChickenDead Text  KingChickenDead liberated

Text: I doubt these are magical chickens. I think you have to feed them.
You best take care of those hens or I'll come back here and whoop your skinny little ass!
If you want eggs, you need to treat those hens like ladies. Well, not completely like ladies.
I'm sure something bad is about to happen. Probably to you.
When I die, I want to be shot out of a cannon... into a children's birthday party. The sooner they learn life sucks, the better.
Once I went into a library and asked for a book on how to commit suicide. The librarian said: "Fuck off, you won't bring it back." Asshole.
You know why Grand Chien can't win any medals at the Olympics? It's because anyone that can run, jump or swim has already escaped across the border.
Finally! I'm going to see my wife! I just need to find out which mine they sent her to.
I'm free? I'm free! No need to serve King Chicken all day for a single egg - now I can have all the food in the world!
Good job on killing King Chicken! That damn grouch had everything, and we had nothing.
Hey, King Chicken, wanna break my back for one of your eggs? Well, fuck you, you can choke on your damned eggs now.
King Chicken is dead? Huh, won't see me crying, but I'll take two of his chickens with me when I leave this shithole.
I see your luck has turned again, Pierre. Can you spare some money before you leave?
When I was on that flogging pole and I asked for water, did you help me? No, "the guards may notice". Now go to hell, coward.
That Pierre was a real pain in the ass. If it weren't for him pissing off the guards, we would have all lived just like King Chicken!
If you're going to shoot me, just make it anywhere but the head!
Context: BanterDef ElliotApproach_01 Text  Swamp Camp Defeated

Text: You IDIOTS! Fight harder!
Your Major commands you!
Don't look at me, I'm not even a real major!
Every man for himself!
"Trespassers will be fed to the Crocs!"
"Anyone caught sleeping on duty will be fed to the Crocs!!"
"Deserters will be fed to the Crocs!!!"
"DON'T STEAL! Stolen goods will be confiscated before YOU ARE FED TO THE CROCS!!!"

Obey the Major's orders or WALK THE PLANK!!! 
(and be eaten by Crocs!!!)
The MAJOR is not a MINOR! Anyone caught saying this will be fed TO THE CROCS!!!!!

CAUTION! Croc mating season! 
If attacked, FAKE ORGASM!
(failure to do so will result in being fed to the crocs)
I say, was this sign completely necessary?
I doubt the punishment needed to be mentioned.
How in the world would I know what a crocodile orgasm sounds like? Please, no one answer that.
Sorry, constables, but we will never go back to the Sanatorium.
The Spirits know their business. It's only a matter of time.
Ozzy taught us what to do! The spirits speak to Ozzy.
You cannot play ball, constables. It is only for us to play.
I will not get well soon. The spirits will take me.
I'd rather die than go back to the Sanatorium. Anyway, it is just a matter of time.
The game is all there is. Les Cadavrs don't play. Only humans play!
Do not worry about us, constables. Ozzy taught us how to play ball.
You are still a human being if you can play!
Context: BanterDef CampHope_VillagerMale_04 Text  reference to the famous quote by Friedrich Schiller

Text: There are less and less of us every day, but we still play.
Your murderer hands picked the Borassus root, now they must plant its seeds where it shall flourish, and the circle shall be closed!
And let's not forget about social distancing. Whatever we've got here is probably very infectious.
He met the devil. And the devil took what he demanded.
He met the devil. And the devil took what he demanded.
The dog ate so much earth it died. My hog is in his place now.
The answer is within the question. What is the question?
The question is always preceded by another question. The quest for knowledge is a circle disguised as a spiral.
Do you like my hog? He likes you too. He saw something that night.
Truly? Does your hog have night vision goggles then?
Unless that thing is equipped with a motion detector and a night sight capable camera, I highly doubt it.
This lady's fruitier than an edible arrangement.
Don't worry. My hog does not bite.
Don't ask me. Go and talk to my hog.
This lady's nuttier than a Snickers bar.
I do not speak Wood Hog. We may need an interpreter.
I am thinking this woman has misplaced several of her marbles.
Come inside. My hog does not judge.
That makes him better than most pigs I know.
It is not the province of pure mortals to pass judgements. There are higher forces responsible for this task.
How kind of you! I'm curious - do you have an entire wooden menagerie or is it just the porcine fellow out front?
He saw a man with eyes like glue. One was red and the other blue. He tore a page with bloody hand, to hide what caused the writer's end.
But the page was found! My hog knows, just ask around.
My hog saw something that night.
That crazy witch Wanda is up to something. Do you know that every night she and her cult are slaughtering chickens and drinking their blood?
Stay away from the Hog Lady. She's not right in the head. You can tell just by looking at her "art".
What's the deal with Painless Doc Robert? I think he actually enjoys dissecting those poor bastards.
Coroners are always a little... eccentric.
Come to the old house tonight. Join us and let's all pray for our salvation.
I can start living normally again.
Chalet de la Paix can finally live up to its name.
Me and my family are thinking of getting away from this forsaken place. I don't wanna end up like the others.
This is the act of the Old Ones, I tell you. That's why each night we must gather and bring them a present.
This is not a safe place for visitors. You'd better watch your step or you could end up like Wilcox, our last visitor.
Death visits where it pleases.
Everyone's saying this is a disease or a curse. But I don't believe their bullshit. It's the chem trails, man.
I know it, man! I've been saying that all along!
Hey, um... Don't go around saying that too much, man. It makes people think you might be on drugs.
Thank you for putting an end to all this horror.
I can't believe that Doc Robert was infecting us all this time.
Tough call. I was so sure that those voodoo cultists were up to something.
The Old Ones are not happy. They hunger for blood and stir in their sleep. They will bring more and more of the living into their dream.
There is a kind of hunger that only blood may satisfy.
Good idea! I want to take nap anyway.
The old ones in my neighborhood are NEVER happy! I got the dogs to stop shitting in their yard, what the hell more do they want?
We cannot fight the Old Ones. We dream of them and they have power over our shared dream. This is the way of Voodoo.

The Old Ones are thirsty for blood. I will brew a potion to make them sleep again. I need bloody murderers' hands to pick the Borassus root for it to work. Go! Bring it to me! It grows in the forest west of here.
Hey! We are not murderers!
Hidden in my coat is my red right hand.
Madam, I assure you, we are not murderers. The deaths we have caused have all been justifiable lethalities.
I just want to make sure we're clear on this - did you just ask us to kill someone and then go pick a flower?
I've made this mistake before with several ex-wives. So, when you say one, do you really mean a dozen? How many guests are we serving?
I have always wanted to brew a potion! Now, should our hands be covered in blood when we pick the root, or should we kill someone in front of it, or... or...
Thank you. Now I can cook the brew. Everybody must drink of it and we may all be saved from the wrath of The Old Ones.
I am busy. Don't you have eyes to see? Come back tomorrow.
And if you see the Hog Lady tell her she's late. We are starting without her.
You have made the right choice. The Old Ones are at peace. For now.
Find the Borassus root and pick it with your bloody hands, murderers. The Old Ones are saying that it will guide you to a place of great importance. Go to the west. The truth is out there.
I can see into your souls. You are murderers! This is good, for Death is coming for us all. You must know his call.
Yes. You have eyes to see, wise Mother.
No! We are not murderers. We kill only when necessary.
Unfortunately for him, my number's unlisted.
Yeah, that asshole is always trying to get a hold of me, so I blocked his number.
Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn.
This girl... She is not the first to be claimed by the Old Ones. And mark my words: she won't be the last.
People are dying and no one knows why. Well, except for Roger Wilcox. But he's dead now. He will never finish his book.
You'd better do something or soon we'll all be dead. I think that Hog Lady knows something that we don't.
Roger's death is a mystery, but here's an even deeper one. You'll never guess. There was a fish... in the percolator!
A missing page? I don't know about that... But I saw The Hog Lady stuffing some paper into her wooden hog the other day. Feeding her pet is what she told me. Crazy woman!
You found Roger's diary? Interesting. Something doesn't seem to add up here. Maybe you need to ask Wanda about it.
Almost everyone is here! We're just missing the Hog Lady. She is probably wandering in the woods somewhere west of here. She does that sometimes.
She's dead. Wrapped in plastic. And we had such a good time yesterday.
I suddenly feel like I need a damn good cup of coffee.
Oh, this is just grand! We're just leaving dead girls out on the beach now, are we?
This place looks it may have once been a junkyard, but now is something... else.
Hmm... wired fence, ammo supplies, recently used fire pit. I say someone is still using this place.
We'd better watch out. This is obviously a military camp. And whoever is stationed here is probably close by.
There are fresh tracks on the ground. Someone was here last night.
This is a hiding place. But who's hiding? And from what?
Looks like an outpost of some kind. Let's keep an eye out for guards.
Someone left supplies in middle of nowhere. Is gift, glavny?
Fresh corpse in a bag. There are no signs of violence.
You better not touch her. They say she belongs to the Old Ones now.
So many photos... Wait. Isn't that Roger Wilcox?
Looks like someone really had it out for this Wilcox guy, Ace.
What do we have here? Dead Poets Society?
These are not photos. They are death sentences.
Dead body with a hand written label on the left thumb: Roger Wilcox.

That's my old friend Roger Wilcox. Unfortunately for him, he won't ever get to become a famous novelist... Truth be told, he never would have even if he had been able to finish his book. Terrible writer - descriptions that don't make sense and characters too moody to be likable.
On the desk there is a letter labeled "for Xavier".
The embers are still burning. Someone has recently used that fire pit.
The air here is noisome with the smell of fish offal and rotting wood.
This place gives me the creeps, scooter. Piles of junk, rotten smell, loonies giving me the crazy eye... Just like my hometown.
Ah, it's like some monstrosity has taken over this town. Look at all this death and moisture. I'm tellin' ya laddie, it's the Loch Ness monster or something akin to it!
I'm not surprised at the poor state of this town. All they eat is fish.
Dang, Woodpile. This town's one helluva rotten pile of... wood.

<wisdom-f>
This is definitely a plant. But so is everything else in this forest.
I don't know what it is, but do you think we can smoke it?
That's not cannabis, right?
That might make for an excellent garnish!
She might have told us what the bloody thing looks like!
Pointy green leaves. This seems to be the Borassus plant Wanda was asking for.
Ah, there it is! Borassus aethiopum.
Borassus is one of Mother Nature's best gifts! Nothing else gives your aura such a complete enema.
Field guide indicates this is herb of which we are seeking.
Wait... Is that a hog... made of wood?
There is a piece of paper stuck between the wooden planks.
Looks like this pork has some beans to spill.
Each story must have an end. You're missing the end of the writer's story. But my hog saw something that night.
There is a hidden note here: "Under a stone, you will find the thing you're looking for."
There is a hidden note here: "Two people are aware of my hiding place. Me and the Hog Lady."
There is a hidden note here: "Three sets of eyes are looking there."
There is a hidden note here: "Strange things are happening in the woods west of the village."
There is a hidden note here: "The diary is not in the village. Follow the setting sun."

<mechanical-f>
All that's coming from the radio is static.
Come on!!! Work, damn you!
Nothing but snow, chief.
Hmmm... You know, I miss Static.

After a bit tuning, a voice bursts out of the static. "...Landsbach speaking. We received a report from the Colonel that the town's population has decreased by 40%. Siegfried said we are ready to move. Over and out."
I ain't sure what I just heard, but I know it ain't good.
That be something suspicious all right.
Just once I'd like us to tune into one of these dang things and hear something nice!

<medical-f>
This body is starting to decompose.
This body has been infected with a new strain of Red Rabies. It can be used as a sample for the research of Dr. Kronenberg.
Another victim of this mysterious plague... Oh wait. He's just sleeping.
Some sort of leather-bound book looks to be hidden under the stone.
I have a diary just like this, except mine has a parental advisory sticker on the cover.
I have a journal just like this! I write down all my private thoughts in mime.
A diary is a landmine of paper trails disguising itself as a sleep aid.
These wooden statues look strangely familiar.
Peculiar tribal art carved from wood.
My watchers! I made them with my hands. They are here to watch over my hog. They make sure my hog doesn't eat earth!
This lady no be right in the head.
I have charm on necklace that does same.
I should buy one of these for my kids.
Clear signs of rituals related to the practice of Voodoo can be seen strewn about this place.
This is obviously a house where people gather to pray... And tear heads off chickens.
Candles, bones, blood on the floor... This is either a cult's gathering spot, or somebody is taking their D&D sessions way too seriously.
Oh, man... Smells like the morning after one outta hand house party!
Hm... This is the smell of fresh blood spilled on the floor. Chicken blood, to be precise.
This reminds me of my babusya's kitchen.
Someone attempted to contact the spirit world here.

I recognize this. It is the man's diary. The man was always putting his soul into it. This is all that is left of his soul now, but it is incomplete. I can see that one page is missing. Someone must have taken it.
I have a diary just like this, except mine has a parental advisory sticker on the cover.
I have a journal just like this! I write down all my private thoughts in mime.
A diary is a landmine of paper trails disguising itself as a sleep aid.

<wisdom-f>
This looks like a map of some kind, but of what area is anyone's guess.
Can't figure it, partner. Could be map of this area, could be map to homes of Hollywood stars.
I cannot even tell which way I am supposed to hold this thing!
This map could certainly benefit from a "You Are Here" label.
This is a map of Chalet De La Paix and the region around it. Red arrows are indicating several routes connecting this camp and the village.
Looks like someone's planning a military operation to seize to the town.
Looks to me like someone's planning an offensive on the town, Woody.
This map indicates the nearby town may be in imminent danger.
Hundreds of small pieces of paper are hanging from this tree. Each one has something written on it.
Wishing Tree is powerful magic, glavny. Spirits work to protect town from evil.
Wow! It's so pretty. Do you think it's bad luck to read the wishes?
Oh, a Wishing Tree! What should I wish for? More wishes? No, that would just make the tree angry.
"My mom says we have to move to Fleatown. I don't want to go."
"May the Old Ones have mercy on our souls."
"I don't like the Colonel. I wish he'd go away."
"My hog saw something that night."
"My brother's not feeling well. I hope it's not the disease."
"I wish Mother would stop staring at me all night long."
This child is lucky they only get the stare. I was punished if I failed to secure my room's perimeter before bedtime.
Poor Roger. I thought he was just being overly dramatic. Now, it's too late... About these places he mentions - we mostly hung out here at the docks, and at the bar... And back at his place, I guess?
You can keep the letter. It doesn't help me with my grief.
Hey! You're not with these animal torturers, are you? Please help me! They put me in a cage like an... like a non-human person!!!
They mean to send me to their horrible fighting pit. They THINK they can make ME hurt a non-human person, but that's just impossible!
I think you will find the hyenas do not feel the same way about you, mon coeur.
You're gonna feel real different about it once you're in that pit, that's for damn sure.
Hate to break it to you, Woodstock, but some animals ain't for petting.
Besides, it would be bad for their diet to eat me! I've already tried to offer them vegan food, but they laughed at me! I mean, not just the bad guys, but the hyenas as well...
What matters is that your heart is in the right place... uh, for now at least.
They're not the only ones.
I don't think this lady's playing with a full deck.
How could you let the poor critters die! They were people! I'll... I'll never talk to you again!
Hyenas, crocodiles, people... Hell, I've killed most everything that runs, walks or crawls at one point in time or another.
Yes, hyenas are people. Very bad people.
Suits me just fine, lass. I dinnae think we have much to talk about anyway.
Thanks for letting me out, but aren't you forgetting something? Those poor hyenas must be terrified in that cell. Time to take the flower by the thorns!
Context: BanterDef ChienSauvage_Peta02_OpenCell_HyenasAlive Text  Peta released >> she will open the cage of the hyenas

Text: Stop. Don't. Come back.
Context: BanterDef ChienSauvage_Peta02_OpenCell_HyenasAlive Text  see Willy Wonka meme "Stop. Don't. Come back." Peta released >> she will open the cage of the hyenas

Text: You don't wanna be grabbing no thorns, mon!
Ma'am?! Ma'am, that's really not a good idea!
That's the spirit! Make today the best day of your life!... Uh, we should probably go after her.
Those poor hyenas did not deserve to die! I was just about to teach them to eat vegan food! People like you have no right to live!!! I... I just can't stand you... you darned carnists!
Context: BanterDef ChienSauvage_Peta03_OpenCell_HyenasDead Text  Peta released and the hyenas are dead >> Leave

Text: The corpses have floated from somewhere upstream.
Who could have brought this boat? It seems to be waiting for the dead to be loaded on it.
The mysterious boat is ready to take the dead down the river.
The ship has run aground and spilled its horrible load of dead bodies.
There were more bodies on the canvas, but apparently some of them weren't as dead as expected.
The ship crew did not survive.
Someone tried to bury the presumed dead.
The effigy was repaired.
Okay, OKAY, I will drink the tea! I fucking LOVE tea! Just don't eat my soul, please...
Context: BanterDef CursedForest_TeaParty_Legion01 Text  terrified survivor of the "tea party" at D14

Text: Wait, you're not the Beast. I'm not afraid of you!
Context: BanterDef CursedForest_TeaParty_Legion01 Text  understanding dawns survivor of the "tea party" at D14

Text: Die, fuckers!
Context: BanterDef CursedForest_TeaParty_Legion01 Text  survivor of the "tea party" at D14

Text: There is still some Adonis trash on the island. Your friend Corazon has moved into the old Fort and had her crew bring heavy machinery.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Basil_01_approach Text  Fort not taken >> hint to Corazon location

Text: Heavy machinery like dozers and trucks? What she do that for, mon?
Any idea what to expect?
I'm guessing she didn't do that just to install a miniature golf course.
If I remember right, the fortress has a bunker, but it's been flooded for years. The pumps I saw on those trucks makes me think they excavated and drained it.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Basil_01_approach Text  Fort not taken >> hint to Corazon location

Text: I almost shot Pierre when I saw him stumble into town... Now I'm glad I didn't. He's done a lot to mend the damage he and the Legion did here.
It is good to refrain from shooting prodigal son.
Shooting would have been too much. Public shaming followed by some light stoning is more appropriate.
You didn't shoot him? Not even just a little bit? Damn, you're a softy.
Pierre puts flowers on Tinhay's grave every day. That won't bring him back, but it's something.
As long as those greedy Adonis bastards hold Fort L'Eau Bleu, we will not be safe. It is the same as when the Legion was here - what is ours is theirs any time they feel like taking it.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Basil_04 Text  Fort not taken

Text: I am sorry for my role in that, Uncle Basil. I cannot change the past, but I can promise you this: we will throw those Adonis dogs off the island, and the Fort will be given to its rightful owners - the people of Ernie.
I have big plans for the old Fort. We will scrap all the military hardware, and we'll build a trading dock that will put Ernie on the map.
You kicked the Legion out of Ernie, and now that you have crushed its leader, I can only hope this is the end of that bunch of bandits.
There will always be bandits, but without the Major there is no Legion.
If it is not, then it simply means I will have more hunting to do.
Without the Major, all those Legion dudes will just go back to being ordinary, garden-variety scuzzwads.
You kicked the Legion out of Ernie, and now that you have crushed its leader, I can only hope this is the end of that bunch of bandits.
Yeah, about that... Have you ever seen the Major in person?
No, but I'm sure I would recognize the bastard the moment I saw him. Such men are often quite short and ugly, with heads that are too large or too small.
Hehe, yeah... Yeah, I bet you're right. I hope they put that description on a "Wanted" poster.
I heard that you attacked and killed Grand Chien soldiers... I suppose you had good reason from what Ms. LaFontaine told me.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Basil_08 Text  Faucheux defeated or Sanatorium guards killed

Text: Good job killing that brat Pierre. I would have killed him myself, if I could.
Although no one escapes death, his path led him to it quicker than most.
You would like to know how to kill? Fidel is always ready to teach!
He lived like desperado. Died like one, too.
I heard that you shot Bastien! That was one bullet well spent.
That guy was so greasy, he sweat motor oil!
I should have killed him the moment I met him.
He was a disgusting toad of a man.
Heeey, are you guys like those commandos from the movies? Can you blow up a car just by shooting at it? The Legion guys said that doesn't actually happen.
They have a point about that.
Depends on what you shoot it with.
Depends on the car, mon.
Then they kicked my projector and laughed at me when I asked them to fix it.
Uncle Basil said I should stop whining, but he won't repair my projector either.
Thanks for repairing it guys! We'll be having a movie night tonight! I'm going to figure out how they get those cars to explode!
It is explosives. It is no secret.
Will there be popcorn?
It is movie magic! Best kind of magic.
Teach me to shoot! Uh... I can carry your pack for you! Do you want a gummy bear?
Hey, look! I'm in the militia! I can kill all those Legion guys now - just like you!
You sure you wanna be like me, boy? You might not survive it.
Just remember to keep your head down, kid.
Yay, the commandos return once again! They have come here to chew bubblegum and kick butt, and they're all out of bubblegum! Right? Right?...
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Billy_06_approach Text  reference to the movie "They live" world flip

Text: When do we attack the Fort? Are you going to kill them all with throwing knives and roundhouse kicks?
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Billy_07 Text  world flip, Fort not taken

Text: How did you know that? Have you been watching me?
I think you watch too many movies... but you are not wrong.
That is my plan, but you must never speak of it. If you are very quiet, I will make sure you get commendation.
That was AWESOME! I mean, when we entered the Fort and started shooting, like rat-tat-tat, brrrrt, KABLAM!!!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Billy_08 Text  world flip, Fort taken

Text: I'll ask uncle Basil to build a shooting range for bazookas at the Fort, so you can go and train there!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Billy_09 Text  world flip, Fort taken

Text: I wish they would make a movie about you guys!
They already have, my friend!
Hey, papa.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: My boy! You've... you've come back?
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: No, papa. I serve the mercenaries now.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: But... but you don't have to. You don't have to fight anymore.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: This is what you do not understand! This country is tearing itself apart. Everyone must choose a side or it will be chosen for them!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: Perhaps you're right. I wish it wasn't so, but I understand. Go, then. Go and know that I love you.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: I... Be well, papa.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_01_approach Text  Pierre recruited >> Proud

Text: Thank you for saving my son, Pierre! He not only survived, but he also came to his senses! How can an old man ever repay you?
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_02_approach Text  Pierre returned >> Proud

Text: Just keep him away from guns... and maybe teach him baseball or something.
You don't owe us a thing. Just make sure you keep your firearms safely stored in a secure location.
Ordinarily, I prefer cash, but I also accept wire transfers, certified checks, or candy.
God bless you for leading my son down the path of wisdom!
I was already on that path. I just trusted the wrong guide.
I was already on that path. I just trusted the wrong guide.
You have not only saved my son's life - you also saved his soul.
Papa, stop... You are embarrassing me.
Papa, stop... You are embarrassing me.
My boy Pierre... You saved his soul, but you couldn't save his life.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_05 Text  Pierre saved & dead

Text: Tell me again how my son died. I want to hear every detail.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_06 Text  Pierre saved & dead

Text: Thank you for saving our president. Now there is a chance for peace in my country.
The President is a good man, but he needs to watch his back a little bit better.
I like Alphonse. He's a cool dude, but bringing peace to this place would be one hell of a magic trick.
Keep those positive thoughts flowing, my friend! Manifest your dreams!
Now that our president is dead, my last hope for Grand Chien remains with his daughter... and you.
Please, hurry up and save our president. He is our last hope for a normal life.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Luc_09 Text  Major not defeated

Text: Get away from me, you heartless murderers! You have killed my only son...
I was a wolf before, and now I'm a shepherd's dog.
Who's a good boy? WHO'S A GOOD BOY?
Would you like a biscuit?
Can I give you ear scratches? Belly rubs?
To hell if they will accept me or not. It is my duty to protect them anyway.
I hope I can meet Miss LaFontaine one day. She is a good person and a true patriot. I cannot shake the feeling of shame for trying to kidnap her.
My Ernie Rangers are everything that the Legion was not: honest, honorable, and ready to defend their home.
Give it some time.
I admit I was wrong about you, but everything I said about greedy foreigners sucking the lifeblood of my country - that applies perfectly to Corazon Santiago and her people.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Pierre_05 Text  Corazon not defeated

Text: Time to put Santiago down. Whenever you are ready to storm the Fort, the Ernie Rangers will be there to help you.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Pierre_06 Text  Fort not taken - NOT USED

Text: Finally, those greedy foreigners are out of my country. Now we have a chance to set things right.
I cannot stand to see the Legion still prospering. It was created to protect my country, not to rob it. You must find Le Major and end his perversion of patriotism.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Pierre_08 Text  Major not defeated

Text: Le Major was a great man once, even in his madness. In spite of everything he has done to me and my country, he doesn't deserve to rot in jail. What he deserves is an honest bullet to the brain.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_Pierre_09 Text  Major in jail

Text: Everyone gets their day in court regardless of whether they deserve it or not.
Can't do the time, don't do the crime.
He'll probably get that anyway, but first the people of Grand Chien will get to hear his side of the story.
The Major was a great man once, even in his madness. You did the right thing to grant him a soldier's death. He deserves no less.
I don't know if I can trust you, Major. I cannot shake the feeling that you are a wolf in sheep's clothing.
You don't have to trust me, kid. But I'm not the Major anymore. Now I am just Spike, and that's that.
Only time will tell, Major. But you have no place in Grand Chien anymore. You should finish your mission and leave for good.
I'll keep that in mind.
First they kidnap the President and then they come for his daughter! Monsters!
If you're looking for someone in charge, go talk to Basil.
Welcome to Ernie. There's usually less blood and screaming, but you caught us at a bad time.
Tinhay was a good man. Dumb as a box of rocks, but a good man.
They should hang Luc's son, not Luc himself. Cowards. The Legion doesn't have to kill us, we do it ourselves!
Luc betrayed his friend Tinhay and the marauders killed him! And you know who leads them? Pierre, Luc's son!
Luc deserves what he gets! He has put us all in danger.
Herman got what he deserved, the weasel! Poor Martha though.
I can't even look at him, hanging like that. Poor Luc. I'm sure he was guilty, but... I think what we did is a terrible sin.
I can't stand the sight of that stupid gallows now. I can't wait until it gets taken down. It reminds us just how foolish we all were.
Oh, Pierre! I am so happy you have found the right path! I was praying for you every day!
Um... Thanks, auntie Michelle. I'm sure that did the trick.
You should be ashamed of yourself! You make your poor father sad!
Has he ever not been sad, Mrs. Dubois? Come now, look to your chickens and quit pecking at me.
Pierre, you need to make amends with the dead. Put some flowers on the grave of poor Tinhay!
But I... Yes, auntie Liz. Of course, you're right.
I'm afraid to leave the village. Those bandits at the Fort may kill me, or worse!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_VillagerFemale_12 Text  Fort not taken

Text: Please take the old Fort from those foreigners! I know they are conducting secret biological experiments there. They want to develop a deadly virus that makes people go crazy!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_VillagerFemale_13 Text  Fort not taken, world flip

Text: That can't be true... Can it?
I know that you captured the old Fort just to conduct secret biological experiments there. Shame on you.
I am sure that Pierre has returned only to spy on us for the Legion! Yesterday I noticed he was looking at me while I was doing laundry.
Next time you catch him looking, you should invite him over for a cup of tea, love.
I feel safer now that I know Pierre is on our side. He is very brave.
You did a good thing shooting that traitor Pierre. His poor father though...
I heard that you paid Martha and Herman for betraying us. Why would you do that?!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_VillagerFemale_18 Text  Martha and Herman helped

Text: See, I knitted a pair of nice socks for each one of you. I hope I got the initials right.
Awww, mine have a cute little mouse embroidered on them!
I love the vyshyvanka! You got the pattern just right.
Oh, but this is surely the finest gift a Scotsman can receive... Eh, I dunnae suppose ye can knit a kilt?
Tinhay was a fool! You can't scare away these Legion types. You have to shoot to kill!
You wouldn't be interested in joining the militia, would you?
Welcome to Ernie! Come for the beaches, stay for the gun fights!
I always knew Pierre was trouble, but I never guessed he'd turn on his own people!
That weasel Herman served beer to the Legion, like they were old pals.
I heard there's some good scrap you can find out in the Rust.
Sounds like I might be needing to spend some extra time there.
I'd say Luc is the best man I have ever known. Damn his wretched son!
Basil, Luc and Tinhay - these three, they built this place. And look what has become of them. One is about to execute the other for betraying the third. These are sad times indeed.
I dunno what to think. Luc loves this son of his, but... I never thought he'd go that far.
If Luc had beaten his son more when he was small, it would have never come to this!
You're damn right! If he had, that boy would have killed him and dumped his body in a swamp long ago.
No, it would have been worse... much worse.
At last, we can get back to living our lives in peace!
Context: BanterDef Ernie_VillagerMale_10_post-lynch Text  Luc or Herman hanged

Text: Well, it looks like things can get back to normal, for whatever that's worth.
Context: BanterDef Ernie_VillagerMale_11_post-lynch Text  Luc or Herman hanged

Text: We should have used that gallows. Seems a shame to waste it. Besides, traitors deserve to die!
Is this Pierre? Hard to recognize him when he's not threatening or intimidating someone.
Get out of my way, old fool.
Hey, Pierre! It is good to see you have left the Legion! They were nothing but trouble.
Yes. It's true, but perhaps I have only found a different kind of trouble, eh?
