With that settled, we can discuss the untimely demise of my good friend Luigi.
Is that all you can offer?
There is more where these came from, but first I would like to ask a small favor of you. It's a task for which I think you might be well-suited.
Boss Blaubert! You sent these ragazzi to pick me up, and here I am! I'm really touched, even if it did take you a little while. But hey - I guess you were too busy with your new whore, eh?
supported Boss Blaubert
I liked Luigi. He was smart, but not as loyal as he should have been. In our line of work, there can't be half-friends - for a half-friend is always half an enemy.
. This is same in any work with gun and peoples.
In our line of work, cutting enemies in half is how we make new friends.

But I didn't lie to you about needing help to run my business. I don't have Luigi anymore, and the Major is mad as a hatter. How about you and I become... partners? I help you and you help me. What do you say?
Partners like you were with Luigi?
Not if you prove to be as loyal as you are smart.
partners with Boss Blaubert
Were partners then
Good! I will call you whenever I need help that requires your particular expertise, and in return you are welcome to ask for my assistance whenever you need it.
Wait, so now we're working with a Mob boss?!
I don't like this "partnership" one bit.
We watch your back, you watch ours. That's a fair deal.
And take this in appreciation for bringing Luigi to me.
No thanks
Mercenary work is one thing, but working for a mob boss is where I draw the line.
No dice. In mercenary work, if you have two bosses, you usually end up shooting one of them. Doesn't look good on the resum.
I think we'd prefer to avoid any potential conflicts of interest.
Too bad, but I respect your decision. We'll go our separate ways. Please take this in appreciation for bringing Luigi to me.
Whoa! Nice. Got anyone else you want us to drag here?
I have been told that my good friend Luigi is dead.
What do you want from me?! You killed my boys and now you walk around my place as if you just own it?
Yeah, you got it 'bout right.
I hear you have entered the diamond business. In fact, you did it with a bang.
Bang is our specialty, ehehehe.
Hope that doesn't mess with any deals you have with your Legion buddies.

Your quarrel with the Legion doesn't concern me. Trading partners come and go. You can fight. That interests me. I'd like to ask you a small favor. It's a task for which I think you might be well-suited.

I see you are very interested in my property, but I am afraid that it is not for sale. Now, my associates will escort you out of it and show you the sights. Please be aware that some of those are laser sights.
Someone else may join them.
What the hell was that? I've heard scarier threats from my niece when it's time for her bath!
I see you are very persistent. As much as I am flattered, it is time to end your tour. Please send my regards to my former trading partners... in hell.
Welcome to my humble home.
LuigiConfrontation
As always - you talk too much, Luigi. And what is worse, you talked.
Maybe I made a deal with somebody, Boss. That's what we do, me and you, we do business. Or is it only me?
What do you mean?!
Rumor has it, you don't do much these days, Boss. You're too busy enjoying your little queen, eh? Don't get me wrong, I would enjoy her as well!
You wish!
My personal life is not the topic of discussion, Luigi, your betrayal is. You're here because I need to make a statement. All must see what happens to those who betray me.
Your personal life is the whole point, Boss. You pay all your attention to a woman and none of it on the business. You need to step down... permanently.
You know I won't. I see you have turned my men against me, but maybe you are forgetting about the people I sent to find you.
We will support you
Let's be done with it already.
We're with Luigi
The times, they are a-changin'. Ragazzi!
Don't involve us
When you don't pick a side, someone else does it for you.

I see what's going on. You stand there and watch the Boss and me kill each other and then step in to take over the business yourselves. No chance. Let's kill the mercs first, Boss. We can settle up after.
LuigiDead
Why would you kill him?! I didn't ask you to do that. This is something I had to do. He was my partner and he betrayed my trust.
The fuck you want - it was clear you wanted him dead, he's dead. Problem solved.
What is problem? He is dead.
You cannot kill a man like Luigi that way, like a dog. His death needs to be a statement and it needs to be done in front of witnesses.
We are witness.
He's right. The street has its laws.
We don't care for street law. He was a criminal and he resisted.
Easy fix. Statement is "Don't be like Luigi, or you will die like a dog."
But I guess things like that don't matter to me as much as they used to. Here, take this. You did a good job finding him and eliminating a loose end for me. That deserves payment.
We already have a contract
I am aware that you are working for the Adonis Corporation, but I also happen to know that you have some... freedom of action. I'm just asking for a small favor.
Are you in the diamond business?
You stand in the way of the Major's plans for taking over the diamond industry. I'm okay with that. Your quarrel with him doesn't concern me much, as long as you keep it civil at the Market.
We'll be cool if they'll be cool, but I wouldn't count on that.
We'll keep the peace, but I doubt they will.
I'm also doing business with big buyers like your friends from Adonis. However, sometimes business interest outlives friendship, if you know what I mean.
You work with Adonis?
They pay good money and don't care where the diamonds come from. They're trying to corner the market, but the black market is too slippery for that kind of thing - just the way I like it.
Things are often slippery when they're greasy.
Word. Ice is slippery, too. You feel me?
The Major?
He is an extraordinary man. All I can tell you is, um...
Booboo, dinner is ready!
I'm coming, darling! Just give me a minute!
You shouldn't talk about the Major on an empty stomach. You said yourself he is bad for your digestion!
She's right. Ask me again when you are done with that little favor I asked of you.
Now tell us about the Major

Oh, the Major, yes. After he stopped doing business with your current employer, he started selling the diamonds from his mines to me. I sell them on the black market, where they are mostly bought by Adonis.
So, the leader of the Legion had dealings with Adonis?!
Hold up. Say that again?
Something smells off, and I do not think it is just this man's excessive use of cologne.
Your boss and the Major were friends not so long ago. Well, maybe "partners" is a better word. But something happened and their deal went sour. I don't know what it was.
What kind of favor you want?

My right hand man Luigi has been stupid enough to get himself thrown in jail. I need him back here to run my business while I... Well, let's just say Mollie and I want to enjoy our new-found relationship without distractions.
This Luigi - is he a plumber?
What? No. Why would you think that?
Never mind.
I need you to break into the Good Place where they are keeping him and bring him back to me. You will be handsomely rewarded.
What about his brother?
What the hell are you talking about?!
Uh... Forget it. We can handle the turtles ourselves.
The Good Place?
It's something between a state prison and a private concentration camp. Its director gets government grants for imprisoning honest crooks, but I know he's involved in the slave trade as well.
There are no "honest" criminals. Crime is crime.
Agree to disagree.
I may not be an angel from heaven, but there are things I would not do. For example, there is no place for slavery at my Market. Honest pay for honest jobs, that's how we do it in the family.
Everybody looks good when compared to someone worse.
Slave trade?
Jackhammer runs the Good Place. He also lends money - with huge interest. Those who miss a payment end up in his prison and the only way out is if he sells you into slavery.
Maquis Manifesto
Hmm, is this Le Lys Rouge? I have always said this is the only good thing in that dump Pantagruel. That and the diamond mine, of course.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Maquis Manifesto
Maquis Manifesto
Why are you wasting my time with communist propaganda?!
Give a propaganda pamphlet
I hope you will be kind enough to bring my Luigi back to me. Please make sure he comes right here - I'm very much concerned about his health and well-being.
I have a feeling that this Luigi will be going places, and not necessarily "Good places".
Dad jokes again, honey?
Always, love.
Goodbye, my friends.
Goodbye.
Who the fuck are you and what the fuck you want?
Well, I didn't think you were fucking tourists. What the fuck you want, mercenaries?
We are friendly
Good for you. I'm not. I run a store full of fucking guns. If you came here looking for fucking ice cream and lollipops, you're out of luck.
Is that all that you got? You're fucking children. Don't trade swears with me. I've been sworn at by experts, and you're just schoolyard bullies.
Context: Conversation Gran_1 Text vague Pratchett reference

Text: Fuck you!
Well, I'm the fucker who will set your store on fire if you fuck with him. Is that good enough for you?
I'm the bitch who's gonna slap you silly if you keep giving me sass!
Fidel wants what Fidel always wants - to kill people who swear at him.
Ah, I see you're a person of culture. We'll get along just fine.
Context: Conversation Gran_1 Text vague Pratchett reference

Text: Thanks for the fucking rescue. I'm still pissed about the Legion surprising us... I shouldn't have put fucking Mad Hannah on guard duty.
Context: Conversation Gran_1 Text (Mad Hannah has bad hearing)

Text: I can't wait for the fucking Legion to show up so I can see the old gang back in action.
The fucking Legion had no chance against the Coffee Beans! And you all managed not to fucking piss your pants, so I guess that's something.
The fucking Legion took us by surprise! Fuck these handcuffs, fuck these bombs, and fuck everything in between!
What?
I'm Granny Cohani, for fuck's sake. Everyone knows me. Back when I was in the Coffee Beans gang, mothers used my fucking name to scare children who misbehaved.
So you're some kind of a bogeyman?
Bogeywoman!
Like if they caught them swearing, for example.
Damn fucking right.
You mean like, "Stop swearing or you'll grow up to be a potty-mouthed old hag?"
Fuck you.
The toughest fucking gang in town. In our day, we hung out at the Rye Bar. Good old Ma Baxter ran it back then and she would slap any fucker who wanted to start shit.
Things are just better when a woman is in control!
I respect a woman who knows how to keep the peace.
I never understand people who start trouble when drunk. What is point of that? Drink is for celebration!
Now she's giving hell only to the devil, and her dumb son is running the bar.
Is this Ma Baxters shotgun?
What the fuck?! How did you get this relic? No, fuck that, I don't really care. I just want it! I'd trade you my fucking soul for it... if I had one.
Show her Ma Baxter's Argument Invalidator
Ma Baxters Shotgun
How much do you want for the gun?
Right! Now give me the fucking gun. Oh, yes, come to Granny!
I have the unpleasant feeling that we may have set our asking price a smidge too low.
This was a most efficient trade. I think that is good... right?
I think we may have left some money on the table, Scooter.
sold the shotgun to Granny Cohani
I don't have that much money, but the Coffee Beans will help cover the cost.
Now give me the fucking gun. Oh, yes, come to Granny!
I don't have that much fucking money. Maybe I can see about getting the girls from the old gang to pitch in. That shotgun belongs with the Coffee Beans!
We want your gang to fight for us
I want to see you girls in action!
I wish to see what kind of warriors are these Coffee Beans.
If they fight as tough as you talk, I would very much like to see your gang in action.
That can be arranged. Just wait till I tell them about Ma Baxter's fucking Argument Invalidator!
donated the shotgun to Granny Cohani
You can have it for free
Really? If this is some fucking joke...
I never joke about guns, ma'am.
This gun has its own aura... and I sense that it matches yours.
Perhaps this weapon will serve to remind you how its previous owner did not appreciate rudeness.
What the fuck you mean by that?
But then again, perhaps not.
So you really mean to just give me the fucking gun? I don't know what to say... Fuck. I mean... Thank you.
And don't you ever mention to the gang that I gave you the "T" "Y" - they'd never respect me again and then I'd have to go and fucking kill you.
refused to give the shotgun to Granny Cohani
No way, we need it
You are too small and female for this gun.
I'll be dead and buried before I see a gun like this put into hands like yours.
I think gun is for shooting, not for selling.
Well, fuck you then.
Well, fuck.
You remind me of my own babusya. But she does not use profanity like you do.
Your mouth has no respect. Until it does, you will get none from me.
There is no need to be so mean.
Sell "sarcastic, crotchety bitch" some place else. We're full up here.
Context: Conversation Gran_1 Text One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest reference

Text: Oh, come on, love. You are overdoing it a bit.
This be why I prefer cars over people. Engines don't swear at you for nothing.
Your attitude is not appreciated. You'll take a more civil tone or I will put you in time-out.
I'll let you in on a little secret, Gran. Being tough doesn't mean you need to be a bitch.
I'm serious - I got two fists just achin' to take the sass right outta your mouth.
I really do not understand the hostility. We have not done anything bad to you. I would know if we did.
Well, fuck. Don't take Old Gran's mouth so serious, sweetheart. I mostly save it for the men... Uh, I didn't mean that the way it sounded. Anyway, it's just the way I fucking talk.
Why are you so mean?
Because it's my only fucking personality trait! Is that a fucking problem?
Nah, it's just weird. I usually have to marry a woman before she starts being mean to me.
I'm too terrified to say yes, so I'll say no.
I find such honesty incredibly alluring. Do nae be trying to work your feminine wiles on me, woman!
You're too young for me.
Are you selling guns?
No, I'm keeping them for sentimental reasons. Of course I'm fucking selling the fucking guns.
I am very sentimental about the carbine my babusya used to teach me how to shoot. I could never sell it! What if all these weapons were a gift from your own babusya?
Would be a hell of a gift.
There is nothing wrong with attaching sentiment to a weapon. I am still keeping my late brother's rifle.
Got any special promotions going on?
Sure! Just use the promo code "FUCK YOU" at check out.
Oh, I'm just fucking teasing. Take a look and see if you can find something you like. Just don't resell anything to the Legion, okay?
The rule is, you touch something - you pay with money. You steal something - you pay with your fucking life. No reselling to the fucking Legion, or I'll find you and fuck you up.
You dont sell to the Legion?
Fuck no! No guns for those fucking rapists and marauders. They only get bullets from me... for free - if you know what I mean.
Indeed I do. You give the gift of eternal rest to those who deserve it most.
What a coincidence! I, too, enjoy giving tiny gifts of pain to all the bad little rapists and marauders of the Legion.
I think I'm picking up what you're putting down.
Are you planning to do something about their fucking N-Night operation, or are you going to let the fucking Legion take over my fucking Docks?
Do you accept Grand Chien franks?
For the love of fuck, no. Give me some real fucking money, not this fucking shit. Grand Chien money isn't even fit for fucking toilet paper.
It not so bad. I have had worse.
I'd ask how you know that, but I don't really want to know.
Right. Well. That's... certainly something to keep in mind.
N-Night?

Come on, even the fucking people on the street know about the Legion's grand fucking operation. Those fuckers can't keep a secret even if their fucking lives depend on it... which happens to be the case.
Secrecy requires discipline, and discipline is not something in great supply in the Legion.
They plan to swarm the place in a few days. See? I even marked the N-Night date on my calendar.
Well, look at that. I got me a party to crash.
I can't wait to lay out the welcome mat for them... And by "welcome mat", I mean hot lead.
Nice of them to let us know in advance. They're gonna get a magic show like none other.
Can the Coffee Beans help us?
To be honest, I'd be happy to see the old gang together again. But... Well, let's say we did not part on the best of terms.
If I try to talk to Gal Wilma, Kayla, Rude Trudy, Old Vinnie or especially Mad Hannah, there would likely be some blood spilled.
Perhaps YOU can convince those fucked-up old hags to help fight off the Legion. If they're interested, tell them to come see me. I promise I won't shoot them.
I will not fail. I am the best at convincing women to do things they would not ordinarily do.
I've never been much good at convincing women to do anything except divorce me, but I'll give it my best effort.
I won't make any promises, Woody. We'll see if this old dog can remember how to chase some p-... uh, cats.
Yeah, fuck off.
Fu... Uhhh, goodbye.
Goodbye.
I saw you handle those Legion thugs. Not bad. I don't expect you did it for free, huh? We don't have the money to pay for your protection.
good impression on Basil
Our client wanted us to get the Legion out of your town for you.
Don't worry. Our client expressed interest in helping you, so we did.
Really? I can't see how that works for you, but I wouldn't say no to a good thing.
We don't require payment
Yeah, right. There is no such thing as a free lunch. Please, at least don't get us killed.
Does it look like I'm hiding money bags in my pants?
I can always tell when a man is hiding something in his pants.
While it is true that I know little of your pants, I think that maybe you have more than just the one pair.
Well, I suppose it's better what money we do have goes to you than the Legion. Here, take it - at least you kicked them out.
bad impression on Basil
You can spare some coin
Look at this place. Do you really expect us to have money hidden in the walls? We barely have walls! Whatever we had, the Legion took it already.
If you really mean to help us, you better do it before the Legion returns and someone else gets killed. Or were you just planning on running off like those other mercs?
What is this? After all Pierre has done to us, you have recruited him?!
I hope you will. I really do - not for your sake, but for poor Luc. I almost hanged him because of this unworthy son of his.
Don't worry, sir. I'll make a good soldier out of this young man.
bad impression on Basil
We will keep him in check
Yeah, tell that to Tinhay. You should never trust a snake not to bite you. If you do, then you are just a fool.
You are the fool here, uncle Basil. You almost hanged papa because of your thick head.
Shut up, boy. If I had done that, it would have been because of your actions.
bad impression on Basil
It is our decision to make
It's easy to say "I decided this and that", but when things go south, will you handle it? It's your responsibility if someone else dies because of this boy.
No, it is my own responsibility. I'm not a wild dog, you know. I know right from wrong.
I doubt that.
All fools deserve a second chance

Just as Luc said it, and he is a wise man. But wisdom alone cannot help the foolish, especially when good people can die because of them. You should well remember this and keep a close watch on this Pierre.

I appreciate you taking the time to teach us how to defend the town. I have to say, the militia that you trained would certainly benefit from having that machine gun you got there to back them up, if you can spare it.
I see you've got a machine gun! I hope you can spare it. We could sure use it to keep those Legion types away.
MachineGunRedirect
The machine gun is yours
Now that's a hell of a weed-wacker. A little grease, a new tripod and it'll be ready to keep those Legion types from sprouting up again.
Ya, mon. Make sure you clean that feed block. She be always hungry, but she be very messy eater.
Why is machine gun leaving?
Hate to see her go, but at least she'll have a good home.
Aw, hell. Was hoping I could play with that a little longer.
Machine gun is better for defense than offense. We will not need. We going to give very great offense.
We'll keep it
Eh, can't blame you for that. It will probably end up killing more Legion marauders in your hands than in ours.
Count on it. I'll make sure she eats right and gets plenty of exercise.
You're goddamn right it will.
Ja. Every time this adorable kitty purrs, I will stroke it and think of you.
Uhhh... Thank you?
Hello, my friends. I appreciate what you have done for us. I really do. But as long as Pierre's bandits still control the old Fort, we'll never be safe.
All my life, I never trusted foreigners. And now some foreigners helped us regain our freedom. Fate loves to challenge our assumptions, huh?
The Legion don't seem like foreigners here. Would you trust them one bit?
You have got a point.
This is how Karma works.
We're here to help.
But I guess what I was trying to say is, uh, thanks. I've been thinking what a grease monkey can do for you, and... I came up with this. It's a bit ugly, but it works. Hope it serves you well.
My nephew says you're the coolest. Well, I can't disagree with the boy. I appreciate you teaching us how to defend ourselves.
It was good to teach people how to defend themselves. I've been teaching businessmen how to throw paint at each other for too long.
Next time those Legion criminals show up, you'll be in good shape to protect yourselves.
They still barely know whether to wipe their watches or wind their arses, so don't thank us yet!
He's a very energetic young man with a lot of stamina. I like that!
Hey, it's learn fast or die young. You feel me?
All you homesteaders are now one mean posse!
I am still wondering if I did the right thing. I suppose I always will. I... I miss him sometimes.
It's okay to miss him. It doesn't mean you did the wrong thing.
Doing what you think is right is one thing. Living with it is another.
That why you keep his body hanging up there?
Sometimes justice demands a sacrifice. I'm sorry for your loss.
Sometimes I feel bad when I see Herman hanging there. Then I remember I almost hanged my old friend Luc because of that weasel.
Context: Conversation GreasyBasil_1 Text *spits on the ground*

Text: Nah. That snitch got what was comin' to him.
Wouldn't shed too many tears for that guy. He was a loser.
You got the right guy. That's all that matters.
In the end, it is a good thing we didn't use that noose. Still... I'm going to leave it up there - it is a good reminder of what we almost did.
That's a good purpose to serve. Makes people think a bit before doing something stupid.
Fidel is sad. Poor useless noose.
Yeah... Just maybe keep the kids away from it, huh?
Good thing you helped the boy with that movie projector of his. It will keep him from doing mischief. I was just too busy to fix it myself.
Only challenge was not to crush it by accident! I mean the projector, not your nephew.
It was my pleasure, but you should know that I cannot be held responsible for the type of movie he might use it to watch.
I used to fix the one back home every time it broke, which was a lot.
What do you want?
Hello, my friends.
Someone was killed?

My friend Tinhay. When the Legion came and started plundering, he shot at Pierre from a sniper's spot. He missed, but they caught him later... If I find the guy who ratted him out, there'll be hell to pay.
What is the story with Pierre?
He took off when he was just a kid and joined the Legion. Came back home recently leading a bunch of marauders. Broke his papa's heart.
You don't do this to your old papa. Family is important. Dolviches know.
I feel that his journey has yet to complete its circle.
Sounds like that little shit's overdue for a spanking.
Luc still loves his son, still sticks up for him, even after Pierre killed our friend Tinhay. Sometimes I'm wondering... But no, Luc wouldn't betray his old friend, would he?
Do you know anything about the President?
Nah, I'm sorry. Politics doesn't concern me. My neighbors and I, we haven't seen anything good coming from the government. The goddamned President can die or live forever, I don't care.
What kind of help do you need?
We don't know how to fight the Legion - there's not a single person here who has military training. I can teach my nephew over there how to fix a gun, but not how to use it.
I can teach you how to use a gun to break a head, and THEN fix it! The gun, I mean.
I know precisely what you mean.
I am very good at both, but not very good at teaching.
If you would help me assemble a militia, we may stand a chance against those bandits.
You got it, partner! Time for training montage.
Assembling a militia is my middle name!
This town needs a security force, no doubt about it.
Is that all the help you need?
Well, some time ago I had buried a few old rifles. I could clean them and do some repairs, but that's hardly enough to defend ourselves.
This works only for one kind of gun. It is Russian.
Couldn't agree more, chief. Any idea where you could find more firepower?
That's not even enough protection for a quickie! Battle, I mean.
I know there should be at least one machine gun left over from the war hidden around the island. If you bring it here, I can fix it up and we can mount it somewhere with a clear field of fire.
Yes! Fidel deserves a machine gun!
But... I was hoping to...
Machine gun and Fidel will be best friends.
I have a better idea. Why don't we just grab the fucking machine gun and fucking kill them all with it, and then keep it for ourselves?
I guess that also works.
Machine gun? Now you're talking my language.
As Mother always likes to say, "There are few problems a machine gun cannot solve".
Help us help you!
I don't know how a poor man can help people like you... I'm not in the business of killing people.
All the better that we excel at that. You can contribute with logistical support.
Leave the perps to us, mister. We will appreciate any material support you can provide.
Well, I work with gizmos and gadgets. See if these are any use to you.
We have found a machine gun
Oh, you're not wasting your time! I hope you can spare that gun. We could sure use it to keep those Legion types away.
From what I know, they store their ammo supplies in the old bunker at The Rust. If you take it from them, they'll have trouble shooting back at some point.
...And then I will crush their tiny heads with my bare hands!
Oh, it's much better when they don't shoot back!
Taking supplies is good. Omryn favors having many supplies.
Have you met Deedee from the Emerald Coast? That wacko is happily supplying the Legion with grenades and all kinds of explosives and just doesn't seem to grasp what the hell is wrong with that.
Uh... What is wrong with that?
Anyway...
Aye, she's a bit addled, but a good lass.
Very much is wrong with that. Explosives are not to be given like candy on holidays!
If you talk sense into her, you should have better chances at the Fort.
Any advice on taking the Fort?
There is another nasty gang around here, Bastien's Family. I'm sure they work with the Legion. I've seen him going towards Flag Hill, probably running some errands for Pierre.
Face like rat? Move like crab? Yes, we have met him.
He seemed nice... in a clutch-my-purse-with-both-hands-while-he-gives-me-a-tour kind of way.
That dude was sketchy as fuck.
What other mercs?
Some buffoons who tried to look tough, but mostly failed. I asked them to give us a hand with just another gang, but they said they were too busy with some important mission they had.
You think maybe they kidnap President?
I don't know.
Other mercenaries? But not tough? I got a creepy-crawly feeling, mon.
Good. Maybe they already kill bad guys and now we have easy job.

They had a shiny new boat with the Adonis logo on it, but I don't think they were the corporate types. I told them they could just hire me to give them a ride - these waters are treacherous - but they didn't listen.
Adonis seem to have their own troops on payroll, why would they need to hire independent mercenaries?
My gut says something's not right here.
I think we should have a talk with that Corazon lady, chief.
Well, I'm available for charter, but I'll make you a deal - if you take care of our problems with the Legion, I can give you a discount on my fee.
Say we kill all Legion here, then we use boat to bring more Legion here and kill them, too. Maybe you give us even bigger discount?
Um... No.
Fidel had to try.
If we kill every fucking last one of 'em, do we get to travel for free?
I'm sorry, but... No. I have to feed my family after all.
Doesn't matter. We'll kill every fucking last one of 'em anyway.
Offering discounts to people who kill your enemies is really a very brilliant marketing strategy! I only hope you never have a competitor.
We'll need a ride
Of course, friends. You have a discount for helping us, you know.
Look, Fidel brought you eight livers from Legion soldiers. Do we get better discount now?
Eurgh... No.
Fidel knew it. Must gather full ten livers before completing quest.

When you're good to go, just open the map and show me the route, and I'll get old Betty gassed up and ready for travel. Keep in mind that once I drop you on the mainland, I'll be heading back home. You can rent another boat from any Port sector on the mainland.
Goodbye, my friends.
Au revoir.
I can see you've already made up your mind, Basil. Nothing I say will change anything.
Your goddamn Pierre has become a monster, yet you still protect him like a baby. And now Tinhay's dead because of it!
You are right, Basil. I have failed both as a father and as a friend. I should have taught my son to...
Context: Conversation GreasyBasil_2 Text resigned sigh; unfinished sentence

Text: Is that all you can think of? He is not YOUR Pierre! Pierre is a vile gangster! Tinhay was a good man! And now he is gone and Pierre walks free and that is why you stand here today with a noose around your neck!
Then do what needs to be done.
You were my friend, Luc. Tinhay was your friend, too. What happened is all your fault.
Do whatever you want. I have outlived my son... There is no reason for me to go on living.
Yes, Pierre is dead, rightfully so. He was a vile gangster and he got what he deserved, but you helped him and now Tinhay is dead because of it. If it wasn't for you...
Enough talk. Do what needs to be done. Me and Pierre, we will be together soon.
GreetingInterjectionsRedirect
Mira, look! They're going to hang him! I wonder if there is going to be popcorn stand? Something? Chocolate? I don't know.
Hey, check out that gallows! Damn near nicest thing they got in this town.
This doesn't look good.
This is fucked up.
What are you staring at, merc? This is village business. It doesn't concern you.
What's going on?
Tinhay, Luc and I - we were best pals. We built this village. Now, Tinhay's dead, because of Luc.

Tinhay hated how the Legion was trying to bully us. So, he tried to take out some of Pierre's men hanging around the town, but missed. Luc would do anything for his damned son! He told them who did the shooting and he doesn't even deny it.
Luc was hanged
Even so, I'm sorry you have to see this. I'm sorry any of us have to be here today. Let's get this over with. Goodbye, Luc. May God have mercy on your soul.
Ehehehee! Look at his feet shake!
This is bad. His spirit will not protect this place. Maybe curse it.
This be horrible. Luc was a good man.
I feel a little sick. I don't want to watch this.
Oh, damn! He really did it!
Fucked. Up.
This action may have major consequences!
Herman did it!
Wait, what?! Herman? Herman, is this true?
I... I don't have to explain myself to you!
WHAT?! Herman, what's going on?

I did it for you, my dear! You were the one who said you couldn't stand it here! Kept nagging me about how we should have gone to Arulco. The beaches! The peace and quiet! Well, that takes money, doesn't it?

You... You idiot! Why?! The one time you decide to listen to me, and you do this stupid thing! 
Basil, please, let him live! He couldn't have known they'd kill Tinhay!
Shut up, Martha! Men! Grab that bastard!
Noooo! Please, don't...
Luc, I'm sorry. I see now it wasn't Pierre you were protecting.

Herman is just a fool, Basil. And I'm the fool that raised a bad seed, and twice the fool for still loving him. But you made a fool of yourself just now, right? Maybe all fools deserve a second chance.
No need to be sorry, Basil. I have no reason to live, now that my son is dead. Leave this fool be and take me instead.
That's nonsense, Luc.
This action may have major consequences!
no one was hanged
Spare Herman
What he did was dumb, but he doesn't deserve to die for it.
Haven't you people seen enough bloodshed?
Cut the guy some slack, will ya? Wait I... didn't mean that the way it came out.
Right. Enough is enough. Herman, you can go, but I don't ever want to see your face again.
But...
Shut up, before he changes his mind, dear, or I'll hang you myself! Come, help me gather our belongings.
This action may have major consequences!
Herman was hanged
Herman should hang
Oh yes, he will! Ratted on Tinhay and was just about to watch Luc hang for his own crime? You're garbage, Herman!
No! Please...
Herman, you will hang until you are dead! Martha, you'd better clear out and never come back.
No! Hang them both! Hang them all!
Seems a bit harsh.
Good. That sniveling little man will get what he deserves.
This drama like American TV. Boring.
Good. Never did like that little creep.
People who rat out pals get frontier justice!
This action may have major consequences!
See? I told you I was the brains of this operation. Now I got me this slammin' shotgun for sale! Whoo!
For sale? I thought you had other reasons for helping us.
I am now questioning the better angels of your nature, Mr. Hue.
Are you trying to sell me a stolen weapon? You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say... Sorry. Reflex. Just... don't do that, okay?
Come on, fellas, you wouldn't even have this opportunity without me. All I'm asking is a, uh... little consideration.
I guess maybe you forgot the part about me and Lurch being old friends? And about him being a bonehead? Who do you think he's gonna believe?
If I tell him to come and search you, he'll obey like a trained puppy. Have you seen how he looks at me?
I think he believes his mother just took the gun, so I think he will believe me when I tell him I saw you stealing it from her.
Easy as pie. I'll tell him you stole the gun from his mamma... and, uh, I might mention you weren't too gentle about it.
Alright, alright, look... I don't want no trouble. I'll give you the gun for half price, okay?
What if we tell Lurch the real story?

I guess maybe you forgot the part about me and Lurch being old friends? And about him being a bonehead? Who do you think he's gonna believe?
I don't like you tryin' to play me like that. Price just went up.
What if we just take it from you?
What if I punch that hollow head of yours and just take the gun?
I don't like a shakedown. It makes me anxious. When I feel anxious, I like to hit people.
Fidel has sudden urge to put grenade into the hole in your head.
That's, um... that's real ugly. I thought we were partners. You shouldn't threaten a partner. The price just went up.
bad impression on Headshot Hue
Well pay $1000
good impression on Headshot Hue
Well pay $2000
Well pay $3000
Yeah, now that's what I'm talking about! Everybody wins, right? I think you'll like that piece. Just be careful with the headshots, know what I'm sayin'? Hehehe.
Well think about it
Yeah, alright, I can wait. I'll be where I'm at. It's cool. It's not like I'm tired and my throat is sore from my dope as hell acting performance or anything.
Guess you had your reasons to shoot my bonehead friend Lurch. Can't blame you, he was a headhunter, too, back in his day... But I can't say it's cool with me.
Aye, now I'm the last headhunter of the Adjani... Get lost. I'm lit as shit.
What's up? Ain't never seen you here before. You like to gamble? I bet you love it. They call me Headshot Hue. You can call me Headshot, or Hue. Just don't call me Headhole. That shit ain't funny.
Hey, hey, look who it is! Still afraid of a little bet?
S'up gangstahs? I been thinking about changing my persona. Gonna start introducing myself as the Russian Roulette world champion! he-he.
S'up playahs? Hey, check it out. I got the bullet that hit my head, right here around my neck. Hair of the dog, he-he.
Yo, for real? Sometimes I envy Lurch. He does what he wants and wants what he does - wipes glasses, pours beer, takes cash. Real simple. Everyone else, we all think too much to be happy.
Oh, hey. I just had this thought come into my head... Aaand now it's gone.
Headshot Hue?
Yeah, that's a wild story, man. I got shot in the head and survived. Now I got this hole that goes right through my brain. Crazy.
You for real or you playin'?
It's the straight dope!
The odds of surviving something like that are astronomical... Fascinating.
Such a thing is possible with chickens. Perhaps you are part chicken.
You don't believe me, do you? Come on, bet some money and I'll show you!
No way, show us!
Headshot Hue does have a hole through his brain
Okay, show us
Headshot Hue does have a hole through his brain
You guys are mercenaries, right? Headhunters? Yeah, that used to be my gig too, but then I took a bullet in the head... See the hole, all the way through!
Context: Conversation HeadshotHue_1 Text performative tone after "Yeah..."

Text: Oh, this is exciting! May I examine it? You should know you are extremely lucky. Bullets almost never make such a precise exit hole. They usually, um, splash up everything as they tumble through tissue.
Yeah, right, I'm the luckiest man alive, that's who I am.
If the bullet passes through unused gray matter, the brain damage can be minimal. I am guessing you have a large quantity of unused gray matter.
I don't think too much about it, Doc.
Only a mind trained in positivity and a fully cleansed aura could defend against such an attack. Tell me, did you have an exceptional bowel movement prior to receiving the wound?
Yeah, hehehe... Wait, you're for real?
Now please pay up. Then we can throw some dice and you'll win your money back in no time!
That is entirely possible
This is very interesting! There is a well-documented similar case with a railroad worker in 1848! I'd like to examine the wound, if that's okay with you.
I've seen soldiers survive it, Woodhead, but they were never, um... quite the same.
Such a thing is possible, though exceedingly rare. Perhaps you have a soft skull.
Oh, uh... I didn't realize y'all were doctors. Damn. Well, look, how about you pay me a fee for taking a peak at it?
We dont care
Come on, don't be like that! Ain't it worth it just for the story? Argh, you're as good as a hole in the head.
Tell us about headhunters

Well, they're like you. Back when the civil war started, this country was straight burning. The police were fighting for one side or the other, so they paid people like me and my boy Lurch to hunt criminals: thieves, murderers, rapists - you name it.
Sounds more like bounty hunting. Mercenary work is mission-based, not head-based.
Sure. You say potato, I say Mr. Potato, right?
Oh, so you are like Old West bounty hunters? Did you have horses?
Check out my man here asking if we had horses. Yo, Lurch, did we have horses?
Paid vigilantes provide vengeance, not justice.
We didn't kill most of them. We just took them back to town so somebody with a badge could do it.

But these days, the scumbags we once hunted down now control the Adjani. All the headhunters are gone. Me and Lurch are the last ones, and we're... retired, but we still got some information that might be useful.
We are not headhunters
Well, you're getting paid to kill those Legion assholes. What's the difference?
We receive funding to conduct military operations and eliminate threats. Headhunters are simply getting paid to pursue and kill offenders.
Uh-huh.
A mercenary is hired to achieve objectives of strategic value. A headhunter's objective has only personal value.
I may have a hole in my head, but even I know all objectives are personal.
The difference is I ain't got no hole in my head.
Well, maybe you ain't been at it long enough.
Whats wrong with Lurch?

Headshot, same as me. That damn bullet ricocheted after it left my head and hit his big noodle, too. But check this out - the dude was wearing a helmet! Must have rung his bell hard, because I can still talk like I always did... but now he's a retard.
You shouldn't use the r-word. That's insensitive.

Words won't cease to exist just because someone is offended by them. As for Lurch, he's a bonehead and he's perfectly okay with that. And don't you try to cross him, or he'll kick your ass retardless how regarded he is. Anyway...
Actually, the accepted term is...

Intellectually disabled. Know what it was before that? Retard. Before that? Moron. Before that? Idiot. And before that? Simpleton. The term ain't the problem, it's the people using it. You think I'm bustin' on my boy Lurch?
Well, n-no, but if that's the case... Say we become friends. Could I refer you to as my n-
No... I'm just messin' with you! But seriously, no. Anyway...

Context: Conversation HeadshotHue_1 Text Reference to The Little Golden Calf - "Maybe this is how it has to be. Maybe in that is the great simple truth."

Text: I say it with love. He's my partner, my boy. It just makes it easier to use one of those old words when I gotta remind him he ain't pissed in a while... Well, fuck it, right? Life is just a big joke. Lady Luck loves to play pranks on people... and so do I.
Tell us what you know
Hey, you got the dough, I got the know!
The plans of the Legion
You mean, aside from their plan to bum rush the Docks? You heard about that, right? Operation N-Night?
Things are easy to hear from the shadows.
Do I look like I don't know what's goin' on?
I suppose I must have, but why not refresh my memory, love?
Everybody knows they comin', and some of us even know the exact date.
Shit, they already sent a bunch of dudes to take Port Cacao and capture Mr. President's sweet little daughter. But I'm guessing you knew that, because you tight with her.
Back in the day, me and my buddy Lurch would have already gone and got his dumb ass. Five thousand bucks in advance, thirty percent discount if you didn't need him alive.
Yeah, yeah, but now you got a hole in your head.
Don't mean I can't put a hole in YOUR head. Don't be thinking I ain't packin'!
But these days... You'll have to go and pick him up yourselves. The Legion's got him in the Major's camp. That's too far for Lurch and me.
Where is the Major?

That dude's been making his location known for a while, like he wants some attention. He's down in the swamps, some place called Camp du Crocodile. I'd be careful about sticking your head in there, hehehe. Seriously, he's a baaad dude.
You trippin'. If he hiding in a damn swamp with crocodiles, he don't sound bad - just dumb.
What?! Dude, are you too young to remember Miami Vice?
That was an alligator. And the dude didn't live in a swamp, he had a pimped-out boat and dressed fresh as hell.
Gamble?
How do you feel about throwing some dice? Maybe a friendly game of Klondike?
But, uh... I'm a little low on funds right now, so I can't put up much of a stake. If you want to give me some money in exchange for some information, maybe you could win it back?
That seems a little suspicious... and yet also very fun!
I smell a hustle.
So, that's the game, huh? I guess we'll see who comes out on top.
Look at you! You got a full crib, fives over fours. And all I got is snake eyes. Not my lucky day, but I guess it's yours. Wanna double up?
Fidel is winning! See? Lucky Fidel!
I ain't trying to get hustled.
Chill, man. It's just a friendly game of dice.
I've seen this hustle before, even run it a few times myself.
Ain't no hustle... just a friendly game of dice.
Must warn you - I once play riverboat gambler in movie. I am very very good at this!
Lady Luck sits upon my lap today!
Bet $50
Your four of a kind beats mine! Damn... You got some luck on you today! Let's double up again.
Hahaa, Fidel is master of the dice!
If my father were here, he would take my money, burn it, and then tell me he saved me some time. Strangely, this makes me want to continue.
Lady Luck is dancing on my lap!
Let's roll some bones, partner!
Bet $100
Well, shoot me in the head! Another win for you!
No one throw like Fidel!
They no call me Six-Shooter Tex for nothing!
Lady Luck is making my pocket swell!
Wow, you sure got some fast hands. Uh... yeah, you won.
I'm sure you meant "lucky hands", right?
Yeah, absolutely. Come on, let's play again.
Oh honey, you haven't seen anything yet. I can make them move so fast it would make your head spin!
Oh... I bet it would.
Yes, it's true. I suspect I have an anxiety disorder, but my father insists that I'm just "fidgety."
Uh-huh.
Bet $200
Looks like luck's with me this time! Go again?
Next time Fidel will throw the dices with special Fidel double throw!
And now I remember why I don't like to gamble. Too many ways to lose.
What a savagely random game. Anyone for a contract or two of Bridge?
Oh, tough break. Hey, you'll win it back on the next toss, right?
Nooooooo! Stupid dices!
I'm better at tossing knives than at tossing dice!
This is dumb game and I am dumb for playing it.
Bet $200
Lets throw dice
Bad luck! Sorry to see it. Want to try again?
Bet $200
What pranks?
Mostly on Lurch. Just harmless fun. His memory is all jumbled up, so stuff that happened twenty years ago could have happened yesterday - it's all the same to him...
I know what you talk about.
Igor is same.
I'm the same way, man, except I also remember stuff that never actually happened.
Hey, you guys want to hear about a prank I'm planning?
About the prank

Lurch has this really cool shotgun over there. It belongs to his mother, the legendary Ma Baxter! He doesn't really need it and I'm sure he's forgotten about it. If I can trick him into giving it to me, maybe I can sell it to you.
You want to steal your best friend's momma's gun and sell it to us? You got a hole in your head or something?
You gonna steal your hommie's piece? Not cool, man.
I'm listening.
Isnt Lurch your friend?

Damn right he is. He's also slow and gets confused a lot. Having that gun around means I got to watch him every second. Take the gun away, and that's a whole lot of messiness I don't got to worry about.
That's good looking out. You think he'll understand?
That is so sweet.... but won't it make him sad? After all, it belonged to his mom.
I hear that. You think he'd be cool with losing it?

I'll take the bonehead being sad for a minute about losing the gun over being dead because he forgot to unload it before cleaning it or some shit. Besides, as soon as it's gone, he probably won't remember it was ever there.
Ma Baxter?
Lurch's mom ran this place back in our headhunter days. Tough lady. You must have heard that old joke by now - "a robber walked into the Rye Bar, but no robber ever walked out."
She died in a big shootout five years ago. The gang she was running with, the Coffee Beans, they split up soon after.
The Coffee Beans?
A bunch of old ladies you do NOT want to cross. Back in their day, they terrorized this town with Ma Baxter, and now they're like the town mascots.
Whats your plan?
Lurch is like a big ugly child. If Ma Baxter walks in and asks him to give over the shotgun, he won't doubt it for a second, even though she's as dead as her son's brain.
Are you planning on reanimating her corpse?
I am curious - are you planning on digging her up, wheeling her in, and operating her like a puppet?
How will you get a dead lady to help you? Please, do not tell me it will be her ghost.
I can do a good impression of her, so all I need to do is look like her. That's her photo. See that curly red hair of hers? That's a wig, very popular back in her day, but very tough to find now.
Where do we find a wig?

Hmm, maybe you can ask around at the junk dealers? And then there's that crazy Baronne something-or-other at the Dump. I'm pretty sure she wears a wig - her "hair" looks exactly like Ma Baxter's. She'd probably sooner die than give it you.
Then Fidel knows how to bring wig!
Oh-no-no-no, wait... You wouldn't murder an old lady for her scalp, would you?
Oh, if only Fidel had nickel for every time he was asked this question. He'd be a rich man!
We have the wig!
What?! HOW? No, don't tell me. Probably safer I don't know.
We have the wig
That's all we need! Now I just need to dress up as Lurch's mom. Wait for me here. It's show time!
Watch your head!
Herman, you dance like a pregnant warthog! Get those knees up!
But I don't understand! I told you what you wanted to know!
Yes, you ratted out your friend. Well done. Now, I want you to dance in a minefield. If you survive, you get paid.
Keep your money, just let me go!...
...Oh sweet Jesus, I think I just stepped on one...
Let him go
Sir, I'm going to have to ask you to cease discharging your firearm at the man in the minefield.
Cut the crap, buttwad. Let him go.
Perhaps it is not my place to say, but I really think you are being very mean to that man.
Fidel likes mines, too! Maybe I take these mines. Maybe you run away while you still have legs!
There's just one fucking mine field between you and me, dumbass. And guess what, my bullets don't need boots to cross it.
Okay, fine. Forget it. Fun's over, I guess. Let's go find some more booze.
Make like a leaf and split!
Cease, desist, and disperse!
All right, fun's over. Take a hike.
Who are you?! No, don't tell me, I don't care. First we kill you, then this rat here.
Merde! Kill them all!
I don't know who you are, but I owe you my life!
Then you must know you are saved by the mighty arms of Bobby Gontarski!
Then take your life back! Realize your potential!
I hope I get medal for this.
Now I got to go home. My wife Martha will be upset. I'll never hear the end of it...
Whats this all about?
The goddamned Legion!
Are you the one that was kidnapped by the Legion?
Yes... They said they will pay me, and now I see what they meant!
What happened?
They came into the village, taking what they please. But then that idiot Tinhay shot at them! They started beating people up and asking questions, so... I told them who did it.
You did what?! You squealed? Daaaamn.
You snitched? Oh, that's not good. I've found it's always better to be a mouse than a rat.
Nobody likes a rat.
I thought they would just slap him around! How could I know they'd shoot him?!
Sure. Hard to imagine armed criminals killing anyone.
Not cool, dude, not cool.
Desperados do not slap. They just shoot.
Then they brought me here and I thought I was a goner...
Tell us...
I wish I could stay and chat, but I really should be getting back to Martha, my wife.
How about Deedee?
Your wife has some questions about that girl Deedee.
Your old lady says you got a side piece named Deedee around here.
Your wife said there is an evil sorceress named Deedee who lives near here.

What about her? Oh, no! Don't tell me my wife is all worked up about that wacko again. She gave me a kiss ONE time when I let her borrow something from the store and Martha won't ever let me forget it. But it was nothing! I would never get anywhere near her blast radius... If you follow me.
Ha, that girl is giving you more goose bumps than all of the bandits together!
Now, she's a fine lassie.
Crazy girls are bad. Crazy girls with bombs are... very, very bad.
She's plain crazy! And, um, I mean, that girl, not my wife. Definitely not my wife.
Honey, as long as you're sure, that's enough for me.
I hear ya, playah.
Riiiiiiight.
Let's keep this thing about Tinhay between us, eh? Everyone in town would get the wrong idea.
What's to get wrong, dude? Ya sold out one of your peeps. Time to face the music.
And we totally shouldn't mention Deedee as well?
What? For the last time, I have nothing to do with her!... Oh Gott, what I have gotten myself into...
I think there is only one idea here, unless I have miscounted.
I completely know what you mean. People can be so judgemental.
See, I know you don't work for free, but I'll reward you when I'm back at my shop... I'll give you everything I've got, just please keep my little secret. Okay?
Okay, we won't tell
Thank you! You've saved my life twice over. Come see me at my shop and I'll give you everything I have.
I like a little bling if I'm not gonna sing, know what I'm sayin'?
Your secret's safe with us, pal!
Well, in that case, I'll be quiet as a... well, you know.
We can't promise
Is there no end to my suffering? Please reconsider. They'll kill me! And if something happens to me, who will look after Martha?
No deal with a rat, dude.
I won't judge you, but it's only right that someone from your town should.
I'm fairly certain that dear Martha can look after herself.

That didn't go quite as expected. The mushrooms must have lost their kick - those bandits should have fallen asleep and never caused that much trouble! I guess I'll need to gather some fresh supplies.

It pains me to know he was attacked because of some cash I left at the mansion... Funny thing, I had completely forgotten about that money. Mr. Luthando brought it back to me, but it's not something I need anymore. Here, you can have it.
reunited the Ghost Butler and the Hermit
Thank you for convincing Mr. Luthando to join me in my solitude. We frail old men, we need to look after each other.
Frail, my ass. You poisoned half the Legion, and he blew up the other half.
Frail? You're the scariest couple of senior citizens I ever met!
I don't think that'll be a problem for you. You're both dangerous as hell and damn tough.

Now I know he was attacked because of some cash I left at the mansion... He told me you tricked him and convinced him that I'm dead so you could get it. I would have given it to you anyway - I don't need money and all the trouble it causes.
Been hearing a lot of nasty rumors about you, the types of things that stink of an Adonis smear job. I'm not quick to believe them - after all, I am well grounded in the art of mushroom management.
Would you like to try my special mushroom stew with exotic herbs? It's a once in a lifetime experience!
Is it safe to eat?
It is made from completely natural, non-GMO, gluten-free ingredients!
Any meat in there?
Definitely not.
It is okay. I have my own.
Not my favorite ingredients, but I do love a good stew!
Sounds delicious!
You first!

Don't worry. It isn't poisonous - well, not TOO poisonous. But then, my stomach is quite accustomed to the gifts of Mother Nature. I never get sick from my stew, just reeeeeally trippy. And this stew is... mmm, spicy in a very... mmm, transcendental way.
Hey, stop it, man, leave some for me!
Nope. No way. Not interested. Well... maybe just a taste.
Many poisons can bring one right to the doorstep of death. Let me get my spoon.
Fascinating. Many natural remedies can cure as easily as kill. The measurement is critical. Where did you study?
The University of Life, my good dude. Look around. We're sitting in the main lecture hall.
The stew... makes you look and, mmm, see into the great Beyond. God, my hands are huuuge.
Yes, why not
Here, have some. I hope you don't mind using my spoon. I just have the one.
Ew! I have my own spork.
You haven't licked it very well. Mmm, that's how you do it... Hey man, who turned up the volume on the sun?
Mmm, it's good. I think I know this taste... It tastes like... mmm, velociraptor steak.
Good meal. You have more?
Not bad, man! Could use a little salt and a few red pepper flakes, but this is good! Hey, you all right? Your face is melting.
It's... it's wonderful. I can see the doorway to the other side. I AM the doorway to the other side.
Maybe no second helping for you.
Eat mushroom stew
No, thank you very much
Suit yourself. Just means more for me!
Awww, man! C'mon...
Very rude to refuse gift of food, glavny.
Oh, don't let us stop you. Just know I have epinephrine if you need it.
Good day to you! I hope you are eating healthy food.
Try this tea and tell me when you see the dancing lights behind your eyelids!
I'm so glad that Mr. Luthando is with me. Finally, someone to appreciate my mushroom recipes!
Gained a clue about the Hermit
So you are life coaching the Legion?!
I did give them a valuable life lesson, even though their lives didn't last for very long. However, I have no pity for such bandits ever since people like them burned my home ten years ago.
I am a life coach, too! The power of positive thinking can unlock so much potential!
Well, I use mushrooms to unlock potential hallucinations, but... Yeah. Kinda the same thing.
You give bad trips to snapperheads. I dig it.
A sneaky sort of payback. I like it.
This wasnt the first trouble you took care of

Indeed, it was not! After decades swimming with sharks in big corporate business, deceiving a bunch of third world criminals into poisoning themselves every now and again isn't even a challenge... and much more rewarding.
This guy. This guy right here? Little scary, not gonna lie.
You are the vengeful spirit of the forest!
That's a little more romantic than I would put it, but I like it.
Right there with ya. I guide high-powered execs through paintball battles and I've lost count of the times I wished I had a real gun on me.
Wouldn't have done much good. Shoot one VP down and eight junior execs sprout up in his place.
Gained a clue about the Hermit
Do you want us to gather mushrooms for you?
What? No, why would I?
You are an old man living in a cottage! You must be a wizard who needs our help to stop some evil sorcerer! Unless you ARE the evil sorcerer...
The only magic I have is from the gifts of Mother Nature. Is she evil?
Well, you're an old man living in a cottage who just said he needs some fresh supplies. So, do we have to gather ten poisonous Amanitas or something?
I was hoping you would teach us how to find some SPECIAL 'shrooms, if you get what I mean.
Hmm... I think maybe you could stand to cut back a little.
Anyway, I know well enough which mushrooms and herbs are usable and in what way. I don't need help, but thank you for asking.
Are you a herbalist?

I'm just an old man with a lot of free time for reading. Besides, I live close to nature, which means I developed a good understanding of which plants are good for tea and which ones shouldn't be used to wipe your ass.
Do you have any magical herbs?
They're all magical, in their own special way.
Your wisdom humbles me.
Tea? I'm listening.
Tea leaves? Good show, old chap! I'm always on the prowl for a new brew, eh what?
I can give you some medicinal herbs, if that's what you're looking for. You still trust me after what happened to those bandits?
Can we trust you?
I don't know. Can you?
You did poison those bandits, but it was a poisoning in self-defense, if we're being completely honest.
That's what we're attempting to establish, sir.
Feels like I'm talking to one of my exes.
Poison us and you will die
I know that if I poison you, I will surely die one day.
Yeah, and "one day" could be today, old man.
Like Mother always says, "There is no doubt that you will die, so eat a cookie."
Not quite the response I was hoping for.
Yes, we trust you
Good for me!
Yes, we can recognize which herbs are safe
Good for you!
Here, help yourselves. These flowers have anti-inflammatory properties, and this beauty here is a powerful pain killer. Chewing just one leaf will help you smile away the pain for a whole day.
It's awesome, man! I've already eaten five leaves and a blossom!
I guess you will have some new experiences.
I doubt that.
Leaves? Flowers? Thanks, but I'll stick with aspirin.
The gifts of Mother Nature are very powerful indeed. I thank you.
Mushroom management?
"Feed them shit and keep them in the dark." That's a little strategy I learned from Adonis. Seems like they're still doing it - and now you, my friends, are neck deep in it.
Disgusting, but not inaccurate.
Not to worry. I bring shovel and toilet paper.
That is a fair assessment of our situation. Revolting, but fair.
You were a CEO?

Why, yes. I worked for a diamond industry giant. We were prospecting the diamond deposits along the Adjani when the civil war broke out. I lost my family in the fighting. After that, I just dropped everything and walked away.
That is terrible. I am sorry for your loss.
Sorry to hear that. May they rest in peace.
My condolences on your loss. War always hits the innocent the hardest.
Did you work for Adonis?!

Oh, you know them? Well, let me see if I can put two and two together here. They are trying to get back in business and they hired you to do the heavy lifting. I've been wondering how involved they were in this mess with the Legion.
Heavy is the only kind of lifting I do!
Not sure if it be their mess, but they be paying us to clean it up.
They're all kinds of sketchy, but they pay good, so who the hell cares?
Truth be told, I don't really care. I walked away from Adonis and I plan on staying away.
Do you know Corazon Santiago?
That who hired you? She's in charge now, huh? I guess that figures. She was my assistant for a while. Very ambitious, very promising. I never liked her.
I think she's quite charming!
I wouldn't say she is exactly chummy, but she seems like a very capable woman.
Cannae trust ambitious women! They always want things.

I'm a simple hermit who had enough of modern life and decided to start living in peace and harmony with Mother Nature. And when modern life sends troubles to me, toting guns and trying to look mean, I go ahead and life coach them to death.
Could have sworn I knew all the ways to kill someone, but that's a new one.
Oh! That is great movie title! Life Coach: He Will Coach the Life Right Out of You!
Life coach them... to death? I am not one hundred percent sure you are using that term correctly.
Who are you, really?

Well, I am certain who I am not. I am no longer Mike Ditch, the CEO asshole... Now I'm just a hermit who enjoys the simple pleasures in life, such as poisoning those bandits and then lecturing them about the benefits of a healthy lifestyle.
Right on! "Don't live in denial of a healthy lifestyle" is one of my mantras.
Dr. Kronenberg did the same thing with me! It, ummm, definitely gets the point across.
Bleh. I hate being lectured. And poisoned, too, in case that was at all unclear.
Since people like them burned my mansion across the river and killed everyone, I decided to drop everything and just retire here in the jungle.
Your friend the Butler is still alive!

What? My dear Mr. Luthando is alive? How is that possible? I thought that the mansion was in ruins! Do you think he would like to come visit me? I... don't think I can go back to that sad place myself.
Don't blame you! It is very sad! And very scary!
Don't know, but you're gonna owe him a shit-ton of back pay, that's for damn sure!
I feel the same way about LA, but I keep going back.
Corazon framed us

I always suspected that Adonis had something to do with this mess. Things were looking good. Grand Chien was just about to become a peaceful country, and then someone with an awful lot of money decides they need more and pushes things back into chaos.
A tale as old as time.
It sucks, but it does give people like us job opportunities.
Such is the work of Shaitan and his followers.
And Corazon... This is just like her. Chaos was always her element, even back when she was just my assistant. If an opportunity didn't exist, she'd create one, consequences be damned.
Can you help us?
What can I do? I'm just an old man who has given up on the world. I don't even have my archive with me. It must have burned with my mansion ten years ago.
Pardon the intrusion, Mr. Ditch, but your archive is safe. Here, I have brought it with me. I knew you would need it one day.
Well, well! Let me see! Oh, everything is there! Mr. Luthando, you are pure gold. I think we will be able to provide our friends with some spicy documentation about Adonis and our little Corazon.
Gained a piece of evidence against Corazon
Remember - you are what you eat!
Nope. I have never eaten an asshole.
That would be a lot of things. Good thing "a whole person" is one of them!
Uh... What?!
...What?
Indeed. This is why I only eat properly prepared and well-balanced dishes.
It is true. Omryn is part reindeer.
Ooooh! My favorite meal is fresh warm pie! What does that say about me?
Nope. Not touching that one.
Stay healthy!

I heard you cubs tracked down and killed that maniac, Flay. I hope his carcass is torn to shreds by animals and shit out all over the Savannah. Hyeee-hehehe! C'est bien. I had my doubts as to whether you could do it.
Me too.
They don't call me Hitman for nothing. Now, how about we talk money?
About your payment... Those Legion marauders have nearly bled us dry, but we'll spare what we can for you.
You can do better
And the Legion won't be bothering you anymore either. That calls for something extra.
Poaching is illegal. You should be happy we don't bring you in ourselves.
Perhaps we can come to an arrangement that will satisfy a number of well-armed fellas who have just gotten you out of your predicament.
Okay, okay. This is all we have right now.
Its okay
Here, your well-earned money!
Damn you, cubs! I almost pissed my pants. Hyeee-hehehe!
Me too.
Steady on, old chap.
Nothing to fear! Igor is here!
Hey, man, don't sweat it. I pee my pants all the time.
C'est bien. We can use his carcass to lure scavengers away from the camp. Here is your money. You earned it!
What is this?! Why have you brought him here? That wasn't the deal. I said I wanted him dead.
Yes, that was the plan!
Putain de merde! You brought me here so this poacher could have the final kill shot? Cowards! All of you! Cowards!
No, he is working for us
Working with you? To do what - murder more of my men?
He is done with that. People can change.
Do not worry! He has repented his sins!
Be cool, man. He ain't about that no more.
We've given him bigger game to hunt.
I... I won't pay you!
Oh really? What if I change my mind, eh? I can finish my hunt right here, slaughter the whole herd of you buckheads.
Even better!
Works for me.
One way or the other, the Reaper takes his toll.
Okay, okay! Just calm down. As long as the killing stops, that's all I care about. Here's the money. Take it.
So, I heard you... recruited Flay? It was my understanding you would kill this maniac, not add him to your team!
He works for us now. He won't be bothering you again.
Do not worry! He has repented his sins!
He is done with that. People can change.
We've given him bigger game to hunt.
Well, at least you didn't bring him here. He's your problem now. Here is your payment - take it and feel free to leave.
So, I heard you came to an... arrangement with Flay? It was my understanding you would kill this maniac!
Only if we had to. Don't worry. He won't bother you again.
Well, I guess as long as he won't be hunting hunters anymore, that's all I care about. Here is your payment.
What have you done? Now their Legion friends will come around and shoot every last one of us! And I thought that Flay was our only problem...
Have you managed to track down the bastard?
My friends! So good to see you again! Come. Sit. Stay a while. Let's talk.
Sounds like someone's settin' up to ask us for a favor.
What's got you feeling so friendly, Hyena?
Brilliant! I was just thinking it was time for a spot of tea.
Cut the malarkey, Hyena. What's on your mind?
Ja. Good idea. I need to stop and get the rocks out of my boots and let my toes breathe, anyway.
Why do I get the feeling the topic of conversation isn't going to be my aunt's new cat?
A little bird told me you are connected with the Boss in Fleatown.
Here it comes.
And you want us to arrange an introduction.
I don't like talking birds. They make me nervous.
Maybe we are, maybe we aren't.
It's these damn smugglers! They are skinning me alive with their prices on supplies... excuse the pun, hyeee-hehehe!
That was awful.
But if you can arrange a deal for me with the Boss directly, I would be happy to slide some of my profits his way. Would mean some money for you as well, if he likes it.
Told you.
Not interested
Well, that is unfortunate.
Okay, we can arrange that
Really? Hyeee-hehehe! Thank you! Here, this is for your help.
Actually, we're in charge now
I thought so! I heard the rumor, but did not want to announce it in case you wanted to keep it secret. Here, take this. Nice doing business with you!
I have nothing to say to you. Just keep moving along... you creepy, man-hunting psychos.
Just be glad I'm no longer hunting you, buckhead!
Hello there, master hunters! Always nice to see you.
Well take care of the Legion
Sure, as long as someone pays you, I bet. And when the money runs out? What then? It's defenseless people like us that will be left to suffer!
Youre a bunch of cowards
Yep. But there are worse things than being a coward. Being dead is one of them. Hyeee-hehehe!
Got news for you. Cowards aren't any more immune to bullets than anyone else.
Eh... Yes, sir. It was just a little joke. Hyeee-hehehe! What is it you wanted to know again?
You should be afraid of us
Nah, you're the good guys. Hyeee-hehehe!
I'm starting to understand the motivation of this "Flay".
You're defenseless?
Of course we are! What can we do against armed criminals like the Legion?
You've got guns and judging by all the animal carcasses around here, you know how to use them!
Hunting rifles don't exactly measure up against assault rifles. Besides, the last guys who tried to oppose the Legion around here didn't end up in such a good way.
Not likely to forget that one! There was some mercenary like you that almost got me killed! Several Legion thugs were transporting him to Camp Savane and stopped here for a quick shakedown...

And that idiot must have been bombed out of his mind! He could barely stand up and his eyes were bloodshot and crazy! Still, he called out to me like he knew me! Yelled something like "Beef! How are you, ya old fart?"
Beef? I think you mean Biff.
Five'll get you ten he means Biff.
Beef is Biff. Is clear as glass.
Legion almost shot me dead on the spot! The asshole admitted his mistake, but I'd already peed my pants twice over! Hyeee-hehehe!
Don't you recognize me, man?
Well I'll be damned! So it all ended up well?
Well like a wishing well! But I wish you didn't just call me names, man.
Ugh... I'm sorry.
No problem, man. Make sure you wash your pants.
Who opposed the Legion?
Someone who wasn't a coward like us, apparently. Hyeee-hehehe!
Tell us who opposed the Legion!
What is "Flay"?
Not "what", "who". There is a maniac who is hunting my men, one by one, and killing them like... like game! His name is Flay.
He is hunting the hunters? Interesting.
Please, find Flay and kill him. You'll be doing the world a favor, and I'll pay you, of course! Here, I'll mark on your map his hunting grounds.
Any more details about Flay?
He appeared some time ago, hunted with us for a week and grumbled all the time about us being "amateurs".
I'm guessing he was not just referring to your lack of hunting licences.
Judging by the scarring on some of these pelts, he wasn't wrong.
So, he considers himself an expert on how to kill, huh? I look forward to meeting him.
Then he left for good. We were happy to see him go... But then my people started disappearing. When we started finding the bodies... No, I can't describe it.
A body tells many stories about its own death. Please, continue.
Why? Is it gross? Maybe I don't need to hear this part.
Please, I know it isn't easy, but any details could be important.
How do you know it's Flay?
Each... each one has trophy horns nailed to their heads. That damn maniac! When he was with us, he used to joke around about doing such things. I guess he wasn't kidding after all.
Seems like my man has a sense of style.
Yo, man... that? That is fucked up.
Gained a clue about Flay
Remind us about Flay
He appeared some time ago, hunted with us for a while and then he left. Shortly after, he started hunting down my men, killing them and nailing trophy horns to their heads. I want him killed.
Oh, yes, I have seen these around. I like the way the girl is holding the rifle. Makes me want to do something productive with my hands, if you catch my meaning. Hyeee-hehehe!
Hammers and cycles are dumb! You want inspiration, just look at my biceps!
What's this? Oh, stories, huh? That's good. It gets boring at night. Maybe one of the others can read aloud to us.
Ya, they are stories all right - stupid fairy tales about communism meant for stupid children!
Give a propaganda pamphlet
You cant read, can you?
No, nothing like that! I just don't have a good reading voice. Hyeee-hehehe!.
It's directions to buried treasure
It's a treasure map of the, uh, commies' treasure! But with coded directions. See the hammer and sickle? They indicate the spot.
Directions, huh? Seems like A LOT of directions... Okay, I'll give you cash for it.
Maquis Manifesto
It's not important
No, no, don't bother explaining. We can always make use of good paper like this. You know, savanna plants have rough leaves.
Good luck and good hunting! Kill that bastard!
Well, good hunting!
Greetings. Do you have moneys?
What for?
Moneys are used to buy junk.
Tell us something we don't know
Foolish person know, wise person ask. You ask and I tell you this: Frdric Le Furet has moneys.
You take from him. No one cry for Frdric.
Sir, I'm going to have to caution you against soliciting us to commit a crime.
Perhaps except for the poor chap himself, I imagine.
Well, no one except poor old Freddy, I bet.
What money?
Wise question. I, Itsadi, seek paper moneys of Grand Chien. They are good for Itsadi.
This is very strange. The Grand Chien Frank is currently worth less than my toe nail clippings... And no, you may not have those.
You sure? The GC Frank isn't even worth the paper it's printed on, chief.
Paper is not good to eat. Rat or squirrel is much better. You know about rat jerky? I show you.
good impression on Itsadi the Fisher
Anything can be money
My half-eaten lunch is worth more than a bag of Grand Chien Franks!
Let go of the pursuit of profit. Instead, try pursing your potential!
You perceive worth where none exists. You are either delusional or simply foolish.
You have wisdom. But you have no moneys.
Then where is your bags of Grand Chien Franks? You lie.
Yes, we have money
Lovely Franks! Good. Now you buy. Shop is open.
No money
We just want to talk
You talk. Good for you.
Good morning.
Good morning. You have moneys?
It's not morning
There is always mornings some place in the world.
That's beautiful, man.
I used to say "It's five o'clock somewhere" all the time. Wow, I'm really thirsty all of a sudden.
It is also high noon some place on world. Oh, that make for good movie title!
Itsadi is the Fisher. Itsadi fishes junk.
Then I reckon you'd catch a lot in my backyard. Uh... that ain't no invitation. I catch you fishing my junk, I blow your head clean off!
One man's junk is another man's fish.
Good for you, mon! Junkyard be one of my very favorite places.
Teach us fishing
Itsadi sell junk, you have junk for one day. Itsadi teach fishing, you have junk for life and never buy junk with moneys. No, Itsadi never teach fishing.
Why take only local currency?
Itsadi has no need of other moneys but Grand Chien paper moneys. Itsadi has all the junk, but not enough moneys. Moneys have good use.
What's wrong with the good ol' American greenback?!
I give you rubles. Very useful. I have bought many vodkas with rubles.
My good man, I assure you that there is nothing more useful than the Queen's own currency - the British Pound Sterling.
Your moneys are weak, because they come in small number. But Grand Chien moneys are strong! Itsadi gets whole bag of money for junk!
Why do you need that money?
Grand Chien moneys make best wall paper. Good strong paper, even against water or mold. People make moneys and give Itsadi more good junk. Make Itsadi rich man.
If he's rich, he sure does disguise it well.
Context: Conversation Itsadi_1 Text said under his breath

Text: I think ye got some water or mold in yer head!
For real? You livin' that Cristal and Courvoisier life? Damn... Guess I'm in the wrong business.
Where can we find more money for you?
If you must have Grand Chien Franks, then at least tell us where to find them. I haven't seen a single bank since we arrived.
What would be a good way for us to get a lot of cash quickly? Please don't say "rob a bank".
And where might we acquire Grand Chien Franks? Mind you, we're not terribly keen on picking through the trash... er, no offense.
Any ideas on where I can find some Franks? I'm just sooo eager to get my hands on your junk!
Sometimes people are very careless and leave a large pile of money in a place anyone could find it, like a wall safe or an ATM. Anything like that around here?
Just tell me where I can score this dough you lookin' for so we can get down to business.
Frdric Le Furet has moneys here in city. The Major has moneys in his camp.
You know where the Major's camp is?!
Itsadi know many things. Major has camp in mountains, in House of Eagle. Itsadi show on map and you bring moneys.
We find a blessing where we least expect it. We should attack while fortune favors us.
Well, look at that! Gosh, it's sure lucky we ran into you.
That's the Major's camp? Do you know if the President is there?
Itsadi does not know this. Itsadi only knows location of bag of moneys.
That is a very specific talent you have, love.
Itsadi is aware, yes.
What do you have for sale?
Itsadi has junk, if you have moneys.
Context: Conversation Itsadi_1 Text reference to Skyrim - "Khajit has wares, if you have coin"

Text: TradeRedirect
Go on in, pick your junk and give Itsadi one bag of moneys. Then you take your junk.
This is not good for business. Tell them this: make garbage, not war. The junk must flow.
You got Knights fighting Nobles over there, Woodhouse. It's a regular War of the Roses, except the roses smell like old grease traps.
It is a very peculiar situation, like something from a science fiction novel. By some chance, do you have ability to control big worms?
You got a real Donnybrook going on over there, mate.
There is a conflict at the Dump
People come and people go, but garbage remains forever.
Context: Conversation Itsadi_1 Text Bible Ecclesiastes reference

Text: I detest people who refuse to pick up after themselves. They should be rounded up and put in... Never mind.
Speaking as someone who's had plenty of garbage thrown at her, I know exactly what you mean.
I sometimes dream of a world relieved of the burden of humanity... I said that out loud, didn't I?
Tonight, Itsadi will go and see with his own eyes. Meet Itsadi there, and he will give judgement.
Good buy.
Why have you attacked my prison? You have committed a criminal act against a legitimate Grand Chien detainment facility. The authorities will hear of this!
If you are here to free someone, then get on with it. But be warned, if you release any of these criminals, there will be dire consequences.
My name is Jacques Marteau and I am the director of the Adjani State Prison. I'm a public servant and you have no right to attack my people or this institution!
