You just take the middle part of that and you could be talking about any one of my nieces.
She's had her eye on my Herman for a while now. Wouldn't surprise me if she sent those thugs to kidnap him for her!
Well, that sounds a little far fetched.
I be strongly doubting it.
An evil sorceress who kidnaps young men! I have heard of such things.
Emerald Coast?
It's a nice stretch of beach and sand dunes. Herman and I were planning to build a cottage up there, but we found out the place is littered with land mines.
A few mines never hurt anybody! I mean, mostly anybody.
This is so true! Good real estate is very hard to find.
Minefields always make me so tired.
I do not like minelayers. They never pick up after themselves.
And I'm sure it is all her doing! That harlot!
This is none of our business
But... he could be hurt, or... worse! He may be seduced by some other woman! Isn't there anything you can do?
We're not private investigators. We don't track down cheating husbands.
He better not be cheating on me!!! But if he is, I'll kill him personally!
He's probably dead...
You should consider the possibility that instead of flirting with some girl, he may be dead.
Hate to break it to you, but by now he's probably takin' a dirt nap.
This Herman guy is probably dead, but we could find his body if you want.
What a cruel thing to say! I don't know why I thought you'd be different from those Legion thugs, but I want nothing to do with you from now on.
Calm down, woman, we'll see what we can do.
Calm down?! DON'T TELL ME TO CALM DOWN!!!
What about the President?
What president? Oh, come on. My man's missing, I don't care about politics!
If Herman has been cheating on me, I want to be the one to kill him.
I need to get back to work. Please tell me if you learn something about my man.
Well, look who it is - the mercenaries that got us kicked out of Ernie! Here to cause more trouble for us? Our lives are ruined and it's all your fault!
Umm... But, darling...
Don't you "darling" me, Herman! It's all your fault as well!
Yes, dear.
You again! We are stuck in this hellhole because of you!
What do you want? Are you here to mock us?!
It was Herman's fault
My Herman did what he had to do to save the town! Those people should have thanked us!
Yes, how could I have known they would kill...
Oh, just shut up, Herman. You SHOULD have known!
Of course, dear.
How did you end up here?
There was a man in Fleatown who promised us tickets to Arulco. Accommodations and a job opportunity included! He requested upfront payment and my gullible husband couldn't wait to agree!
But, honey, it was your idea...
You should have checked him out! I closed the deal because I assumed you verified he was legitimate! I should have known the only things you were paying attention to were the girls at the dock!
You told me to watch the luggage...
I won't listen to your excuses! Now we are stuck here with no money and no tickets, all because of you and these stupid mercenaries!
Well help you with money
Of course you will! That's exactly the kind of... Wait. Did you say you'd help us?
Really? You will help us out?
I... I don't know what to say...
Now that's something!
Shut up, Herman!...
Yes, darling.
Well, I suppose it's the least you could do after the mess you mercenaries made in Ernie. It's nice to know you're not completely incapable of doing the right thing. Come along, Herman.
A mine?! We're shopkeepers, not filthy hole diggers! After all we've been through...
Martha... Shut up.
WHAT?! I will not shut up and you are in no position to...
SHUT. UP. These people are giving us a second chance, can't you see? We can start a new life and make up for the mistakes of the past.
Well, you picked a fine time to grow a backbone! You'll need one for all the digging you'll be doing! Oh, Herman... What about Arulco?
Arulco can wait.
Thank you, mercenaries. We'll be happy to work for you. That is, I'll be happy to work and Martha will be happy to have a whole new set of things to complain about.
We can give you jobs in a mine
Was this your plan all along? First, you turn us into beggars and then you force us into slave labor? Sickening! It's almost enough to make me want to join those ridiculous Maquis communists!
Actually, I hear they do have a good health plan.
Cant help you
Of course, you can't! Stick to your strengths - destroying peoples' lives and forcing them to rot in some god-forsaken refugee camp!
Maquis Manifesto
Maquis Manifesto
No, thanks, we don't need any propaganda pamph... Oh, woah!
What is this? HERMAAAN?!? Why are you looking at those filthy pictures?! You have no shame, you pig!
But, darling, I was not looking at the pictures! I was interested in this nice pair of, um... political articles!
Give me that!
Maquis Manifesto
Is that how you will make up for destroying our lives?! Fill our heads with communist propaganda?
Yes, we are not so easy to fool!
Shut up, Herman. Of all people, you are the easiest to fool.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Good riddance!
What do I do now? Do you think Maman will take me back?
If you're lookin' for a new boyfriend, I'm available.
You have a chance to walk away from all this and you want to go back to being a working girl? That be crazy.
I'm going back to the brothel. It's not the life I wanted, but... they are the only family I have now.
No! Smiley! What have you done? Look what you have done!
You are not without blame here, girl. Maybe if you weren't so dependent on men this kind of thing wouldn't happen.
When it comes to women, boys are always so eager to start shooting their guns off.
I really think if you look at the sequence of events in detail you will find that I am not the one to blame. Not completely, anyway.
Smiley, you fool! Why didn't you stay away? I never wanted you to die! I just wanted a better life for me, and now I am being punished for that...
Somehow I doubt you're the one being punished here.
Sorry, love. Never underestimate the stupid things a man will do for lust.
How could you just kill my Booboo?!
What can I tell you, bambina - I have talent!
Why... Why would you do that?!
You can't make pasta without breaking a few heads, ragazza!
It was his time.
We do what we must because we can.
Context: Conversation Mollie_1 Text reference to "Still Alive" (the Portal song)

Text: How could you just let my Booboo die?!
"Booboo" was a gangster, honey. This is how they always end up.
It was easy! Here. I show you.
All Alone Redirect
What do I do now?! I'm all alone in this world...
In a magnificent mansion, all by yourself, wiping your tears with money. Poor, poor girl.
All alone in this huge kitschy mansion. Poor, poor girl.
If you're lookin' for a new boyfriend, I'm available.
You have me, ragazza!
I'd rather be dead!
Get away from me, you monsters!
What have you done?! Booboo! Are you okay?
Ugh... I'm fine. Did your... Maman send those people?
No! She would never do that! Oh, my poor Booboo!...
What do you want from us?! Please leave us alone!
Hello! You look a lot like those Commandos in Pantagruel! Could you be friends with... No, I guess the world can't be that small.
Who are you talking to, my love?
I... don't know. Some people. I think they are searching for you.
Hmm, we'll see about that.
Oh, hey! You... remind me of someone. Are you friends with Smiley?
Shush, do not anger Booboo. He has bad digestion when he is annoyed.
A few questions...
Okay, but...
Mollie? Do you know where my antacids are?
Wait, it is about Smiley!
Ohhh... My poor Smiley! What's wrong with him? Is he alright? Is he still hiding?
Make yourselves comfortable! The friends of Booboo are my friends as well!
In that case, I will have a roast beef sandwich.
Oh, I... Well, I will go see what we have.
"Friends with Booboo" was the name of my band in high school.
Who are you?

You don't recognize me? Oh, but you are new to the Adjani Valley, n'est ce pas? I am the Carnival Queen of Pantagruel! They were carrying me on the throne with flowers and everything!... It was just before I ran away with Smiley, and, well...
Wait, are you his friends? You look like mercenaries, same as Smiley. Are you also from M.E.R.C.? He told me they were the best mercenaries!
Some may have a different opinion on that.
Ha! The best at getting the crap kicked out of 'em, maybe!
They're a bunch of dweebs running around playing soldier.
They are incompetent fools.
Maman is missing you
And I miss her too! Terribly! But you see, I like my new life here with Booboo.
Don't blame you. This crib is phat.
Looks to me like you just traded one cage for another.
Are you the whore from Le Lys Rouge?
Heeey! I'm not just a whore! I am a person!...
Oh, I'm sorry, miss, we didn't mean to...
Umm, uh, sorry. Guess that did sound kinda mean.
And besides, I'm much better than those other girls. I am the Carnival Queen after all!
Let's not get carried away, okay? Something about putting makeup on a pig?
Oh yeah? At least I know how to put on makeup! You've got more foundation than a construction site!
It's the celebration. Carnival? You know, the Throne of flowers, the crowds, the parties? I'm sure you must have heard of it.
I guess we've got a lot to learn from you. Are you giving private lessons?
That's all behind me. Er, I mean, that's in my past.
Booboo?...
Yes! I mean Boss Blaubert, of course! But to me, he's my sweety-meaty Booboo-bear!
Eeew.
That sounds lovely.
Oh come on.
Sweety-meaty?
He is very special to me, and I'm his one and only... But I wish he was more open with me. I guess a man like him has a lot of secrets to keep, even from the love of his life, right?
Context: Conversation Mollie_1 Text sighs after "one and only love"

Text: I don't know. There are just times I ask him questions and he doesn't answer or pretends not to hear. I'm sure it is nothing.
Everyone is hiding something. Most aren't that great at it.
Perhaps his ears produce an over abundance of wax and he cannot hear you. That happens to me sometimes.
Take it from a guy who's had eight wives: it's something.
Boss Blaubert keeps secrets from you?
I'm sure it's nothing. I mean, a man who loves his woman wouldn't hide anything important from her!
Oh, my sweet summer child...
I know some detectives in the SVU who would strongly beg to differ.
Yet, if I may, a discreet gentleman knows which parts of himself to keep hidden from those he cares not to offend. Er, if you take my meaning.
Everyone has their naughty little secrets. I keep mine in a tight little box. No one is allowed in without permission.
Oh, but everyone has secrets! That is why I learned hacking and lock-picking. Otherwise, I would have no idea what is going on in this world!
Every man out there got at least one secret he keeps from his old lady. Don't worry. Most times, it's just his collection of nudey mags.

...But then again, he avoids my questions about that globe in the living room. It's password protected and he refuses to even let me try to guess it! Can you unlock it and see what's in there? Please? I'm dying to find out!
As my mother likes to say, "Don't go looking for secrets, you'll only find dead bodies." I look anyways, and just pretend I don't notice the bodies.
It's probably incriminating evidence that he's a serial killer. Or maybe just porn. Hopefully not both.
In case we find the remains of his previous girlfriends in there, you might want a few hiding spots picked out for yourself.
Yes we are
Pals for life.
Aye, we're mates.
Yep. Best buds.
We prefer the term "associates".
Oh! Good! I hope he's okay. I... I had to leave in a bit of a hurry.
Honey? Do you know where my suspenders are? Lately I just can't find anything...

Yes, Booboo! I'm coming!
...Sorry, can't talk right now.
Gained a clue about Smiley
Where is Smiley now?
Oh, I'm... not sure. I hoped you could tell me. I wonder if the holy man is still hiding him.
Gained a clue about Smiley
Who the hell is Smiley?
Oh, I... thought you were someone else. I shouldn't be speaking with you...
See you around!...
Honey? Who are you talking to?
Oh! No one! I mean, some old friends brought news of Maman Liliane! They were just leaving, Booboo!
They better be.
Okay, nice to see you and so on, but Booboo needs my attention. Bye!
Please feel free to take a look around and enjoy our mansion!
Or maybe you're not cadavrs? I must be getting the hallucinations again. Got to stop drinking this merde and find some stronger merde to drink.
A monster who talks and drinks? Hmmm... Do you have a name?

Context: Conversation Monday_1 Text (sounds of gulping from a bottle)

Text: Hello? Are you friendly?
You still there? I guess this merde is merde, too.
helped Monday and the Grimer Hamlet
Yeah! We have the merde, we have the people... You know what you get when you put together the merde AND the people?
Good times!
Hangover!
Noise complaints.
Regret.
A lot of ruined linens.
A good, old-fashioned ho-down, partner!
Party! Forever! Never stop the party. Never turn into cadavr! Not this Monday! Not ever!
We really deserve a medal this time.
So, the curse is lifted?
This isn't a curse. This is a blessing! I will stay drunk FOREVER!
Forever party will need steady supply of snacks. I supervise.
I see you saved some people. Now we need some more merde... moonshine, and then we can party forever! Never turn into cadavr. Not this Monday! Not today!
Do not worry, mister monster. We will save everyone!
This is noble cause!
RedirectKilledBella

You killed her? You killed her!!! Good riddance! She was trash, and not even good-looking trash these days. But you know what that means? That means you secured ALL THE MERDE! Yeah! All that moonshine! Time for a party!
Oh yeah! Give me a syringe, I'll show you a trick or two.
I'm actually not allowed to be within thirty feet of a party. Sorry.
Does this mean the curse is lifted?
You are ADORABLE! I tell you what - I will let you know after I finish drinking all of the witch's magic potions.
Oh, wait. Nobody can actually come to the party, except for les cadavrs and they're no fun. I need people, REAL people to drink with!
I'm here for you, my friend! Cheers!
Don't worry about it, man. Imaginary people are WAY better than real people. Right, Ted?
I guess we have to kill some more monsters before the curse is finally lifted. A hero's job is never done.
Still too many cadavrs shambling around... People are afraid to come to the party. What, do you want me to drink myself to death all alone? I want to drink myself to death in good company!
Hey, are we not good enough for you?!
You killed my ex, so you're my hero! But, I know you have other exes you need to go kill.
You will die as everyone dies. Alone.
You are definitely NOT invited to the party.
Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow we die, eh?
Unless tomorrow is Monday!
How's Bella? Still alive-ish? Come on, go make some noise! Free her soul, and all the moonshine with it.
Context: Conversation Monday_1 Text vague reference to the song "Manic monday"

Text: Every day is Monday if you're desperate enough!
Cheers to Bella, the best ex!... At least now that she's dead.
Monday is the party day! All day, every day! Isn't that right, people?
Youre drunk
I know! I've been drinking since Monday. Not sure about the week. Just call me Monday. Have you met my ex?
No thanks, mate. I'm full up on exes.
You've been drinking since Monday and you've got X? Are... are you my spirit animal?
Heeeeyyyy... You're going to do just fine here.
You have an ex? Now, who would let a catch like you slip away?
I know, right?!
Why are you drinking?

Because it's Monday! That Monday when Bella dumped me, I started drinking so hard that when I woke up, I didn't know the day of the week anymore. And the streets were full of them cadavrs, moaning and attacking everyone but me.
Ah. It happens from time to time.
I know exactly what you mean, man! It's terrible!
I know this can't be right, but why do I have this feeling of Dj vu?

So I did what any man in my situation would do - I continued drinking and partying! I think that's why I didn't turn into one of them... At least not completely. I'll never stop drinking! Not this Monday! Not today!
Toast to you, my friend! You deserve a medal.
Poor sad lonely monster.
What are those cadavrs?
Cadavrs... They're like me. I mean, I'm like them. But not yet, not yet! Need more merde to drink. Cheers...
Cheers! I can show you how to make potato vodka.
Is it good merde?
The best! You will see... unless it make you go blind.
Oh, you're not a monster, but you're changing into one! Well, I guess that would make me drink, too.
Cadavrs are just sick people
Right, and today is just another manic Monday...

Text: I wish it was Sunday.

Text: I wish it was Sunday.

Text: I know. You're sober and you need a reason to do the right thing. So let me tell you this: some of those people have already killed their own friends or relatives. Would YOU like to wake up from that nightmare and discover what you did?
No. I drink to forget.
No! I could never go on living with the thought that I have become a monster!... Oh, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to offend you.
I wouldn't know I did it.
No. A hundred times no.
After all, what reason do you need to die? Just send them to heaven and let them party with the angels.

Text: We are not cadavrs
No! We are not monsters like them or... like you.
We are not dead peoples! Check out these biceps! Would a dead guy have this much definition?
We are not dead. We are alive and full of potential!
You're not? You sure? They must still be locked in their houses then. Some may be non cadavrs. But what is important... What's important... What was I talking about?
About houses
Yes! Um, I grew up in one of those! I can't remember which one anymore, and I'm all alone anyway, so it's not important...
About whats important
Yeah, well, I know what's important! What's important is that... Uh... It had to do with the thing before the important thing...
About rocket science

Right! It's not that hard to grasp, once you understand Kepler's laws. After all, the square of a satellite's orbital period is always proportional to the cube of its average distance from the planet, right?
Don't look at me, mon. I work on cars, not rocket ships.
That is... correct. I suppose I should be surprised, but I never let anything surprise me.
...You're distant from the planet.
Context: Conversation Monday_1 Text said under his breath

Text: Wait... Um... That wasn't what I was talking about...
DistractionRedirect
What was I talking about?
About cadavrs
Tell us about cadavrs

Oh, yes. Cadavrs. They are not good company, with one notable exception - myself! But, eh, the others, I mean the people who are NOT les cadavrs - they are all locked in their houses, waiting for those who ARE les cadavrs to get tired.
And do you? That is, um, do you not get hangover?
Not at all! I may look like merde and you would think I would have to stop at some point...
And do you ever get tired, or are you some sort of restless, drunken spirit?
You know, I should be exhausted, but I feel GREAT! Drunk, but great. Still, I should maybe try to take a nap...
But that isn't going to happen. Cadavrs don't get tired! Look at me, drinking day and night. I need drinking companions! So go on and shoot them. I mean, les cadavrs, not the other people.
You are my role model. You and Uncle Ivan, of course!
Don't worry, mister monster. We will save everyone and you will never feel lonely again!
No problem! Give me a bucket, I have a knife. But be careful not to drink it all at once. There is more alcohol than blood in my blood.
That's... We're not... What?!
I wasn't even thinking of doing that... but now you got me curious.
I really wish you hadn't told me that.
Give us a blood sample
In my case, that's an alcohol sample. Wait... I'm not giving you my alcohol. I drank it, it's mine now. Kill Bella! Save the merde! Then you can have all the blood you want from me.
Your ex?
It's all her fault! She brought it to us. Bella, you cold-hearted bitch, I'm drinking to your health. Non, not health. She's a cadavr. She did this to me. To all of us!
To Bella! Or not to Bella! Cheers!
Context: Conversation Monday_1 Text reference to Shakespeare's "To be or not to be"

Text: To all of us!
It's a lover's curse! Oh, that's very bad.
Tell us about Bella
When she returned from that "business trip", she knew she had the disease. Then she dumped me and made a huge party in her house on the hill, with lots of dancing, and sex, and merde... moonshine.
That sounds bad. The more I think of it... Mmm, definitely a bad girl.
That is absolutely irresponsible. If I was her, I would never do that. I mean, um, I'm not talking about the part where she dumped you. Wait, don't get me wrong, I... Oof, I'll just shut up.
When do we kill that bitch?
She spread that merde over the whole town! And I just tried to drink myself to death. But that's not the point! The point is...
What's the point? Ah! She has the merde! All of the moonshine. Go there, kill her, save the merde. I need it. It is a matter of life and... (hic) merde.
Don't worry, we will save all the moonshine and kill the woman!
So we bring the happy ending by... killing the princess and helping the prince become drunk? What kind of story is that?!
It is a merde story. Welcome to Grand Chien, miss.
Kill a psychotic little hussy. Pick up whiskey. Dunnae worry, lad. I'm an expert in this particular type of to-do list.
We killed Bella
Never stop drinking and your drinks will come true!
Cheers to that! Wise wisdom.
That is so beautiful, man.
Hic.
Not this Monday! Not today.
Cheers! Hic. Merde.

Welcome to the House of Blessed Spirits, a church of God and temple to the spirits! I am Father Tooker. All are welcome here, especially if you have diamonds to sell. All sales contribute to the good of the village.
Church? So you are priest? Look more like fortune-teller.
And you look like a soldier, but that is not all that you are, yes?
Man, I dig your style.
Everyone be cool. This one be a houngan - a voodoo priest.
Well, I guess that's one way of believing in the healing power of crystals.
Not that I'm ungrateful for dealing with the person who was scratching at the walls of this house of worship, but... Now it is YOU who are doing this sacrilege! Why would you do that?!
Forgive us, father, for we make sin. But we will make money as well!
Sorry, mate, but this gold is going to pay for a lot of child support.
Guess you missed the part where we pulled a bar of solid gold bling outta your wall?
Have to make sure he didn't leave behind any nasty surprises. You don't mind if I get down on my hands and knees and check, right?
I do not think it is fair to blame me for being very thorough in an investigation YOU asked us to do free of charge.
Be cool, my brother. Just checking for termites.
Oh, I see. Of course. Please continue. I am just a pastor and know little of such things.
We're gathering evidence!
You are lying to me, my child! I saw you taking a gold bar from the wall. Our Lord and savior will forgive you, but the spirits are fond of punishing thieves.
Lie
We found some gold. Here, it's yours
Gold? Really? Thank you for telling me. May God and the spirits bless you and and your loved ones. I will use it to help the poorest people of the town.
bad impression on Father Tooker
We found some gold. It's ours now
Stealing gold from the House of Blessed Spirits is a sin in the eyes of the Lord and an insult to the spirits! Remember that when luck abandons you and a terrible fate befalls your group!
Damn, mon, the priest has cursed us!
Oh no! We are cursed now!
We'll see. Not the first church I knocked over.
I have been asked to tell you that you are kindly invited to meet Boss Blaubert in Rimville. He is a very important man, you know.
Have you found out why this "restless spirit" was scratching the walls of the House of Blessed Spirits?
donated the treasure to Father Tooker
Hidden treasure
Treasure? Really? Thank you for telling me. May God and the spirits bless you, my child. I will remove it at once and use it to help the poorest people of the town.
You're a heck of a guy, Tooker. Little scary-looking, but a heck of a guy.
We're happy to help. Keep fighting the good fight!
Nice to see someone around here giving a shit about the poor. Best of luck to you, padre.
Show the Treasure map
good impression on Father Tooker
No idea, but we dealt with him
May God and the spirits bless you! I shall bring the good news to my flock. They will be relieved to know that at least one restless spirit in this land has been appeased.
Sure. Appeased. That's what we'll call it.
Hell, yeah. Appeased the fuck outta that sumbitch.
I doubt he was appeased, but he is very definitely at rest.
Lie
May God and the spirits bless you!
God AND spirits?!

The spirits guided the people of these lands long before they learned of Christ. The teachings of their ancestors must be seen in the teachings of the Lord if we want the people to understand and live with true faith in their hearts.
The word of God needs no help to be understood!
But the ones hearing it often do, my child.
Religion is opiate of the masses. Myself, I prefer booze.
That... is so beautiful. My aura is hugging your aura right now.
This is great wisdom. You honor your people by giving them such spiritual guidance.
But it is no secret that lately the people's faith has been shaken. The recent trouble we've been having here at the House of Blessed Spirits isn't helping.
What trouble?
There has been a restless spirit scratching and poking around the church walls at night. Of course, I know it's just a man, but one no doubt possessed by an evil spirit.
Scratching and poking, eh? The level of criminal activity in this country is astounding.
You sure it is not chicken? Sounds like could be chicken.
Please, if you could deal with this problem, I would be grateful. As long as the restless spirit persists, my flock loses more and more faith in my ability to give them hope and guidance.
Restless spirits are the servants of Shaitan. We will deal with this.
Death shall consume those who are desecrating a house of worship.
What if he really is a spirit! A... g-g-ghost?
Where is this "restless spirit"?
Once, I sacrificed a goat to try to coax the evil spirit out of him, but when I approached the man, he ran off towards the river.
Likes to hide near the river, eh? Probably doing the old reed-breathing trick.
Got any of that goat left?
I wonder if he's cursed? He sounds cursed.
I lost him along the Southeast bank, not far from here. The smugglers have tried to catch him as well, but he always manages to hide in time.
You buy diamonds?

Yes. The House of Blessed Spirits needs repairs and insurance payments need to be made. The humble profit I make reselling diamonds allows me to help those in need by offering them a free meal every day.
This is good deed indeed.
I am interested in this free meal of which you speak.
Downright charitable. I like it.
But if you are interested in buying diamonds, I can sell you a few tiny pieces I have.
About those diamonds...
Sell a diamond, buy a blessing!
What insurance?
I need to make payments to my good friend Boss Blaubert so he can continue to protect this church from vandals and thieves.
Right, your best friend.
Yeah. It's a nice church. Be a shame if somethin' were to happen to it.
If there's one thing you can always find anywhere in the world, it's a protection racket.
He is... a good man. Not necessarily a kind person, but he is fair and never resorts to violence unless needed. Very well respected. He keeps the peace.
Where do you get diamonds from?
My flock is very poor, but they sometimes find a tiny diamond, one way or another. And as I always tell them - every diamond is clean in the eyes of God!
You would not say that if you knew how people smuggle diamonds out of Kamchatka.
Diamond laundering, huh? Just when I think I've heard of everything.
Mother says the same thing about guns.
Who buys the diamonds from you?
This is no secret, I will tell you. My friend Lalee at the Flea Market buys them from me and resells them on the black market.
Right, mon. That guy be playing you plain and proper.
Friend, that's what is called a middle-man, and they are the scum of the earth.
I'm no expert on diamond trading, but it sounds like you may be getting taken for a ride.
I am no trader, so I am grateful for his help in selling the diamonds. He is truly a godsend!
You can offer better prices

Probably, but you don't just get money for your diamonds, you will also have my blessing! Everyone in town will know that you contributed to the well-being of the House of Blessed Spirits and they will love you for it!
Oh, come on, old man! Blessing is good, but money is better.
Mmm, you know what? I've always had a thing for tall men with top hats. Bless me, daddy!
Man, we can sell at this price anywhere. Gimme somethin' better.
Perhaps I can offer you a slightly better price, but it won't be much. My margin is already quite low. I barely turn much of a profit as it is.
sold a diamond to Father Tooker
sold a diamond to Father Tooker
We'll sell a diamond for $600
sold a diamond to Father Tooker
We'll sell a diamond for $700
bought a diamond from Father Tooker
bought a diamond from Father Tooker
We'll buy a diamond for $1000
Thank you! You are helping the poor people of Fleatown! May the good Lord and the spirits around us bless your kind soul.
bought a diamond from Father Tooker
We'll buy a diamond for $900
Thank you and be blessed.
Still buying diamonds?
No, my child. What you have done to the Boss has deprived Lalee and the market of stability. The Boss had committed a great many sins, so I cannot condemn you...
He had it coming.
Dang right, padre! He was dirtier than a pig pen with a chili trough.
No worry about that - Fidel been condemned many times!
But now I must rely on you to enforce order in this town and hope Lalee and the smugglers can find a way to make diamond trading safe again. Until then, I cannot trade with you.
You made a deal with the devil, mon, and now you want us to save your ass.
Enforcing order is just standard operating procedure for us.
We will make sure everyone know there is new sheriff in town, partner!
We are searching for Smiley
Since he killed a smuggler in the market, there have been many people searching for this young man... But I know nothing of his whereabouts. Perhaps someone else would know. I definitely don't.
You DEFINITELY don't?
Yes. Most definitely.
You make same face Igor make when he hide vodka.
My children make the same face when I ask them who ate the last biscuit.
We know you are hiding Smiley
I see... Well, what can I say? I am just a pastor and pastors are not very good at lying. Yes, he is here. You are like him, right? A mercenary?
Yes, exactly like him. But better.
Not quite like him. He still hasn't learned when to use his gun and when to use his rifle, if you take my meaning.
He is no mercenary. He is lovesick boy.
It is good that you are finally here to help Smiley. I couldn't hide him much longer... Those smugglers are looking to kill him for what he has done.
What did Smiley do?
At the Flea Market a smuggler recognized his fiance as one of the "working girls" in Le Lys Rouge. He and his partners wanted to bring her back to Pantagruel for a reward, but Smiley shot him.
I approve of this boy. !
How romantic!
Sloppy. Boy needs training. A cooler head would've killed them all.
The other smugglers were about to lynch him - but Boss Blaubert intervened and dispersed the crowd. Smiley and the girl ran away and I hid them in the House of Blessed Spirits.
Lead us to Smiley
Through this door. Here, I'll unlock it for you. Please bear in mind that he is still upset about his girlfriend who... well, she left him.
Clue: Smiley was at the Flea Market
You have met Smiley?

Oh, um, everyone in town knows about Smiley. He is the man who killed one of the smugglers at the Flea Market. It was very foolish, but also very brave... from what I've heard - from what others have told me, I mean.
Gained a clue about Smiley
What is this? An advertisement for a house of sin and some communist cell?! Wait, is this...? Yes, I recognize her. This is Smiley's girlfriend on the picture!
Regular blushing beauty, ain't she?
I get the feeling he's not her only boyfriend.
She seems nice!
Maquis Manifesto
Maquis Manifesto
Communist propaganda is just the same as heresy. It must be removed so it can't confuse the heads of the innocent.
Amen!
Religion makes man kill man. Communism is opposite!
Says who, the priest of the House of the Blessed Spirits? Seems you are the one who is confused, "father".
You may be weird looking, but at least your head is screwed on straight.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Walk in peace with God and the spirits!

My father was a fool, but he was my father after all. Now that he's dead because of you foreigners, I hate you more than ever. You spread pain and misery wherever you go! No more. The Legion will destroy you and everyone who deals with you!
I do not see our colors above Flag Hill. But then, you never intended to do it in the first place, did you? You just wanted to see how big a fool I am. Do you think I am a fool?
I see our colors fly above Flag Hill. I almost want to let you in, just to see what you will do, but I know you are no Legion recruits. You only wanted to trick me! Do you think I am a fool?
RedirectFlag
The only fool here is the one who's lying to himself about what a beautiful and powerful soul he has inside. Do you know who that fool might be?
I don't know. You're the one terrorizing your home town and killing your own neighbors... you tell me.
I think this is maybe trick question, but I will say "yes."
Well, I am not. Foreign mercenaires will never join the Legion, not on my watch. Prepare to die.
Of course not. We're just exploring our options.
Calm down, sir. We're not doing anything but investigating at this time.
Perish the thought, my good man!
Oh, really? Then you just needed an opportunity to see more of this beautiful island, did you?
No
I do not think you are a fool, but you are perhaps a little high-strung.
My babusya told me that if I do not have anything nice to say about someone, I should say nothing at all. So... um...
What's the matter? Can't take a joke?
Then YOU are the fools and the joke is on you. But I am a soldier of the Legion and to me this is no game.
Lost a bit of influence over Pierre
We had to try
It seemed like a good scam at the time, but in retrospect, it probably needed a little more lying and cheating.
Well, can't blame a girl for trying.
Worth a shot. Gotta give us some credit for the effort.
Gained a bit of influence over Pierre
So you are all les mercenaires the President's money could buy! And you have the audacity to come and challenge me here, in my own forteresse?! You have some guts, I give you that.
This be your fortress, mon? Look more like a junkyard to me.
Guts, guns, ammo, explosives... we got all different kinds of stuff.
I also have muscle. A lot of muscle.
RedirectMajor
I am tempted to kill you all right now, but I will spare you this time. My reasons are my own. You should walk out of here while you still can and never return.
So you are les mercenaires Bastien was so excited about. You don't look half as tough as he describes you - but we both know he's a coward and a fool. Well, I am not.
Looking tough is overrated. Looking good is not, and from where I'm standing, you need a make-over.
You'll have to pardon us if we don't just take your word for it.
Don't be too quick to judge. You haven't seen us in action yet.
So you are les mercenaires Bastien told me about. I'm not impressed - neither was he, and he's a coward! But let's pretend for a moment that there is more to you than meets the eye.
Probably isn't, if I'm being honest.
Oh, I love playing pretend! Hang on. Let me get my magic wand and slippers.
I get that a lot, but no. Sorry. This is really all there is.
So you are the reason why Bastien's squad did not return from Flag Hill. We shall honor them later, but first things first.
We just mopped up the remains of it.
This Bastien deserve no medal. Unlike Dolviches.
There's nothing honorable about that guy. Trust me, I know the type.
RedirectDefault
Le Major teaches us to know our enemy. And so, before we start shooting each other, I have one thing to ask you - why have you come to Grand Chien?
Where is the President?
If you're looking for him, then you came to the wrong place. Le Major has him in his camp, so why don't you go ask him yourself?
In Russia, you don't kidnap President. President kidnap you!
Don't worry. It's on the to-do list.
More work that way. Easier to just ask you.
So this is the Legion?
Yes! We are the Patriotic Legion of Grand Chien, the new protectors of this country against foreigners like you!
Hell of a gang name, killah.
Do you have uniforms? I would recommend you stay away from brown shirts or red arm bands.
I can respect that, but I think some of your neighbors object to your "protection" methods.
Your father is concerned about you
What my father is concerned about is none of your business!... Is... Is he safe?
He just worries about you too much. Some fathers are like that.
He is safe, but worries about his son. You should call.
He's fine, but you need to work on being a better son. Start with not killing his friends.
He is safe, but he is old and time is the great enemy. Spend some with him.
Heck of a lot safer than you, I expect.
Well, his vitals are mostly good. Blood pressure's a little high... Oh! But, yes, he's safe.
About as safe as can be expected. You should see him more often. You're the only son he's got!
He is safe, but his soul needs nourishment. I think you could help with that.
Ya, mon, he be fine. He be better if you put down that gun and help him fix up the town.
Gained a bit of influence over Pierre
Your father asked us to spare you
Did he now? Oh, how generous of you! I think I should save you the trouble.
It is no trouble. We will just pummel you until you have been properly pummeled.
Don't sweat it, tough guy. Your old man didn't say nothin' about sparing your kneecaps.
Thank you. I don't like trouble. It always make me tired.
Legion! Attention! Prepare for battle!
Lost a bit of influence over Pierre
Are you? Hmm, I can see that you believe what you're saying, and that counts for something in my book.
We're just here to restore order and help a young woman find her father.
We are here to help reunite a young woman with her father.
Happy to hear you say that! We don't mean to be a bother. Just trying to reunite a lost father with his daughter.
Your purpose may be noble, but this is my island - and I did not invite you. I'm giving you one last chance to leave.
Gained some influence over Pierre
We are here to set things right
Oh really. As if this is what my country needed - a bunch of armed foreign mercenaires to come and solve our problems. Get out of here, before I solve YOUR problems in the most final way possible.
That's some tough talk. Let's see if you can back it up.
For the record, I don't actually care about setting things right.
Sounds nice. Now you make Omryn want to take nap.
Lost a bit of influence over Pierre
We are here to kick your ass
Bring it on! Let's see what you dogs on a leash can do in battle.
I like that positive attitude, but I think you need to focus on being CONstructive instead of DEstructive, okay?
Excuse me! I am NOT a dog.
There is no need for name-calling. It is like no one wants to be polite these days.
Gained a bit of influence over Pierre
We are here to join the Legion
You? You wish to be... Legionnaires? Ha. Well, perhaps you know a winning side when you see one.
Totally! It's not technically losing when you swap sides, right?
Wait, Fidel is confused. Now we go kill Emma or what?
Well, I'll have to look at your benefits plan first, but in terms of compensation - I'm flexible. Very flexible.
Very well. To show me your worth I want you to do what my soldiers failed to achieve. Place the flag of the Legion on Flag Hill and you will be welcome in our forteresse.
Lie
How are you doing, kid? You enjoying your stay in the camp?
Major! You... Les mercenaires worked for you all along?!
Nah. We came to an agreement. Let's just say we're helping each other tie up a few loose ends.
I... I don't understand. Have you come here to mock me?
What are you doing here? You came to mock me for being wrong about the Legion? Mock me if you will, but you are no better than them.
What are you doing here? You came to mock me for being wrong about the Legion?
You, here? I have heard about your deeds, but I didn't expect you to come to this god-forsaken place. I... I feel compelled to admit that you were right and I was wrong about the Legion.
Do you remember what I taught you about honor, valor and nobility?...
Yes, I remember all too well.
Careful what you're about to say, Spike.
Major Scallion, now is not the time for one of your "jokes".
Major Scallion, if I may, I would ensure your next words are of a conciliatory nature.

Well... I was full of shit. I was using you and all the other Legion boys just to get what I wanted. Most of the Legionnaires were just thieves and murderers, so I don't feel too bad about it. But you... Well, you were different. You deserved better than that.
Then why did you send me to the mines? Why did you send me here?

Because I couldn't bring myself to kill you, but I had to punish you to make an example for the others. And I knew you were strong enough to take it. Simple as that. Look, I don't expect you to forgive me, but... I am sorry.
I do not know if I believe you, but I... will think about what you said.
Gained some influence over Pierre
Actually not
Yes, and now you want to use me as well. I would rather rot here in this hell hole than serve someone else's "great purpose". Leave me be.
Have it your way, ya thick-headed ninny!
Go ahead and rot then. See if I care.
I don't know about any "great purpose" but you're sure missing out on a lot of fun!
They just used you
Yes, they did. How could I not see through all those hollow words and promises for a great future? I was so easy to fool.
Yes, it is true. You are very naive. But you are not completely without hope.
Don't feel bad. You're young and cute, so it's easy for people to take advantage of you. I have some experience in that area.
Hey, don't sweat it. Everybody falls for an illusion every now and again, ya' dig?
Gained a bit of influence over Pierre
Karma is a bitch!
Do you remember what I taught you about honor, valor and nobility?
Yes, I remember all too well.
And everything I said about your sacred patriotic duty to your country?
Yes?
And about the virtues of the Legion?
Yes, I do!
Well, it was complete and utter bullshit, kid.
You want me to admit I was a fool? Okay, I was. Gloat all you want.
Dumbass.
Fate is a wheel trapped in a waterfall, but a person can choose to be the water or the wheel.
To learn the lessons karma teaches, you must calm your soul and align your chakra.
Lost some influence over Pierre
What do you want from me?
Yes?
YOU happened to me. Le Major does not tolerate failure, and I accepted my punishment. I deserved it...
No, you didn't, Woodman. A good commander doesn't throw his soldiers in prison for losing a battle. That's what the commies do.
I don't think so. Only dictators throw their soldiers in prison for losing a battle.
You're welcome, dumbass.
You're welcome, dude. Anytime.

But in Diamond Red I saw... I saw how they treat our people in the name of the Legion. I learned of all the slavery and the abuse, I heard the stories and I saw what kind of people Le Major favors. People like Slave Master Graaf.
YOU happened to me. And you, Major, punished me for failing to defeat those that you have now joined. Isn't that ironic? I accepted my punishment, but what about you?
Don't worry about me, kid. When the time comes, I'll take my punishment and I doubt I'll get off as easy as just being sent to Diamond Red.

In Diamond Red I saw... I saw how you treated our people in the name of the Legion. I learned of all the slavery and the abuse, I heard the stories and I saw what kind of people you favor. People like Slave Master Graaf.
He served his purpose. I couldn't afford to have you escape and come try to kill me. You were the only one in the whole Legion I think could've actually done it.
I... How do you do that? Your words fill me with anger and pride at the same time.
What can I say? I got a gift.
I'd say it's more like a curse, old buddy.
Yeah, you got a gift. A real gift for getting into trouble.
It's called demagoguery and it is a gift no one wants.
It's called manipulation. It's like a form of camouflage, but for words.
Lost a bit of influence over Pierre
So the Legion isn't what you expected?
We needed a cause to unite us, a promise that we can serve our country and work for a better future... At least some of us did. Others just needed an excuse.
You nailed it! I always knew you were smart, kid.
It's always like that. War attracts those types of people like shit attracts flies.
Where there is war, there are always profiteers.
It is much easier to add evil to evil than it is to add good.
At the end of the day, the Legion turned out to be just a cover for greed and violence, and for the madness of Le Major.
I am not mad. I am differently sane.
We killed Graaf
Yes, I heard that and I'm glad you did. For some people, it is a real shame they can be killed only once.
You got that right!
Some people? Why only some people?
. Fascist needs to die.
Don't look at me! I've been killed at least three times, judging from the rumors I've heard.
My only regret is I couldn't kill him myself. I tried. Yes, it's true... and I almost succeeded. That's why they moved me here.

Bullshit. I sent you here, because if you tried again and succeeded, the boys would have expected me to execute you. To tell the truth, I was kinda hoping you'd break out of here and come try to kill me instead.
Why would you want that?

I wasn't planning on letting you succeed! It was my getaway plan. You and I could fake my death, you could take over the Legion and do what you want with it, and I could disappear. But these A.I.M. yahoos got to me first, so there went that idea.
We hired Graaf to keep him in check
Oh, we found an original solution for the problem with that asshole Graaf. We hired him! That way, we can always keep an eye on him. Brilliant, right?
We didn't trust that Graaf either! That's why we hired him, so that we could control him. We couldn't let him keep being naughty, could we?
Graaf's working for us now. We cut a deal. He plays it straight, he gets to live.
Yeah. Just like me. They're collectors of lost souls, our friends here. When do you join in?
Don't even think about it.
You could have just killed Graaf!
And become just like him? No thanks.
True, but then we would have had to hire someone else and there would have been this big long interview process and... ugh! Who needs that?
Still might. Guess we'll see if he can keep his nose clean.
Anyway, I hope you will make him atone for his sins.
Gained some influence over Pierre
Lie
We killed the Major
This is for the best. You should have met him before... He was an inspiring leader and a good man.
Some of us have, Woody. You're right, he was one of the good ones.
I had the honor of knowing him... before. He was a good soldier, and a good friend.
But it seems like he had been rotting from the inside, and that rot slowly turned him into a madman. Yes, I think even he knew at some point he had to be stopped.
Really?...
You and me, like the good old days - what could go wrong?
You let them hang my father and now you will make that right, will you?
You hired Le Major here, the monster who filled my head with lies...
You hired that bloodsucker Graaf and let him abuse your workers just to squeeze more tiny diamonds out of them...
...You have taken the riches of my country and handed them over to those greedy foreigners...
...And you want me to believe that somehow you will make things right? No, I don't trust you. I would rather rot to death in this hell hole than help you.
Oh, look who's a fine judge of character all of a sudden. Well, to hell with ya!
Frontier justice is harsh mistress, kemosabe.
Well, we never claimed to be perfect.
You can help us make things right
It's not too late to help fix the damage the Legion has done.
Not to sound unreasonably optimistic, but I believe there is still a chance to undo the damage the Legion has done.
There's still a chance to restore law and order to this country.
It sounds weird, but... From what I have been hearing about you, I feel I can trust you.
Even though you spared this madman here...
They gave me a second chance. Look at me, full of remorse, but reformed, all in white like an angel!
Shut up. I'm talking to les mercenaires. As I said, despite not killing him, you did some good.
You ended the bloody reign of Le Major...
You killed that slaver and murderer Graaf...
You made sure that snitch Herman was punished...
You have taken care of my dad's friends in Ernie...
You achieved something unheard of when you forced that snake Bastien to help people instead of abusing them...
...And above all, you seem to genuinely care about our country. So... what do you want me to do for you?
Influence check successful
Join us
And you want to... take me with you? Let me become one of you? This is a great honor and I hope I won't disappoint you, mercenaires.
I don't know about great honor... But I promise you we'll have a lot of fun.
I got my eye on you, punk.
Guess we'll see. Fall in.
As long as you're sincere about being reformed, I'm sure you won't.
Yeah, we'll see. Now let's get you some gear, Woodstock.
Brilliant! I'm sure you'll do fine. Just maybe check with us first before killing any civilians, right?
Fight well and with honor and you will fit right in.
I am sure you won't. I only have one rule: Stay away from my foot powder.
I'll be watching you. You won't see me, but I'll see you.
And I have just one thing to ask - please, don't disappoint me as well. Be honorable to the end.
I'll try not to disappoint you, kid. I suppose I owe you that much. But I'll leave that whole "honor" thing up to you.
sent Pierre back to protect Ernie
Go home
Yes... I can do that. I will return to Ernie and do my best to heal the damage I have done. I will protect my people from those who are like the fool I was.
He's looking at me again!
That's the best news I heard in a while.
Say hi to that cute dad of yours for me!
I have full heart from wholesomeness.
Be good! Don't kill any more of your dad's friends!
Your path will be no less easy, but it will offer you riches you have not yet known existed.
Be cool, playah. Don't make us come find you.
Leave me be.
Farewell.
Well, you did it, mercenaires. You have won and I... I lost everything... Father, forgive me...
Cease fire, mercenaires! You have won. There is no shame in losing to stronger warriors. My life is in your hands.
Cease fire, mercenaires! You have won. There is no shame in losing to honorable opponents. My life is in your hands.
Where is the President being kept?
Le Major has him back in his camp. Don't even think about trying to rescue him - on the mainland there is no other power but the Legion, and no God but Le Major himself.
The Lord's light shines everywhere, even into the dark and stinky hole where this Major hides.
Ooo, it sounds cursed! When can we go?
I'll come loaded for bear.
I will leave this cursed island. I must report to Le Major, and then... I don't know. My life belongs to the Legion.
No, your life belongs to you. Unlock your potential! Do not fear success!
Honestly, I think you can do better. I see you running your own travel agency or giving tours or something.
If I am being completely honest, I think the Legion is yesterday's fashion. Time to put it away and move on.
What will you do if we let you go?

You may have bested me, but my life belongs to the Legion. I will not lie to you - I will report to Le Major, and he will probably order me to hunt you down and kill you. If you don't want that... You know what to do.
Don't need to tell me how to do my job, dumbass. I can kill you whenever I want.
You don't hunt the Wolf, boy. The Wolf hunts you.
You should hunt elk or rabbit instead. Much better for stew.
It is not a big secret, but you won't learn it from me. Kill me if you will... I am no traitor like Herman.
I don't mean to be nit-picky, but you DID sell out your home town to the Legion, so you're sorta exactly like him... I guess?
Sure. You brought a bunch of armed thugs into your home town. Totally different.
Nah, man. Not like Herman. You come back to your old 'hood with gangbangers and guns, You WAY worse than Herman.
It is not a big secret, but you won't learn it from me. Kill me if you will... I am no traitor.
What if I kick you in the teeth? Just a few times, or maybe a few dozen times.
Fidel likes that! Fidel can kill him now, right?
This is no problem.
Where do we find the Major?
It is not a big secret, and you are honorable opponents. Le Major would enjoy meeting you in battle. You will find his fort at the Eagle's Nest, up in the highlands.
His face will enjoy meeting my fist, just like yours did.
That sounds far. We should pack an extra lunch.
Perfect! Blowing up forts in the highlands was how I spent my youth.
Influence check successful
Yes. I shall go to join my mother and father. And you? I hope you kill every rotten, lying, worthless inhabitant of this god forsaken country.
Thank you! Fidel will try his best!
Oh yes we will. Such a shame you won't be there to see it, dumbass.
You are a disgrace to your people. Shaitan take you!
This action may have major consequences!
executed Pierre
Time to die
I understand. Le Major teaches us to show no mercy to a beaten enemy. Go ahead, I'm ready!
Fidel is even more ready!
Oh, cut the dramatics and just die.
May God have mercy on your soul.
You may go
What? Mercy? To a beaten enemy?... I... I thank you, I guess.
Who is this Mercy? Why let go? He said we can have his life.
Remember - we are not like your stupid Legion.
Run away now or the beatings will continue.
Everyone deserves a second chance. Go. Make today the first day of the rest of your life!
Perhaps we will meet again - but I can't promise not to fight you when the time comes.
Anytime, dumbass.
We have bested you, and we will do it again.
Next time, try a little harder, will ya? I barely broke a sweat.
This action may have major consequences!
At ease, soldiers! You did a great job. I had faith the high command was organizing a strike team to come find me. It seems my faith was not misplaced.
Well, sir, about that...
Right. Uh, listen, Scooter...
I beg your pardon, but you may want...

Congratulations on the quality of your disguise! You look more like mercenaries than commandos! I admit that I cannot guess to which division you belong. Please, show me your IDs and I will make sure you get the highest commendations.
I will finally get medal!
Mother will be very proud!
At last, the world will know that Alejandro Diaz is a hero!
Soldiers? I had faith the high command was organizing a strike team to come find me and arrest the Major... Though I cannot help but notice that he is not handcuffed and he is still armed.
You know why? It's because I'm so very pretty.
Please don't tell me he was an undercover agent, because after all that he has done, I would find that very hard to believe.

Mercenaries?! But why? I overheard people talking in camp about Colonel Faucheux entering the valley with a lot of soldiers. I assumed he was coming to free me and restore order. Why would he need to hire... people like you? And this cold-blooded killer here, is he a "mercenary" as well?

I really was a mercenary, Alphonse. I have some... unfinished business, so I guess I'll be back in action for one last time. But don't hold it against these guys - none of this was part of anyone's plan. It's just a jagged alliance we had to form.
Context: Conversation President_1 Text JA games reference

Text: We are mercenaries

Mercenaries?! But why? I overheard people talking in camp about Colonel Faucheux entering the valley with a lot of soldiers. I assumed he was coming to free me and restore order. Why would he need to hire... people like you? No offense.
Your daughter sent us

Emma hired you? But... Of course. The government is too divided. She had to be the one to organize a rescue mission. God knows what she must have gone through. I should have never let myself be captured like that.
Amen to that. You just stood there. I expected a little more fight from someone like you.
Your daughter is very brave.
That's the risk you gotta take when you lead from the front, Woodrow.
I guess I'm lucky I have so many kids. If I ever got captured, they could form their own army. Scary thought, that.
Faucheux betrayed you

Faucheux is a traitor? That explains a lot, and it suggests much more, none of it good. The right wing wants to line their pockets by selling Grand Chien's resources to the highest bidder and the army will answer to whomever pays them the most. When I was abducted, both groups must have seen an opportunity to accomplish their goals.
Curse their sudden but inevitable betrayal.
There is never a shortage of opportunities for the selfish and greedy.
I have learned never to trust rich people or people with guns. They will both try to take something from you.
Forgive me, but that sounds a little odd coming from a well-paid mercenary.
The irony is not lost on me.
This kind of thing makes my blood boil, man!
Well, it's clear what I have to do. If I don't act quickly, this country may descend into another bloody civil war! I must go back to the capital at once and try to prevent it.

Thank you again for your help. I wish you luck getting out of this mess. Faucheux is using you to legitimize his actions. I will uncover his plot as best I can at the capital, but I must first rally my political allies and show the people I'm still alive. You may be on your own here in the Adjani for a while.
Yeah. Both of us have our own mess to fix.
If you hadn't kidnapped me in the first place...
...Some Brutus would have shot you right in your palace. Come on, Alphonse, what's done is done. Who knows, it may be for the best.
I find that very hard to believe.
Not to worry, old chap! We'll give that rapscallion Faucheux what for and have things buttoned up here right quick.
No sweat, partner! We very good at saving homesteads and driving off banditos!
Don't worry about us. We know how to stay hidden when we need to.
Farewell, soldiers. I wish you luck, for strength and courage I know you already have in plentiful supply.
Are you okay?
Yes, this is not the first time I've been shot at. Back in those days I had a gun in my hand, but it is like a memory from another life now. Nevertheless, an old soldier's reflexes never die.
Of course! Don't they teach that in school?
You were in the military?

I was CO of the Grand Chien special forces brigade, rank of Colonel. Me and my boys ended the civil war when we refused to follow unlawful orders and instead we fought to overthrow the bloody communist regime.
You have my respect, sir.
It isn't always easy, being on the right side of the law.
It is good to have conscience, but is heavy thing sometimes.
Then we laid down our weapons and I answered in court for insubordination, even served some time in prison.
Guess that's just your luck, eh?
Luckily, free elections were being held and the new government pardoned me. I ran for President and... The rest is the modern history of Grand Chien.
Faucheux framed us for committing war crimes
A tough lesson I learned from the civil war is that those who are about to commit war crimes often try to blame others for doing the same. It's just how wartime propaganda works.

That much is true. A few of my Legion dummies believed they were "liberating" the locals. I had to come up with all kinds of fairy tales to get them to do their fucking job. Good thing that most of 'em are just shameless looters.
And to think I used to believe you were an honorable man!
When Fidel commit war crime, Fidel always take credit!
Well, Faucheux is about to find out how much I don't appreciate people saying bad things about me.
Well, this Faucheux guy is about to get a war crime committed right on his damn head, and that's no propaganda!
We could use all the information you have on this man.
Any intelligence you could share would be most appreciated, my good man.
Sir, any information you have on the perp would be greatly appreciated.
Well, I have only surface impressions of him. Young. Capable. Very ambitious. But I know very well his predecessor as a commander of the special forces... Because that was me.
Here, I'll write down a few tactical details that may be useful for you.
Anything we need to know about Faucheux?
Well, I have only surface impressions of him. Young. Capable. Very ambitious.
Pretty much your opposite, eh, Alphonse?
To be honest, I wasn't unlike him back in my day. The only difference between us - and also between me and you, Major, - was that I had my moral code and I served my country.
Yeah, you're one of the good boys. Those like me are of the other kind - we get the job done, but sometimes we just get carried away.
Do you think the Major was part of the conspiracy?

No, I believe he was working for himself. He had his private army and he was de facto ruler of the Adjani. I studied him and got to know him a little. If he had any plans to overthrow the government, he wouldn't side with anyone else to do it.
But I see he is with you. Why don't you ask him yourself?
Seems like you got a good understanding of me, Alphonse. If I ever mean to overthrow you, you'll know it. You'll be facing me on the battlefield, and you'll be armed.
The spirits said you would come. It is well you did so before those Legion thugs put a bullet in me.
You can always count on us to shoot desperados, partner!
Their bodies will return to Mother Earth and the worms shall be pleased. Their souls will cross over and gain wisdom.
They deserved to die
They did not die, they merely lost their bodies. Now their spirits will join the soul of this world and aim for completion.
Their mortal vessels are now empty and hollow.
Ehehehee, Fidel does not blow people to pieces. No, Fidel give them completion too! Saint Fidel!
It is regrettable
Yes, I see the light of kindness in your eyes. You will bring good to this land.
Fidel brings explosives as well.
Save us the mumbo-jumbo
We have not come here for spiritual guidance.
Of course. How may I help you then?
The spirits doubted you, but I knew you could do it! Do you have the Metaviron and can you spare it to save my family?
Yes
Operation is available: Cure the diseased
Thank you for saving my family. I have learned much from you, including humility. May the spirits guide you on your path.
You have done so much for us and the spirits are pleased with your presence here. This is why I have decided to give you my ultimate blessing for spiritual protection. Are you willing to accept it?
Yes, please

You see... I wasn't always a Shaman. I was a warrior, a death squad commando. I took many lives, until the spirits guided me to a better path. Please, accept this relic of my past to help you find a better future.
Got no idea what kind of army uses such personal armor, but I like it. Hell, I love it.
Take it as a token of my gratitude for what you have done for our community. May the spirits protect your body and soul.
Enough with the mumbo-jumbo
As you will. I'm sorry for bringing it up.
I heard you have saved this little girl Claudette. I knew it! You already bring good to the land.
I bring the gift of death with one hand, and salvation with the other.
And I appreciate your knowledge of the balance in the spirit world.
Ahhh! I've seen you have enabled the special TV channels! Now that's pleasing the spirits!
You old pervert.

Thank you for helping this "Karen" woman. Not that I liked her, but everyone will be happier when she is back in her own home. I hope she feels the same, but the spirits tell me she is one who complains even louder when she is surrounded by things that should make her happy. Curious.
It is good you have finally silenced this "Karen" woman.
In Death we have given her the gift of peace that she didn't have in life.
I will perform a ritual to soothe her restless spirit, for I tremble in fear that she may haunt us with her endless complaints.
Welcome and be blessed with the spirits' guidance.
Tell me about your ailments, child.
What happened here?
Those bandits were repeatedly coming here and forcing me to heal them for free. A Shaman can never refuse to help, but the spirits have sent you to deliver me from them.
Can you heal bullet wounds?
Yes. He who heals the spirit must be able to bring relief to the body as well, even a body corrupted by the soul of a petty bandit.
You're a Shaman?

I commune with spirits to help guide people to health and wisdom. I do not require much as payment, but right now I can not devote much time to it. My own family is suffering from this strange illness and my reputation as a healer is at stake.
Your family is sick and you worry about your reputation?!
If I can't cure my own family, what will my people think? They will lose faith in my abilities, perhaps even in the spirits themselves. They need such faith in these miserable times.
What illness?

It was brought here by a patient from a nearby village who came to me in the night. I have been spared the disease, but my family... The spirits have seen fit to punish my pride in my healing abilities by making them too sick for me to cure.
good impression on Sangoma
Are they quarantined?
Have you taken measures to put the patients under proper quarantine?
It is well you know something of healing. It gives me hope. Yes, I allow no one but myself to see or care for them in my tent.
Are you working for Maman?
From time to time she pays me for my services. The girls from the brothel need help from a healer to save them from certain ailments.
I can imagine what kind of ailments.
Come on, Ace, give me some more details! I need to know what to expect!
Spirits say no details.
Maman sent us to look for Smiley
Oh, why didn't you start with that!
Lie

There is a way. If you could find and bring me some Metaviron - a compound made from the sap of the Fallow trees - that will surely do! But it is a rare commodity. I heard they sell it at the Flea Market, but I surely couldn't afford it.
Or if you are a capable doctor yourself, please cure my family. Their lives are more important than my reputation as a healer.
Operation is available: Cure the diseased
How can we help you?
You can easily save both my family and my reputation as a healer. I just need some Metaviron, if you happen to have some...
cured the family of Sangoma
You can have the Metaviron

Thank you! You have not only saved my family, but my reputation as well. The people in this camp will rest assured that the spirits watch over them. Of course, my humble skills as a healer will be always at your disposal.
No, we need it

The spirits warned me your path was not the same as mine. So be it, but I beg you to find a doctor who can cure the disease. If the people in the camp see that my own family is dying, they will think the spirits have abandoned us.
Operation is available: Cure the diseased
Thanks to you and the power of Metaviron, life flows unhindered in the bodies of my wives and children. How can I say no?
Wait, you've got more than one wife? How'd you manage that, mate?
There are some secrets you are not yet ready to learn, my young friend.
Wait, "wives"? You old weasel!
Ye got more than one wife? You're off yer head!
I will collect a drop of their life forces for you. I trust that you will not use it for dark purposes.
We need blood samples
Why would you want that? You did help me preserve the life force of my wives and children, but now you want to take some of it away to be used for some dark purpose?
Dr. Kronenberg requested virus samples from the Refugee Camp
bad impression on Sangoma
You owe us
In case you have forgotten, we never asked for anything in exchange for helping your family.
Sir, I can assure you that any blood sample you provide us will not be used in any demon summoning, cannibalism, hematolagnia, or cloning. This is strictly a medical emergency.
Your loved ones' blood could help cure a terrible disease, old chap! No better use of someone's life force than that, I'd say.
Indeed... Well, because you helped me save the lives of my loved ones. now I owe you life for life and blood for blood. So be it.
In order to immunize against the disease in question, blood from a host who has already fought off the infection can be used...
Your loved ones' blood now carries the wisdom necessary to fight this disease. We seek to share this wisdom with others.
Do not think that because I am Sangoma, I do not understand the power of modern medicine. I see that you mean to fight the sickness that almost destroyed my family. Spirits are pleased with that.
Context: Conversation Shaman_1 Text "Sangoma" actually means Shaman

Text: For science
Do not think that because I am Sangoma, I do not understand the power of modern medicine. But you do not. You say "for science" but what you really seek is a miracle.
Context: Conversation Shaman_1 Text "Sangoma" actually means Shaman

Text: We did help you with the power of medicine, Woodley.
He's got a point there. It's not like we even really know if this will work.
Look, maybe we should've taken better notes, but cut us some slack. It's for science... basically.
Yet when I requested from you a miracle of science, you supplied established medical practice. I see no reason then why you have need of a blood sample.
I do appreciate your reticence, but you should probably know that the spirits told me to tell you that this was VERY important.
This is the kind of thing gonna get you in tight with the spirits, ya dig?
Trust me, sweetie, the spirits LOVE it when people share their bodily fluids with each other.

I can see through you and I notice your smugness. You think it is really easy to outsmart this superstitious old fool by blabbering about things you do not understand. But I see deeper inside you and I know you mean well.
You know, I am so happy to hear you say that. It seems everyone but my father can acknowledge that fact.
You are too cool, man.
That is SO sweet!
I will grant your wish, but try not to insult the spirits anymore.
bad impression on Sangoma
To appease the Spirits
Spirits will be happy! So happy! They maybe have big spirit hoedown to celebrate.
Uh... Spirits say big thank you. Uh... Spirits give big gift.
I'm sure the spirits would like to watch you share your wives. I mean, your wives' blood.

I can see through you and I notice your smugness. You think it is really easy to outsmart this superstitious old fool by blabbering about things you do not understand. You are insulting the spirits with your ignorance.
We are searching for someone
Everyone is. Poor souls are swarming in from all over the country - war refugees, displaced people, and those who have nowhere else to go. There is no one to look after them - no one but me.
We are searching for several mercenaries. They look just like ourselves - but much less competent.
There are several mercenaries MIA, we're looking for them.
I remember meeting someone who looked like your kind - a fresh-faced young man with a rifle. He said his name was Smiley, which was a name I thought suited him very well.
Do you know where Smiley is?

He came to me with his young and beautiful fiance and asked me to commune with the spirits so they might receive a blessing for their marriage. I would gladly do that, since such things please the spirits...
I bet they are enormously pleased.
...But then they told me she ran away from the brothel of Maman Liliane in Pantagruel. The camp is in enough trouble as it is without making HER displeased.
In short, you would like us to help the people of the camp in exchange for information about Smiley's whereabouts?
In short... Yes.
Clue: Smiley was at the Refugee Camp but has left.
Tell us where Smiley is
Smiley wanted a blessing from the spirits for marriage, but when I learned that the girl has escaped from Le Lys Rouge, I told them the spirits were busy. Come back another day.
Bureaucracy at its finest.
But they said they could not wait another day, so I said if they were in such a rush to get married, they should go to Fleatown.
Gained a clue about Smiley
Maquis Manifesto
Maquis Manifesto
Oh, look at this! The girls of Le Lys Rouge dressed as Maquis!... Got any more of these? Really pleasing to the spirits, yes.
Why you're a naughty little shaman, aren't you? Still, it's nice to see a man your age can still get his, um, spirit up.
Maquis Manifesto
Maquis Manifesto
Ah, that young man, Chimurenga, has been busy. Good, good. Got any more of these? Camp is running low on toilet paper.
Ew.
Yo! TMI, bro!
Running low on toilets, too.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
May the spirits guide you.

If you were my guests, I would offer you some of my finest selections of brandies. However, I do not recall inviting any of you into mein haus. So, perhaps you will forgive me if I ask a blunt question - what do you want?
Apologies, mein Herr. Do not trouble yourself. I travel with my own specially prepared smoothies - muesli, asparagus und sauerkraut.
If ever there was a concoction that could use alcohol to make it worth drinking, that would be it. Nevertheless, why are you here?
Uh, door was open? Hey, has anyone ever told you that you look like the KFC guy?
Only every time I meet someone new. Has anyone ever told you that you look like a thief who will soon be shot if you don't give me a good explanation of your presence this very second?
Brandy is not favorite of Igor, but if you have vodka, I will help you drink it!
I have servants for that, but I will keep it in mind. Is vodka the reason you are in mein haus?
My presence in any time or space is of no one's concern. An angel of death can come and go wherever they intend... and precisely when they mean to.
Ha! An angel of death? Well, I hate to be a party pooper, but you'll be coming to my house only when I intend you to, soul collector. Now, you may leave or explain why you are really here.
Just looking around
We're interested in the mine
GreetingResponse
Don't think that I didn't notice you coming to Landsbach. I am perfectly aware of every step you make, A.I.M. mercenaries. I know you are after the diamonds. Everybody wants the diamonds.
Context: Conversation Siegfried_1 Text "the diamonds" are pronounced like "ze diamonds"

Text: Every step? I doubt it. I cover my tracks. Where was I three days ago?
I meant collectively, you dummkopf. And wipe that ridiculous paint off your face. You are in a mansion, not a swamp.
Forgive me, mein herr, but not everyone. I, for instance, want nothing more than to soak my feet.
That is the most believable lie as to why you are here that I have yet heard, junge.
You can track our movements? That's not something you really should have revealed, love.

I am too old for games, young lady, especially when I already know all the moves. People are no different than clockwork mechanisms. When you've been stuck in this world for as long as I, you tend to know what makes them tick.
You shouldn't spy on people. It isn't very nice.
And you should not take a mercenary contract that exchanges blood for diamonds without expecting that there will be people - powerful people - who will be watching you.
Ah. It is you again. I hope the reason for this visit is more interesting than the one you provided last time.
Killing off Bounce cost me precious time and resources. I dislike it when my proxies are tampered with, and when I dislike something, I usually find someone to punish.

Luckily for you, your little show in the Night Club proved to be beneficial for me. In the ensuing chaos, my little birds caught wind that Bounce had been planning to betray me. Therefore, the result was a net gain, so your transgression is forgiven.

As you can see from my condition, time is a resource I have precious little of, so I tend to be careful how I spend it. Now that I see you've made some progress on our little agreement, it would seem time spent on you has value, ja?
What are you waiting for? The mine is yours. Go and do whatever dirty things you have in mind with those diamonds.
Tell us about the diamond mine

Ah, yes. Straight to business. I appreciate that. As I'm sure you noticed, the mine is heavily guarded. My security force is exceptionally well-trained and conditioned. I would not dare to test them, if I were you.
They look like a bunch of pretty-boys to me, but if that's your thing... Hey, I don't judge.
Don't sweat it, gramps. I hate tests.
Well, I'm glad you said that, because I have about a dozen tests in mind, starting with urine.
If they keep the peace around here, I have no problem with them... aside from maybe some glute envy.
I do not keep the mine well-guarded for reasons of greed. I have all the wealth I need. No, the mine is important to me for reasons that extend a great deal beyond financial security.
Wait, are you saying there are more important reasons to do things than for financial security? I... I think I need to sit down.
Did you find ancient relics down there or something? If you found a golden idol, don't try replacing it with a bag of sand.
Does your family have a mausoleum down there? Is it haunted?
Aside from extracting diamonds, the area around the mine is a place where I... conduct other business. Recently, something related to this business was stolen.
Context: Conversation Siegfried_1 Text "the diamonds" are pronounced like "ze diamonds"

Text: What is this place?
The diamond mine is the primary source of income for the nearby town of Landsbach. Both places were little more than trash heaps until I came and invested in building them up.

If you go east of here, you will find the docks, and a place called Night Club. It is an establishment I built to keep the diggers happy. One can gamble, fight, drink... all the things those of lesser minds enjoy.
With the nice ancillary benefit of putting their paychecks back into your pocket.
And all the proceeds flow right back to you. Not a bad little scheme.
What you really mean is, you get them too blootered to notice yer pickin' their pockets.
How the poor stay poor and the rich stay rich, Exhibit motherfuckin' A.
Sound to me like good deal for everyone, partner!
I'm getting a bad taste in my mouth just listening to you... and I hate when things taste bad.
What is this Night Club?

Do not be fooled. Das ist not a techno club. It is an arena. The diggers like to go there to satisfy their base desires. They drink, they gamble, they fool around with girls... and they fight - sometimes, to the death.
Mortal Kombaaat! Great game. Terrible movie.
Isn't life just one big fight to the death?
Das ist too bad... I love techno.
Ah. Sounds like one of me favorite pubs back in Edinburgh.

The club is open every night in the warehouse near the docks. I let Bounce handle this enterprise, as I do not enjoy mingling with the maggots. Take this coin and show it at the door. Otherwise, they won't let you in.
good impression on Siegfried
You ordered the attack on Chalet de la Paix

That was... a mistake on my part. The men I hired proved to be not just unreliable, but dangerous. I had hired them to secure a certain plant that grows near the village. I encouraged them to work with Dr. Robert to identify and collect it.
Doc Robert was a monster, not a doctor.
That man was a lunatic. Instead of working in a hospital, he should've been committed to an asylum.
