They weren't looking for plants, they were looking for ways to sneak up on a defenseless town.

When they alerted me to the rapid decrease in the town's population, I advised them to move quickly. They either misinterpreted my meaning, or took that as motivation to enact some plan they had come up with on their own to seize the town and plunder it. I cannot fix what was done, but I do regret it.
Your bodyguards look unnatural

It is not just the looks. Although I have been devoting much of my time on that, as well. Deterrence is a key element of creating a super soldier. This is the art of producing in the enemy... the fear to attack. Just like your fear of attacking my mine, ha-ha.
Man, you should be a leader. With the whole package, you know. Red flags, black boots, stylish imperialistic uniforms and all these things.
The world is too important to be left to politicians. They have neither the time, the training nor the inclination for the bigger picture.
I must say that I'm impressed. I can see a military education put into good use here.
Chill down, gramps. You'd have to work harder if you wanna see my fear.
good impression on Siegfried
It's not just the training, right?
Hahaha. You think of me as a mere capitalistic entrepreneur. I am no producer. I am a creator. My canvas is the human body. My muse is the art of war.
If the mind is willing, the flesh could go on and on without many things. Sun Tzu.
You're talking about mass murder, not war.
We're not afraid
Oh. But you should be. I dare you to attack one of my soldiers. I promise you a quick and painful result.
What was stolen from you?
Diesel. I don't know why, but several gallons of it were stolen from me. It may seem trivial to you, but I am not talking about the normal kind of diesel. It is... sehr special to me.
Could be dangerous. Diesel is not most ideal of explosive fuels, but it can still create destruction of noteworthy magnitudes.
People go crazy over fuel, Woodman. I saw an old lady shoot a biker who cut in front of her at the gas station during the shortage a while back.
I am always astonished, and distressed by the amount of emotional attachment people form to material items.
Everybody thinks their own gas is special and that everyone else's stinks.

I need it back. Unfortunately, investigation is not something my men excel at, but I suspect you do. Help me retrieve what was stolen and Landsbach Diamond Mine will be yours. I am done with this place and I've no wish to fight you for it.
Not to be rude, but they also don't seem to excel at guarding your Diesel, either.
And yet you managed to be rude, regardless. I do so enjoy the British and their ability to be childishly clever. For your information, the theft happened off the premises.
Scooter, you got yourself a deal. Any man who takes his fuel that seriously is a man I can respect.
That is a most generous offer. I look forward to toasting our success with brandy... and perhaps some schnitzel?
I don't get it. A whole mine full of diamonds for a few gallons of gas? Something doesn't add up.
Math is hard. Don't strain yourself.
Who might have stolen the Diesel?
Have you seen anyone suspicious sniffing around your special gas, sir?
Do you have any enemies? Jilted partners, disgruntled employees, angry neighbors who don't like your dogs on their lawn... y'know, stuff like that.
Let us begin by eliminating the suspects... Pardon me, I meant to say "narrowing."

I don't know who might have stolen it, but I do know it was not stolen from here. A van was transporting my Diesel to a... location I do not wish to disclose. The van left here on schedule but never arrived. I suspect it was ambushed en route.

As you can see, I don't get out much. I have few personal contacts. You should probably ask around in town and see if someone might know more. A good place to start is Night Club. I imagine many of the patrons know a good deal about local criminal activity.
Heey, now we're talking. I'll ask everyone in the Night Club about drugs... No, wait - it's gas, right? I'll ask them about that, too.
If we gonna be jammin' in a club, that place better be dropping some serious Reggae beats, mon.
Careful there, Siegfried. Your class bias is showing.
Hell, yeah. We gonna walk into the club all like, "What's up? We lookin' for a weasel wants to talk about Diesel."
We found your Diesel
Ah, so you have. I suspected you would be suitable to the task. You have my sincere gratitude, mercenaries.
When I have a task before me, I let no one stand in my way... although I do allow some to sit or lay down.
Gratitude is nice, but I prefer commendation.
As well as brandy and schnitzel, I hope!
As promised, I will withdraw my soldiers. The mine will be yours. Now, please hand me my Diesel.
It's yours

Mein Diesel... I will remember this favor. Please know you will always be considered invited guests in mein haus. Now, here are the deeds to the mine. I have informed the workers of their new employer. The mine is yours.
We know about your Enhanced Diesel

So, your investigation skills are better than I expected. Well, now you understand the stakes here. With strong discipline, natural selection, and the power of chemistry, I am creating a better breed of man. Some say chemistry is the study of matter. I say it is the study of change.
Oh, man, that was beautiful. Chemistry is my favorite subject, too... even though I got a D on my final exam.
Natural selection is a theory pertaining to animals. A human being should ascend beyond that. You can't awaken the giant within using artificial enhancements.
I think we've all heard this speech before, Siegfried. Put a sock in it.
The spirit is constant and eternal, the body is temporary.

I see you are skeptical. That is understandable. I do not require you to believe me. I do, however, require your cooperation. Therefore, in addition to giving you the diamond mine, I shall also leave you some militia, drawn from the local populace, to help defend it. What do you say?
Try to negotiate a better deal, knowing the true nature of Diesel
That seems like a good deal
I am very happy to hear that, mein freund. Come, let us toast to our mutual success. Prost!
Give the Diesel to Siegfried
We are putting an end to this
And who is paying you to do that? No one. I am giving you the diamond mine - the very thing you are contracted to take - yet you wish to interfere in my business instead. Why?
Because you talk too much and I'm damn tired of it!
Because I hate Nazis!
Because you are bad host who does not give snacks. I joke. It is because you are insane and also dangerous.

You think it is because you are righteous? You are mercenaries! You have no cause beyond feeding your own bank account. Your kind solves problems with solutions that are only temporary, while I... I am trying to provide a final solution.
Attack Siegfried and destroy his operation
No. The deal's off
Then you are no better than the thieves that took it in the first place. Therefore, I will do to you what I would do to them if they were here.
Refuse to give the Diesel to Siegfried
Bounce took your Diesel

Is that so? I always knew Bounce despised me, but I didn't think he had der testikels to betray me. If you discovered his treachery, he is no doubt aware of it. He is probably planning to storm the house as we speak.
I must admit, I am hoping he will. There is a perfect spot on your wall where his head should be mounted.
Let him come! He will get a face full of Fidel!
If it is death he seeks, he shall find it.

He will discover for himself what fate awaits der Untermensch at the hands of der bermensch... Thank you for telling me this. Your professionalism is admirable. I am certain now that you will soon recover mein Diesel.
This choice will have consequences
You will excuse me if I do not show you to the door. Auf Wiedersehen.
Rejoice, my child! I have brought friends to help you.
Friends? What friends? I... I don't know these people. Who are you guys? My name is Alejandro Diaz, but most people call me Smiley.
Um... Who are you guys? My name is Alejandro Diaz, but most people call me Smiley. Where is the pastor? He promised he'd give me asylum!
What's the hold up? Let's go out and search for my girl already!
So you are a merc?
You bet I'm a merc! Trained by the legendary Biff Apscott himself!
Biff? Legendary? Uh... sure. I'm sure you'll be every bit as legendary as he is someday.
Biff is a... dependable merc. I know Colonel Roachburn liked him.
Legendary, my ass!
Oh, he's legendary, all right - a legendary prick.
Where is Biff now?
Umm... I don't know. I kinda got separated from the squad in Pantagruel when I met my fiance Mollie. You should have seen how beautiful she was that night!
Oh, I hear that, mate! I never could resist chasin' after a Sheila, either.
You ditched your squad to chase a skirt? Hell, I don't know whether to shoot you or salute you.
Plenty of time for dames when the mission's over, rookie!
I guess that wasn't very professional of me, but... She is the love of my life! What else could I do?!
What happened to you?
Me and my fiance, we went through so much together! We wanted to be married, so we came here to this backwater town.
It's "fiance and I".
What? What about my fiance and you?
No. It's just grammar.
It better be just grammar!
Actually, it's "my fiance and I".
You and your girl were there, too?
What?
What?
Terribly sorry. Don't mean to interrupt, but I believe you mean "my fiance and I".
Oh, no, seor. I know nothing about you and your fiance. I was just talking about Mollie and I.
Mollie and me.
What about Mollie and you?
You know what? Forget I said anything. Do go on.
Well, not long after we arrived someone recognized Mollie and he tried to take her from me! I shot him. I think I may have killed him!
! That's how you do it!
You did not check? That is why Fidel always shoots twice. Just to be sure.
The rest of his gang came for us, so we ran from the market and ended up here in La Boue. We hid for a little while, but Mollie... well, one day she disappeared.
Youre in trouble
You are in deep trouble, son.
No shit! My fiance Mollie is missing, the whole town is trying to kill me and I'm just hiding here, pissing in a bucket like a goddamn prisoner...
That's what you get for not following orders, kid. Now stop complaining, man up and report!
Um... Sir, yes, sir! Situation is FUBAR, sir!
Pissing, moaning and crying over some dang girl! Get it together, junior!
Lad, I dinnae mean to be harsh, but you're acting like a wanker.
What happened to your fiance?

The day after we got here, Mollie insisted she go to the church to pray. I never saw her again! Father Tooker told me some masked men snatched her. He said he was sure she wouldn't be harmed, but that I would be if I went after them.
Something be fishy about this whole story, mon.
I wonder how he knew that...
I've been crazy with worry, but now that you've found me, we can go on the offensive! If you help me get Mollie back, I promise I will do mercenary work for you for free!
Good. We need someone to dig the latrine.
I've always wanted to rescue a princess!
Actually, she's a queen! The Carnival Queen!
Mollie is with the Boss
I knew it! I just knew it was him!
Mollie was with the Boss
I knew it! I just knew it was him!

The day after we got here, Mollie insisted she go to the church to pray. I never saw her again! Father Tooker told me some masked men snatched her. He said he was sure she wouldn't be harmed, but that I would be if I went after them.
Well, we took care of that little problem for you.
But now that you have killed the bastard, I can go and save my girl! I'll do anything for you, I will do mercenary work for free - just lead me to the love of my life!
Not on this squad you won't! But... I suppose we should help.
Mollie is dead
What?! How...
It was a stray bullet that was intended for the person who kidnapped her from you... We are deeply sorry.
It was accident in battle...  ,  .
She got caught in the middle when the fur started to fly. Tough break, kid.
Multiple gun shot wounds. Massive internal bleeding. She went into shock and... Oh. Maybe you meant "how" in a more general sense...
Why would you let her die! You are the mercs! I thought mercs don't make mistakes!
I'm sorry, son. Not everything on the battlefield can be controlled.
It was just her time. No one could have prevented it.
Listen to me. I lost my brother in battle. You must turn your pain into a weapon.
I... I don't want to be a merc anymore... I want to go home.
I think maybe that be for the best, mon.
Maybe it's for the best.
Maquis Manifesto
This is not the time for stupid Communist... Wait, is that Mollie?! A picture from the Carnival celebration! Damn, look how beautiful she is!
Believe me, I've looked!
Je sais! I have regarded her picture quite closely while cleaning my rifle at night.
Hell of a pair of lungs on her. Bet she's a screamer, amiright?
Give me that! I shall keep it close to my heart!
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Maquis Manifesto
This is not the time for stupid Communist bullshit! They should have printed an advertisement for Le Lys Rouge instead.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Well help you
Thank you!
Well see
Don't worry, we can do it together! And even if they have returned Mollie to the brothel, I can steal her again!
When you put it that way, I am starting to think maybe helping you isn't such a good idea.
That's the spirit! Wait... what?
While I admire your positivity, I am not quite sure it isn't misplaced.
Smiley, my son, it's not what it seems...
Did you have a deal with the Boss, Padre? Yes or no.
I only did what I had to do to protect you both. Trust me, she is alive and well! I love both of you stray lambs and I have done everything in my power to help you!
Is it true what they said?
Yes, I let them take her to Rimville, but it was only because...
That's all I needed to know! You Judas! You have sold my girl to these beasts! I'll kill you right here on the spot!
Stand down, son, or I'll shoot you myself. That's not how we do things in A.I.M.
Settle your dang self down!
Mr. Diaz, let's just calm down now.
Take it easy, mate.
Take some deep breaths. Center yourself.
Calm yourself. There are no threats here unless you make one.
But he has sold my girl to those people!
Mollie is safe, Smiley, I can promise you that. Things have a way of working out as they should, you just have to trust in God.
We will see about that! I am going to Boss Blaubert to get her back, and God help you and him both if she has been harmed at all!
Stuff a sock in it, hothead.
Chill, dude! Father Tooker was just tryin' to help.
You are not my commander and you can't tell me what to do!
Dear Lord, let the spirits take my soul and bring it to your kingdom...
He deserves to die
You want me to shoot him for you?
Reap what you sow, Pastor.
He lied to you and gave up your girlfriend to a gangster. It is clear he must die.
Dear Lord, let the spirits take my soul and bring it to your kingdom...
Shut up and die, Judas!
Haha! The mercs have appeared! Time for you to meet your maker, Boss BLUBBER!
Normally, I would kill you on the spot for that little insult, but I made a promise to Mollie. Stand down, boys. We'll try to talk this out.
Smiley! What are you doing here? You must leave!
Don't worry, my love. You're safe now. This monster will pay for everything he's done!
Why? What have I done? I saved your life in the market and I gave my Mollie the home she deserves. What have I done? How am I a monster?
YOUR Mollie?! That's it! You will gurgle in your own blood right now!
Damn, this is some exciting stuff! Hang on, Boss. Let me get some popcorn!
Smiley! I knew you were behind all this! I had convinced Booboo to protect you, but you sent these people to kill him!
What the...?! I didn't send them, but they were right to kill him! He kidnapped you from me!

No, you stupid little boy! I ran from you! I didn't want the life of a fugitive. I just wanted a home, and Booboo - my sweet Booboo - gave that to me. I asked him to protect you, but now I see it was him I should have been protecting from monsters like you!
He's dead?! My Booboo! My sweet Booboo! How could you do this? Why would you take him from me?
Boss killed
You didn't love him!
What I had was better than love! I had a life of luxury and security... Now I have to go back to Le Lys Rouge.
You belong with me! We should be together.
Never! You are a silly, stupid little boy! Good bye.
What?! But I... I swear, I don't understand women.
Me neither.
Don't think we're meant to.
That is because every woman is unique and all men are the same.
What do I do now?
Come with us
Yes! I owe you that much, at least. I need to help you find Biff so I can apologize for leaving the squad like that.
Might make a soldier out of you yet.
Indeed. Amends should be made.
You should bring a gift. I like chocolate-covered caramels shaped to look like bullets.
Thank you for giving me another chance. And... For everything you did. I won't disappoint you, you'll see!
Gained Intel for Savanna (sector E7), Refugee Camp (sector E9) and Pantagruel Slums (sector D7)
You should go home
Yeah, I guess... I didn't do too well as a merc, did I?
Let's put it this way: Whatever it was you were doing, it wasn't mercenary work.
You followed your heart instead of your head. That's a good way to get it blown off.
You have too much passion to be mercenary. Maybe try acting?
Well, I think I should go home and see mi madre anyway. Here, take my gun. I won't be needing it anymore.
No, Mollie, no! Say something! Don't worry, you're gonna be alright! The mercs will help you! Medic!!!
Um... I'm sorry. She's lost too much blood. I don't even think I could save her if we were standing in the middle of an ER.
It is too late. Her spirit is already on it's last journey.
Oh, sweetie, I'm sorry. She's gone.
Her body is finished, mein Freund, but her soul is free now.
Please don't go... I just wanted to be the one to make you happy! But if I can't make you happy, then you can stay with Blaubert. I don't care... just please stay... Mollie...
Were sorry
You! I thought you were supposed to be professionals! How could you let this happen?
I'm sorry, son. Not everything on the battlefield can be controlled.
It was just her time. No one could have prevented it.
Listen to me. I lost my brother in battle. You must turn your pain into a weapon.
I... I don't want to be a merc anymore... I want to go home.
This is life. In life...   ,  .
Context: Conversation Smiley_2 Text Visotski reference "Nothing is as it should be"

Text: Maybe it's for the best.
Here, take my gun. I won't be needing it anymore... Farewell.
Its all your fault
If it wasn't for your stubbornness, she would still be alive.
That's what you get for not following orders, kid.
Damn you! I didn't want it to be like this! You should have never allowed this to happen...
It was accident in battle...  ,  .
Context: Conversation Smiley_2 Text Visotski reference "It so happened that the woman went away"

Text: Yeah, maybe so, but some of that blood on the ground is because of you.
I... I don't want to be a merc anymore... I want to go home.
Perhaps it's for the best.
Maybe it's for the best.
Gut. Allow yourself time to grieve.
Wait a minute
What do you want?! Don't you see him? He kidnapped my girl and now he is mocking me!
He didn't do anything like that. Why won't you listen...
I know, love. He forced you to say that. Don't be afraid, it will be over in a moment!
Open fire!
Die, you son of a bitch!
No, Smiley! Don't...
Hey, you don't fuck around with my boss!
Initiate combat
What happened at the Market?
What was the order of events that transpired after you first arrived at the market with Mollie?
I'd like to hear the whole story. Tell me what happened in the market.
Perhaps we need to take a step back for a better look at this. What happened that day in the market?
The thugs working for this criminal here, they recognized Mollie and they wanted to take her from me! So I shot one of them.
Damn! You're either brave or very stupid, bambino.
They weren't my boys. They were smugglers. If you had killed one of my boys, you'd have been dead a long time ago.
I see... And what happened after you shot this smuggler?
Okay. Attempted kidnapping, homicide... what happened next?
Right. It's coming into focus. Then what happened?
Well, the Boss ordered them to stand down and let us escape. But he did that just because he had eyed my Mollie and wanted her for himself!
I must admit that much is true. She is the best concubine I've ever had.
You...!
The Boss is a criminal?

The Grand Chien government is always changing their laws, way too often for me to be able to keep track of them, so I may have ignored some... or all of them. But in my own way, I am an honest businessman.
You mean you are a mob boss and you think yourself above the law?
I'm comfortable with that description, too.
Mollie, did he kidnap you?
No! I ran away with Smiley because I didn't want to spend my youth in Le Lys Rouge and end up an ugly old whore. And besides, he was so cute when he smiled at me like that...
We'll be happy together, my love, you will see! We'll buy a house, and have children, and...
...And bang this beautiful ragazza to the end of days. Amen to that! You've got a solid plan there, bambino!
You... You shut up!
No, Smiley. I was being stupid. You are really nice, but... I decided I wanted a better life for myself. That's why I'm here with my Booboo.
No! This isn't right! I'll... I'll prove myself to you! Listen up, mercs - if you don't want to help me, that's fine! I'll kill Boss Blows-bears myself and get my girl back!
Oh wow, we've got a badass over here!
Hey, mon, she may be having her own opinion on that.
How did you leave the church?
I knew that Booboo liked me a lot. When a man looks at me, I just know.
Heey, and how about me, bambina? Look into these deep dark eyes, eh?
No.
I bet you do.
I know what you mean, sister.
When a man looks at me, I look at him right back! Men are like dogs. Gotta establish dominance.

...So I asked the Pastor to arrange a secret meeting with him after I told Smiley I needed to pray. I am sorry that I had to lie to you, Alejandro, but I didn't know any other way to get away from you.
You... You whore!
That's what I am. You knew that right from the start. But this was the only way to get what I wanted and save your life at the same time.
I for one commend you on finding such a clever solution to a very difficult problem.
Sneaky, but effective. I like it!
Save his life?
How would YOU save my life?!
Those thugs would eventually find you, but Booboo promised me he would protect you. He knows that I'd be crying if they had you killed.
"Booboo"? Oh dear God and la Vergine Maria! I'm crying already!
But she is mine! You should be helping me get her back!
You know, you can still be the hero of this story by letting the princess go.
Her journey lies down a different path than yours.
I'm going back to Arulco and I will show everyone what a real mercenary is made of!
Goodbye, Smiley. I wish only the best for you. I am sure you will make some girl very happy.
Whore!
This action may have major consequences!
Smiley, she made her choice
No, she didn't! She promised to be mine forever!
That's because she hadn't met me at the time! She would have instantly succumbed to my charms!
Sometimes people change. If you meet the right person, you'll change together.
And then that'll be forever... or at least until you're both shot to pieces and die in battle together.
If you won't help me, I'll do it all by myself. I can kill Boss Blow-hard and all of his goons!
We all tremble in fear, bambino!
This action may have major consequences!
There is no "I" in "team", soldier, but there is "U" in failure. Don't be a failure.
Don't be a dang fool!
Don't make a choice you know you'll regret here, Mr. Diaz.
Take it easy, mate. Plenty of fish in the sea, right?
But she is mine! You should be helping me get her back!
No, she belongs to herself and you are an idiot.
We did help you, son. But what's right is right.
I'm going back to Arulco and I will show everyone what a real mercenary is made of!
Si, that's a real man! Show them, bambino! You can do it!
Shut up, asshole!
Goodbye, Smiley. I wish only the best for you. I am sure you will make some girl very happy.
My beautiful ragazza, you're not just the Carnival Queen, you're the top Drama Queen as well!
Smiley, stand down!
No, you can't stop me! With or without you, I will have her back!
Yes, you can't stop Smiley! Let's kill them all!
Si, enough drama already. Time to put down the popcorn and pick up the gun!
Boss Blaubert, let her go
Do you think I would be where I am if I was taking orders from the likes of you?
Oh but you will!
Stop this madness, Smiley!
I'm doing it for you, my love!
You're doing it for yourself, you selfish idiot! I hate you!
Don't worry, bambina! I'll kill him for you!
This action may have major consequences!
Happy to see you again! Mister Chimurenga has informed me that he decided to agree with our terms and conditions. You must have been very persuasive! Now...
Hello there! Welcome to the "Vulture of Hope" - the best clinic in the region! We shall start our life saving operations any day now!... As soon as we solve a minor issue or two.
Happy to see you again at the "Vulture of Hope"!
Regrettably, we still have some minor issues to solve before we open for business.
Happy to see you again at the "Vulture of Hope"!
Vulture of Hope?!
Yes! We wanted to name the clinic "The Dove of Hope", but the Donation Board pointed out that we need to be more sensitive to the local heritage, so we were asked to pick a local bird.
"The Vulture of Hope" sounds just about right for this place.
Well, I suppose having a name like that is one way to cut down on ER visits.
You should have called it "The Raven of Hope." Has a nicer ring to it.
Ah, well, you see there aren't any ravens around these parts.
No, there is one.
One?
Never more.
This name is good. The vulture, she is strong, resilient and... uh, very good at sanitation. Nature's janitors, no?
The "Quail of Hope" was not acceptable?
The Board thought it sounded too scary.
I think it's rather elegant.
What is this Donation Board?
Well, the money for the hospital comes from donations, and the good madams and sirs on the Donation Board make sure it is well spent!
A clinic?
This country has its problems and one of the worst is the lack of quality healthcare! We have a mission to provide it, free of charge, to any and all civilians who need it.
Man, that is so great. I just love free clinics.
So I'll need a convincing disguise. Got it.
I am very civil. I am civiler even than you, I bet!

You fine people wouldn't really qualify for free aid, because you're not civilians, nor local militia. But once we open for business, we can provide you with medical assistance at some very reasonable prices!
Maquis Manifesto
This is very, um, interesting. Are these young ladies from the... Yes, I see. Maybe I should pay them a visit to, um, survey them about their medical needs.
I would survey them as well! I'd survey them big time.
Survey them, huh? Well, that's a new one.
If ye plan on taking notes, just make sure your pen is sterilized, lad.
Read this Maquis Manifesto
I have signed a contract that stipulates non-involvement in local politics. Apologies, but I am not allowed to read this document.
Lucky you.
It is good to exercise your stipulates.
It's very boring. Not a single witch or demon or anything! One out of five stars. Would not recommend.
Give a propaganda pamphlet
Since you have already resolved your conflict with these... Maquis people, I'm anxious to open for business! However, it seems the, um, Donation Board...
If you mention that Board again, I'll punch you in the gut, you pathetic little fuck.
Let me guess - another minor issue?
Can suck my left nut.

It's just not safe out there. Those Legion thugs can attack any moment, can't they? If there was some solution to this security issue - like a local militia protecting the town, for example - I'm sure we could open right away!
We have trained Militia
Oh! You have? Really?
Really.
Open your eyes, Woodstock!
The streets are filled with fresh squaddies, mate.
Open the clinic NOW
Don't bullshit me, dweeb. Open the fucking clinic, or you'll be the first one that's gonna need to use it.
Your skin... There is something wrong with it.
My skin?! What's... What's wrong with it?
It's too thin. Really hard not to damage it while flaying. But I like the challenge.
Fidel is tired of watching your mouth move. Maybe I put grenade in it.
Listen here, you little shit! Open this damn clinic up or I'll kick your ass so hard you'll need to get an X-ray to find my boot!
Oh, dear! That is, um... Please don't hurt me.
What minor issue?
There is this gentlemen, Mister... um, Chimurenga. He was very enthusiastic about us opening a clinic here in Pantagruel, yet he made a request that the Donation Board could never approve of...
Your fucking board again!
Did he ask for a frequent customer program? I've tried making that request at clinics back home.
Did he want a clown that makes balloon weapons instead of balloon animals? My mother made that request at the hospital where I had my tonsils removed.
Did he ask for a free sponge bath with every visit? Hehe. Tried that one myself.

He wants us to provide free healthcare to the People, meaning, well, his people - The Maquis, I believe he calls them? Well, that we cannot do. They qualify neither as civilians nor local law enforcement. The Board would never allow it.
What about a donation?
Oh, well, if you were to contribute a substantial sum, say, three thousand, then you would actually be entitled to join the Donation Board! In fact, you'd be my boss!
Could we fire you?
Uh, well... No.
Then what the hell's the point?
Boss of a hospital! That would be wonderful! I volunteer to personally oversee the nursing staff.
So, I tell you bring me snack, you do it?
Um, well, we actually have tea and biscuits available in the...
Okay. Sound good.
Well donate $3000
Thank you for your generosity! I have no choice but to accept this wonderful donation.
May you always have the resources to carry out your noble mission.
Good. I have a few ideas about uniforms for the nurses...
So, as board members, do we get free samples? Know what? Forget I asked that.
Well donate $1000
The actual sum doesn't matter as long as it is big enough, correct?
Sir, please accept this donation and our heartfelt promise to help protect and serve this clinic.
I happen to have a contact or two at the British Embassy. If you accept this somewhat more modest donation, I can assure you that Her Majesty's government would be eternally grateful.
Well, to be honest, it's not the size of the sum that matters, it's the spirit in which it is given. Thank you! I happily accept your donation.
The Maquis ARE the local law enforcement
In case you had not noticed, the Maquis are the ones running this town.
I can assure you that the Maquis are more than capable of keeping the peace.
My good man, I know they may not look the part, but the Maquis actually make for quite an acceptable group of bobbies.
Uh, you mean, they qualify as a local enforcement body under the provisions of article 72, paragraph 11-b of the Donation Board Establishment Act? Hmm, I hadn't thought of that...
Well talk to Chimurenga
I wish you good luck! Uh, that is, I am sure you will get along smashingly with the gentleman!
Redirect
Let me think if there are any other issues that need addressing...
My boot's itching to start kicking.
Fidel drop his grenade! Where it went? Here, ps-ps-ps-ps grenade!
You like this knife, oui? Would you like to see how it feels against your skin?
I can answer that for you right now: There ain't.
No, it appears we've got everything in order... We can open for business right away! The "Vulture of Hope" will fly high and wide! Uh, hooray!... I guess.
Operation is available: <color EmStyle>Hospital Treatment</color>
Goodbye and have a nice day! Don't you worry, the "Vulture of Hope" will be there for you soon enough!
I welcome you to this consecrated ground. Let our souls touch in the spirit world.
How about we touch in the physical world first and see where it goes from there?
I can feel my aura gently rubbing against yours.
You honor me with your offer.
Are you here to receive guidance for your soul, or do you need your body to be mended?
I need guidance for my body!
The Doctor told me I need a lot of both of those things.
Got anything to cure a limp?
Some would say so.
Why are you in the house of spirits at night?! You are not welcome here! Be gone at once, or I will summon vengeful spirits upon you!
Oh no! G-g-ghosts!
Don't you be waving no evil spirits at me, I don't scare so easily.
Go ahead and summon them and I will send them back to Shaitan!
I have warned you.
You have destroyed the reincarnations of my late husbands. Their spirits have left this plane and they are no longer here to guide me. I submit to your power.
I am here to serve this land and all its people.
What do you ask of the spirits?
CombatRedirect
Spirit, Specter, Phantom and Ghost, I command thee! With your powers combined, devour these bodies!
Phew, we're so lucky not all five of them are around. They would have summoned Captain Croc or something.
She has summoned flesh-eating ghosts! Hide!
Team, prepare for a croc attack.
Are you some kind of Shaman?

Yes, I am Lami, healer of the body and guide of the soul. I take care of the people of Wassergrab and satisfy their many needs. And their needs have grown ever since their greed brought devastation to this land.
Looks like you're taking care of a wide range of their needs, mmm?
Word on the street is they got you up all night satisfying needs.
Sister, you must be exhausted.
What happened to Wassergrab?

It was a peaceful village until they discovered diamonds and started digging. They devastated their streets and fields, dug under their church and destroyed their own houses. Their greed attracted evil men, who enslaved them.
More money, more problems.
They delved too greedily and too deep, man!
Context: Conversation Witch_1 Text Another nerd LOTR reference

Text: It doesn't sound like you're doing much to help them out.
Says who, the person who is using them for unwitting labor?
Are those crocs yours?
In a sense. I have walked-in the souls of my late husbands to each one of them. I have borrowed their bodies and enchanted them to become my guardians.
And I thought I was the one obsessed with his exes.
I wonder if that counts as polygamy, or maybe just that you're a happy widow.
This is most evil and wicked.
Are you still doing it with...?
No.
So... you are taken... in a sense?
Actually no.
He is down the hole on a spirit journey in the holy cave of our ancestors. I shall join him soon to complete the ritual of unity. Be gone from here, and meddle not in things you do not understand.
Yeah, right, a "ritual".
You, uh, get a lot of guys come in here and explore your hole?
Only those with the proper amount of stamina.
Oh, I don't want to meddle, but I think I might like to watch.
Where is the man who entered your house?
I am a bridge between our world and the Spirit World. He walked through me last night, and I have guided his soul.
Damn, lady, I feel lost! Can you guide my soul as well? I promise we'll be walking in the Spirit World all night long!
Walking in the Spirit World? I don't think I've heard it called that before!
That is beautiful. Two souls joining and moving... in and out... My aura feels flushed and tingling.
Tell us more about the Spirit World
Enlighten me about the Spirit World.
This sounds like pagan nonsense.
I only know one way to get to the Spirit World.
You will talk of Spirit World. I will have snack.
If I promise not to laugh, will you tell me about the Spirit World?
I'm guessing the Spirit World isn't a place I can find on a map, right?
I've travelled a great deal over the years, but I've never visited the Spirit World. I'm keen to learn more about it.
Why is there a shaft near your hut?
What are you doing to the men of Wassergrab?
RedirectRituals
Men from the village come to me for guidance every night, and I am joining with their bodies and souls in search of the wisdom of the spirits... All night long.
A dark hole doesn't look like the most comfortable place for a, err, joining... But you make it sound hot! Ow, did I say that?
At the bottom of a dark hole, huh? Kinky.
Where do I sign up for a ritual or two?
You wicked witch! You are raping men in your pit of sin!
Och! I remember when I used to be able to search for the wisdom of the spirits all night long.
ALL night long? I mean, you take breaks and stuff... right?
This is a gift you are giving. I wish to show you my spirit. Should I just take it out now?
I feel my soul swelling just thinking about it.
You could try just teaching them how to practice self-love... That sounded different in my head.
I am not exactly forcing them. They come willingly, thinking they will enjoy a night of sexual satisfaction.
Who can blame them?
But you turn the tables and use them to get money! It's the honey pot! I love that scam.
I bet they do!

What actually happens is I give them a drug to induce submission and a mild euphoria. Then, I have them dig diamonds for me. In the morning they remember nothing, so they go home exhausted and full of happy thoughts.
This is unfair
Why? I'm selling a dream and they are willingly buying it. Is it my fault that men are stupid?
I hear you, girl!
When you put it that way, I tend to agree.
Wasn't sure I liked you, at first. Now I know I do.
What if we tell them your secret?
You are welcome to try. I don't think anyone will believe you. Over the mundane reality, people always prefer the exciting dream.
Indeed. Most often, we perceive the reality we wish to believe.
Hey! I identify with that remark.
This is why I like sleeping.
You have to stop doing this
And what if I don't? Will you just shoot me? No, you won't, because I am under the protection of powerful spirits. And even if you do, you will only rob the villagers of their dream.
What you're doing is actually cool

I am glad that you understand. Will you keep my secret? Let it become... our secret. If you will honor me as the beautiful and terrible witch, the mistress of this land, I will even share with you a thing or two.
Oh, I'll honor you! I'd honor you twice if you let me!
Ooh... It is quite hot in here, isn't it?
What you want to share wouldn't happen to be at the bottom of a hole, would it?
Indeed, I am willing to offer you diamonds... and more.
Thanks, but we'll stick with the diamonds.
Damn right you'll stick with the diamonds.
Where have I heard THAT before...
A witch's bargain?! How exciting! Hang on, I have a book that talks all about this kind of thing.
supported Lami the Witch
Well keep your secret
Then you deserve to be rewarded.
Yeah, just let's skip the part with the drugs, shall we?
Yes!
Whatever you've been giving those villager dudes, just make mine a double.
Lami the Witch changed her evil ways
You will stop exploiting those men
Whoa... ENTIRELY in our power?
I can gouge out your eyes while you sleep and put them on a crocodile's skull.
Uh, I'll take that as a no.
Until she gets a chance to feed us to another batch of crocs.
I shall become the healer and guide the people of Wassergrab do not deserve, but guide and help them, I will. Greater powers have commanded me, and I obey.
Fidel is greater power! Omnipotent Fidel!!!
It is nice to be recognized.
Don't feel bad. You are strong, for a girl.
You will share your profit with us
I will comply. Ever since you defeated my late husbands, I am in your power.
Whoa there, lady! That escalated quickly. I been married eight times and I'm not ready to make another future ex-wife just yet.
Mmm, domination feels good.
I wish it always worked like that.
Here, this is all I have. I hope it is enough for you. Now please leave this place - I need to bury my husbands' hosts and summon more fools to restore my losses.
You are forcing the men to dig for diamonds
How could I force anyone? I am a woman, and they are big strong men. And besides, has any one complained that I am exploiting them like that?
You are probably drugging them
Your wisdom has penetrated my secrets.
I know manipulation when I see it!
Can't scam a scammer!
I know every trick in the book.
Wait... I was right?
I know a thing or two about what drugs can do to people.
It wasn't hard.
I have good knowledge of wickedness.
The observant mind sees more than what is in front of it.
Call it a gut feeling, Woodstock.
Six years of medical school, actually.
Not the first time I've seen that trick pulled.
I could sense it. Your aura had a chemical smell to it.
Repent, witch! We have power over you!
Nobody expects the A.I.M. inquisition!
Context: Conversation Witch_1 Text Monty Python reference

Text: You are powerless without your spirit guardians!
I have protective charm and you no have ugly monsters anymore.
You do have power over me.
Crocodiles are dead
Hands up!
You dare to threaten me? I am under the protection of ghosts and specters, phantoms and spirits.
Uh-oh, gggghosts!
Unholy power is at work here!
Cute. I'm an Angel of Death. Let's see what happens.
She is obviously referring to the names of her pet crocodiles.
Spirits dont scare us. Hands up!
So be it.
The spirits watch and judge your deeds.
Even in toilet?!
So the spirits are voyeurs, are they now?
We'll see. I'm REALLY good at hiding.
Walk with the spirits and leave me alone already.
May the spirits walk with you.
Uh... Do they have to?
If you mean the crocs, no thanks.
They always do.
And with you.
You are not welcome here. She is dead because of you.
That wasn't half bad! The Beast herself couldn't kill them much faster.
We just annihilated a bunch of thugs and you think that "isn't half bad"? Have you been working in a slaughterhouse, grandpa?
I guess you could say so, but you are too young to let me infect you with such a cynical view of married life.
Good thing you figured out how to summon the Beast! You probably couldn't deal with those guys without her.
We can fry any scuzzwad who stands in our way.
Agreed! They might have had us in a bit of a sticky wicket if it weren't for her help.
We have hunted all kinds of people... and beasts.
Thank you for liberating the workers at Belle Eau and arming our young people. Now they can defend us, and our poor old Beast can take some days off.
Who are you calling old? My hearing is still very good, you absent-minded wizard.
Now that you have armed and trained my neighbors, we're all dangerous Beasts! She won't need to worry as much about us anymore.
Thank you for liberating those poor young people at Belle Eau. They are the future of Grand Chien! We old Beasts, we belong to the past.
Speak for yourself.
It's a glorious day for engineering!
You have my full, uh... Where did I put that thing?
Oh hey! Can you pass me that wrench over there? Thanks!
Hello! Pass me that hammer, would you?
Hello!
The Beast is a she?!
Aren't they all?
You want me to smash your face in with a brick?
Non-non! I was just joking! Women are more like gentle and tender flowers.
That's it, I'm looking for a brick.
In more ways than one, but some of us are cute and foxy little beasts.
I do not think that is an accurate or at all kind thing to say.
You can call me a beast if you want, but I think we both know who the pig is.
You do realize that I know seven different ways to kill you just from where I'm standing, right?
Well, that was uncalled for!
Gimme a break, mon.
You are very lucky that I happen to excel at showing patience and restraint toward male jackasses.
If they wish to survive.
That's not very nice!
I can hear you, old man.
Oh well, beasts can sometimes be lovely as well. In the case of this particular Beast, "sometimes" translates to "long ago".
Long ago you were young and foolish. These days, you're just plain foolish.
Tell us about the Beast
Well, she's a bloodthirsty monster, who happens to be my ex-wife and probably also an ex-human...

...Hmm, no reaction. Okay, I guess she's not listening. Look, I'll tell you this - she's got the heart of a warrior and the spirit of an angel. Even though we've separated, I'm always going to help her protect our people.
You... You sweet, silly old bastard.
Have you been eavesdropping, woman?! Forget what I told you. She's a horrible monster with donkey ears. Nothing but trouble!
You're impossible, Wlad.
Did you make the Effigy?
Oh, yes! It was easy to design and fun to build. The Beast Suit was a much greater engineering challenge, but it turned out to be quite successful as well.
Oh, I'd really like to take a look at what's under that thing's hood, mon!
It's one badass suit. I'd love to see how you put it together.
I could certainly use something like that for myself. I don't move as good as I used to.
It helped her silence dozens of those bandits. But there are always more of them. Without the suit, her constant acts of bravery would have killed her by now.
Did you just call me "brave"?
Also, the mask is a great aesthetic improvement to her face.
You're truly insufferable.
You and the Beast were a couple?
Yeah, I was married to a Beast. Not uncommon, when you think of it. Guess that makes me the Beauty, eh?
You should really craft yourself a mirror.
Oh I did, but it broke to pieces when you looked into it.
Ha. Ha.
Can't you fight the Legion?
There are mostly just old and sick people left around here. We're not soldiers. Look at me - I'm a grease monkey. I'm good at putting stuff together, not taking people apart.
Wlad may be an old and ugly angel, but as for me, I have no problem with violence. Teach the others to use guns and I'll be joining them to murder any scum that tries to rob our village.
Perhaps you could teach the others to shoot. We need a militia.
Is the Legion giving you trouble?
Ah, me? Non. But they have taken all the younger people and forced them to dive for diamonds in Belle Eau over there, across the river.
Me and, um, my ex-wife - we don't have children, but the others do, and they're worried sick.
Cant the Beast liberate Belle Eau?
Well, she can be quite a pain in the ass - of all people, I should know - but she couldn't handle a job like that alone.
You're saying I'm unable to kill a bunch of bandits?!
Brunhilde... Please don't. The suit is designed for ambushes, not frontal assaults on prepared positions. It's too much to ask of one fighter... Even one that's a Beast.
We will liberate Belle Eau
Really? Can you?
Can lead fly? Can horses laugh? Can cannery can? Of course we can!
You mentioned they're kidnapping young people and using them as slaves. We will end them.
Trust me, my man, it's what I live for.
Hell, yeah. They about to find out what happens when the Iceman cometh.
You just get yourself someplace safe. Hurricane Norma is comin' to town.
Your young people will be saved and their captors sent back to Shaitan. This I swear.
Look, if you go to liberate Belle Eau, I think I can arrange some, uh, unexpected reinforcements for you.
Yeah. Totally unexpected. But yes, I will be there.
So you are an engineer?
More like an inventor. I love to fiddle with gadgets until I make them work. Sometimes the result can be surprising, and that's the best part.
Like that one time when you turned our only washing machine into some weird fishing device?!
Yeah! Exactly!
You know what? If you bring me some parts, I can craft something for you! I guarantee it will be something that works, but, uh... I can't promise it will always be what you might need.
I needed. A washing. Machine.
Craft something for us
There you go! A bit ugly, but it is still a very functional machete.
Ugly but functional? I see you're taking self-expression through your work very seriously.
Ha-ha, very funny.
You see? It can slice through two bad guys in one swipe... and still cut a tomato!
Context: Conversation Wlad_1 Text commercials / Warcraft 3 Blademaster reference

Text: Now, that's a knife!
I'll take it! No questions asked.
Oh, yeah. Come to papa, baby.
Ugh... This was supposed to be a plasma gun, but apparently it can work only in vacuum. Anyway, it could still be useful as a crowbar.
I love it! It is just like a stormtrooper blaster - can't hit anything at distance.
I love it! It's just like a stormtrooper blaster - can't hit anything at distance.
I think I could use this... but I have no idea for what.
That's the spirit!
This device sounds very strange to me. I like it.

See, I attached a few plates to this leather jacket... It will provide some decent protection for a while. Also, there is a drink holder on its belly, so you have a place to put your coffee when killing people.
Whoa, man. I don't know what pills you're on, but I want some, too!
Oh, so you can fix coffee holders? The one on my home computer is broken and I don't know what to do to fix it.
The coffee holder on your... computer?
Yes. It doesn't retract anymore when I press the button.
A field medic's dream come true!
You are now friend of Fidel for life!
When you take a light helmet as a base and weld additional armor here and there...
Man, this thing is lit! The folks at Burning Man would love it.
Man, this thing is lit! The folks at Burning Man would love it.
This thing looks like it could stop a rocket, maybe even a nuke.
Could be very useful if bomb goes off near head.
Hmm. This happens every now and again - I slap some random parts together, and out pops an AK-47.

Context: Conversation Wlad_1 Text "Hero" - sign of approval

Text: You have Russian origins, do you?
Non. But my mother was a Bulgarian from Kasanlak. She worked at the sewing machine factory there.
Ah, I see. Special Soviet sewing machines.
Funny thing that. "Out pops an AK-47" is the working title of my memoir.
You are one hell of a useful guy to have around.
Here, I made some modifications to your rifle! I hope you like it.
Entire Russian army work for YEARS to produce this, and you just assemble it in your garage?!
I would kiss you, but I'm a married woman.
Well, I'm glad you like it.
So, I guess I'm kissing you, but just with my mind.
Um...
Not in a weird way. Just, like, in a friendly way.
I see...
Like, just little mind-kisses. I'm blowing little mind-kisses at you.
Ooooo-kay...
That ain't no rifle. That's a work of art.
Craft
Umm, this was supposed to be a trumpet, but I just can't tune it very well...
Why the hell would we need a trumpet, Woody?
However, with a few modifications it can work fairly well as a grenade launcher.
I... I am speechless.
Now that's the kind of instrument that can make some beautiful music.
Come here, baby. Let momma love you.
That is not necessary.
I was talking to the rocket gun!
This instrument will play a beautiful symphony of destruction.
, ! If we bring many parts, can you build   ?
Context: Conversation Wlad_1 Text "peaceful Soviet tractor" is a very specific Soviet joke

Text: Oh, yes! But first I should build a Beastmobile, or that devilish woman will keep nagging me.
Bye! See you later.

Survival of a merc is always A.I.M.'s top priority so we STRONGLY urge commanders to take a Doctor in battle. Hello,

I just wanted to thank you for making us see sense. As if Tinhay's death was not enough, I was about to kill my oldest friend. I shudder to think what would have happened if you did not stop me. Perhaps we shouldn't have let that snake Herman get off so lightly, but what's done is done.

Again, thank you. I am glad I do not have my friend's blood on my hands.

I wish you luck, my friends.
Basil
basil54@gcmail.gc
Thank you

I write to you, because I want compensation for the absolutely horrible conditions in this country. I was given your mail as someone I can complain to. I was told this country is Morocco but it was not and no one compensated me for it being the wrong country! And after that things got only worse. I have created a list of my current complaints:

<bullet_point> No one was speaking American.
<bullet_point> The refugee camp where I was forcefully relocated was a 1-star establishment at best.
<bullet_point> The camp was open to all nationalities. I wanted to be placed in an American camp, but a person had the gall to inform me there was no such thing. I am shocked and scandalized.
<bullet_point> I was robbed of my passport and belongings and no one compensated me for my worries. In fact, there did not seem to be a manager anywhere. After I tried to contact the government, they informed me that their manager is missing. The audacity of these people!
<bullet_point> After my passport was returned, I was not compensated with a first-class seat on the plane. I was even told there is no first class in cargo planes. I have written to the manager of the company but I still have received no response. These people value no one's time!

All in all this is turning worse than my last vacation where I wanted to go to Acapulco and ended up in a place called Arulco. Such uncivilized people.

I wish to be compensated for my troubles and all persons responsible are to be fired immediately!

Karen Gosling
Karen Gosling
Atrocious conditions

Salutations, This email will serve as a temporary contract for your services to Adonis. This is necessary for us to provide the payment I have promised to you on behalf of Emma LaFontaine. As you may notice, it isn't stipulating any details about the nature of your services. Any specific work that has not already been agreed upon will be covered in additional agreements that we will sign later as the need arises. In short, you are expected to establish control over diamond mines on the mainland and to deal with any persons or organizations who are illegally possessing/operating them. Adonis has an exclusive contract to own and operate these mines, so please ensure they are in working order and adequately staffed and managed. In return, you will be paid daily per mine based on their diamond output. I advise you to earn the Loyalty and support of the local populace, as this will dramatically affect each mine's productivity and proportionally increase the diamond yield (i.e., profits). As a sign of good will, I'm wiring you an advance payment. However, I expect you will soon need to start establishing control over diamond mines to secure a steady income in order to pay for and maintain the full effectiveness of your team in the field. My suggestion is to charter a boat from Ernie and travel ASAP to the mainland. You will find on your digital map the coordinates of the specific diamond mines where you are expected to perform the services outlined above. Also, I will send your way any intelligence we have about illegal diamond shipments in the region. If you are able to intercept some of those, we will gladly compensate you for the effort. Good luck. C. Santiago Adonis Corp. Director of Operations
csantiago@adonismanagement.com
CONFIDENTIAL: Your mercenary contract

BREAKING NEWS: HUNDREDS KILLED IN REFUGEE CAMP MASSACRE Hundreds of refugees have been killed in an unprecedented attack in the troubled Adjani River Valley of Grand Chien. This is the heaviest incident of civilian casualties in the country since the civil war several years ago. The region is still unstable after the disappearance of Grand Chien's president Alphonse LaFontaine during his visit to the Adjani. Asked who is responsible for the attack, Col. Faucheux of the Army of Grand Chien revealed that it was committed by international paramilitary groups known as M.E.R.C. and A.I.M. The Colonel stated that a large detachment of Grand Chien's army has been tasked with saving the President and restoring order in the region. He is determined to make the guilty parties pay a "heavy price" for the atrocities. *** This is what reached the world news. The local TV is way worse - they call you fascists and monsters, and scream for vengeance. I watched an interview with Colonel Faucheux and he was blaming you for literally everything that is wrong in our country. I don't like that man. I remember when I went to him and begged him to do something to save my father. He told me they were doing everything they could, and that there was a "special operation for saving him, don't you worry your pretty little head". Who talks like that?! And now he doesn't even answer my calls, and neither does Corazon Santiago. I think we cannot trust her anymore. I heard about troop movements of Adonis security forces that cooperated with the Grand Chien army. I don't know the details. Some of my friends in government have gone silent, and I'm worried there is some plot in motion here. This country needs its President now more than ever. I fear that if he doesn't return very soon, there will be another civil war. I don't know what part the Major plays in all this, but I have learned that his camp is far in the Northeast - the Eagle's Nest. My father is being kept there. Please save him before it's too late! I think you can't rely on Adonis for payment anymore. It was difficult to get alternative funding for you, but I managed to make an arrangement with local administrators to help you run the diamond mines you control. My father will owe them some favors, but as long as you succeed in rescuing him... Well, that's all that matters. That's all I've got for now. I wish you luck with all my heart! Emma
emmalafontaine@gcmail.gc
I still believe in you.

Hey, I'm back at the capital. I'm trying to organize the funeral for my poor father... It is a terrible mess here - there is fighting on the streets and explosions every now and again. The people loyal to my father managed to get the army units garrisoning the capital under control, but some of the generals elsewhere in the country have turned against us and sent forces to try and occupy the city. We are under siege. People are talking, and they are very much divided in their opinions. Many believe that you are responsible for the Refugee Camp Massacre. There are lies and exaggerations about you everywhere. They say that my father was a traitor who handed over all of the diamond mines in Grand Chien to you, and then you killed him. I am pretty sure that Corazon Santiago is behind that smear campaign, but I cannot prove anything. We desperately need the truth. Santiago and her machinations with Faucheux need to be exposed. You have to find evidence against them. This will help clear your name and show our people that they have been deceived. The least I can do for you is to extend your contract for as long as you need to make that happen. My father wouldn't have it any other way... This is the least I can do to honor his memory. I wish you luck. Emma
emmalafontaine@gcmail.gc
I'm not giving up

Hi everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Adonis director suddenly resigns Corazon Santiago, Director of Operations for Adonis corp. has suddenly resigned according to Daily Chienne sources. The decision left many on the board of Adonis flummoxed as it was considered a safe bet that Corazon will be the next CEO of Adonis. There is little information about the whys of the resignation with the official statement citing "personal reasons". Corazon was leading the Adonis expansion to Grand Chien, first as assistant to then CEO Mike Ditch and later as director of operations after his disappearance. She pushed hard for legislation that would give Adonis exclusive mining rights to Grand Chien's natural resources which would lead to a de facto monopoly over the diamond mining sector. The controversy around Santiago One potential reason why Corazon has resigned may be the flurry of scandals around her in recent weeks. Adonis was accused of financing the Major and his Legion while the infamous paramilitary organization was still in its infancy. She was also accused of meddling in Grand Chien politics through her contacts with Col. Jules Faucheux of the Grand Chien army. A cabinet secretary has even suggested that the two are "romantically involved". Adonis has vehemently denied all of the accusations, but the umbrage of bad press is bound to continue with Corazon's sudden departure. Whether the scandals have had any bearing on her decision is yet to be seen. However, in the world of corporate politics the public image is everything. The Daily Chienne's "Female Leaders" conference canceled, keynote speaker still missing With a heavy heart, we must cancel our first "Female Leaders" conference due to the disappearance of Petta Waters, the keynote speaker. Petta had arrived earlier in Grand Chien with the idea of creating a natural reserve where "the rights of every animal should be preserved and respected". Unfortunately, we are still to receive a word of Petta's current location ever since she announced her intention to acquire hyena specimens for the habitat. The Daily Chienne hopes that Petta Waters is alive and well and will soon return and continue with her plans for the "Democratic society of animals and humans". What's next? We always try to follow the hot pulse of Grand Chien; however, recent conflicts are heavily influencing our production schedule, so we will update as soon as time (and safety) allows. Remember, no one can silence the Daily Chienne. Love, Cary Not subscribed to this newsletter? Click here to unsubscribe.
The Daily Chienne Newsletter
Resignations, scandals, a canceled conference :((

Hello everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Something good for once The Creutzfeldt-Jakob Sanatorium is organizing a massive blood drive. If the initiative is successful, medical experts believe that up to five thousand people that would have otherwise died in hospital due to a lack of blood for transfusions may be saved this year alone. All volunteers will be compensated until the initiative runs out of budget. Several international NGOs are backing the drive and it is expected to run for months with the current rate of participation. If you are in the area of the Creutzfeldt-Jakob Sanatorium, please take some time to visit and donate blood. Your child, relative, or loved one may one day depend on the blood you give today. A new disease? To somewhat temper the good news, there are reports of a new disease spreading throughout the jungle region of the Adjani dubbed "Red Rabies". The disease is reportedly a less lethal, more virulent variation of the rabies virus. In layman's terms, the infected become completely irrational and aggressive lacking any self-control and attacking on sight. Dr. Kronenberg at the Creutzfeldt-Jakob Sanatorium claims the disease is a hoax (this was corroborated by the physician in Chalet De La Paix, the only big settlement in the area). Can one hope that at least one bad thing may spare us? I certainly hope so - with all the conflicts and strife this country has been through, the last thing we need is a disease outbreak, especially from a disease causing more violence. Rumors galore If the disease rumors turn out to be a hoax, this will not be the first wild rumor flying around. Let's start with the rumors of a ghost in the Abandoned Mansion of former Adonis CEO, Mike Ditch. These stories have circulated for years but since the mansion has been overtaken by the Legion, they have gained new legs and sprinted their way through a gullible population hungry for sensationalism. A "witch" is supposed to live in Wassergrab, doing sexual rituals to the men in the area to keep her youth. Apparently, these people have invented a novel way of explaining absences to their wives after visiting a brothel. Most of these rumors sound bizarre, but perhaps I'd like to think there is a modicum of truth to every such rumor. A more sinister tale is the cult of the \"Old Ones\" in Chalet De La Paix. Not only has the cult damaged a lot of the Borassus plants in the area, but it appears they are also into animal sacrifice (and even human sacrifice, according to unsubstantiated claims by the local physician). I always like to think there is a modicum of truth to these rumors but as we are understaffed, we cannot investigate further. For now, follow our newsletter where we give you real facts and real journalism. Our integrity is impeccable. (We apologize for the unsubstantiated claim that there are secret government bio laboratories - we have fired the intern responsible for that unfortunate story.) What's next? We always try to follow the hot pulse of Grand Chien; however, recent conflicts are heavily influencing our production schedule, so we will update as soon as time (and safety) allows. Remember, no one can silence the Daily Chienne. Love, Cary Not subscribed to this newsletter? Click here to unsubscribe.
The Daily Chienne Newsletter
Good news, diseases, and rumors

Hello everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Legion loses ground In a stunning turn of events, we have eyewitness reports claiming Ernie Island is no longer under Legion control. After reports of fighting on the island following the execution of one Tinhay Mercedes, it appears the Legion has lost its main stronghold located in Fort l'Eau Bleu. So far, we have conflicting reports of who now controls the island with some reports stating a local militia has overthrown the Legion, while others claim unknown paramilitary forces are to blame (see below). Multiple Reports of paramilitary mercenary groups in Grand Chien There is a huge surge of reported sightings of mercenary squads in Grand Chien. In the last month alone, we have received eyewitness accounts of heavily armed foreign forces around the Great Savanna, Ernie Island and various other locations. Our anonymous sources claim the sightings are real and are part of Adonis Corporation's pledge to protect its interests in the country. So far, Adonis is declining any further comments, instead issuing a blanket statement that they will do their utmost to protect their personnel and assets in Grand Chien. Kerfuffle at the Carnival In an amusing local news story, the events of the Carnival of Love in Pantagruel were marred by the appearance of armed forces. Reports of the following events differ greatly, but it appears a mercenary force was trying to fight or infiltrate Carnival. What followed was a scene of carnage and drug infused mayhem - over thirty carts were tipped, multiple girls groped without permission or payment, and fireworks or explosives unleashed. Since this is pretty standard fare as far as Carnival goes, the locals were amused instead of perturbed - until it was discovered that the Carnival Queen herself had gone missing. "The foreigners are now taking not only the great riches of this land, but its women too!", a local was heard saying. What's next? We always try to follow the hot pulse of Grand Chien; however, recent conflicts are heavily influencing our production schedule, so we will update as soon as time (and safety) allows. Remember, no one can silence the Daily Chienne. Love, Cary Not subscribed to this newsletter? Click here to unsubscribe.

Hi everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Leader of atrocities committee presumed dead Colonel Jules Faucheux has gone missing and is presumed dead. Information about the subject is scarce, but there are reports about the colonel's compound being attacked by unknown paramilitary forces. Jules Faucheux was a divisive figure in Grand Chien politics. He cemented his power by supporting President LaFontaine in the country's first democratic elections after the civil war, but was often at loggerheads with his commander-in-chief. His firm belief in force rather than dialogue alienated him from the more liberal supporters of the President's party, causing a permanent rift in the government. Had he completed his goal of capturing the foreign agents he proclaimed as responsible for the Refugee Camp Massacre, many feel he would have become a de facto leader of the country in the absence of Alphonse LaFontaine. Rumors abound about the missing Colonel The disappearance of the colonel gave rise to a number of rumors about his person and his political agenda. Many feel that his ties with Adonis mean he had an ongoing agreement with the corporation offering them a monopoly over the country's mining resources, in return for political and military support. This theory is corroborated by a Faucheux secretary claiming the existence of hidden coded communication between Adonis and Col. Faucheux. Others have pointed out that his detachment is the only military unit in the region that had access to chemical weapons, and he should be the one that is investigated. These rumors will only gain credence now that the colonel is no longer in power and the government may take closer look into the missing colonel's private affairs. Grand Chien art world shocked - new private collection emerges The small but vocal art critic society of Grand Chien was shocked to discover an extensive private collection suddenly put on auction late last week. "Some of the works are priceless and were thought to be lost forever", a stunned critic commented. What's next? We always try to follow the hot pulse of Grand Chien; however, recent conflicts are heavily influencing our production schedule, so we will update as soon as time (and safety) allows. Hello everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Legion losing ground in the Fleatown area Legion continues to lose ground. This time Fleatown is the scene of battle as another Legion force has been routed. There is little information about what has actually occurred, but all sources confirm that at least part of the city has been freed from Legion forces. Are foreign forces deliberately seeking to supplant the strongest paramilitary force in the region? We are currently investigating claims of a small elite force thrashing Legion forces in its way. More on this story as it unfolds. Fleatown - unruly and poverty-stricken Fleatown has always been an unruly place even under the rule of the Legion. With all the ongoing turf wars and the ubiquitous poverty, it is often cited as one of Grand Chien's crime hotspots. Just a few weeks prior to the current battles, a midday shootout happened at the market. It appears a foreign teenager got into hot water with a local thug gang and suddenly shots were fired. The local authorities claim it was just a misunderstanding over a girl, but our reports show that at least one person was killed in the shootout. The quick reaction by community leaders such as Father Tooker and the underground kingpin Boss Blaubert himself stopped the shootout from escalating further, but such events are commonplace in Fleatown. It is unlikely that in the current era of instability Fleatown's fortune would improve. The gangs offer the youths of the city a quick way to riches, and the Legion - a quick way to vent their anger. The few remaining good seeds leave the city to seek their fortune in Port Cacao or abroad. Perhaps one day we will have a government that may lead Fleatown and Grand Chien out of the pit, but for now, the future looks dark. The House of Blessed Spirits What does it cost to save your soul - a question posed by many philosophers, intellectuals, and clergy. A local priest by the name of Father Tooker has an unusual answer - diamonds. Tooker is an unusual breed - a mountain of a man that looks more likely to rob you than save you, a clergyman and, at the same time, a firm believer in superstitions prevalent across Grand Chien. When asked how both combine, the Father just shrugs his shoulders and claims he sees no difference between the two. After years of failing to keep his church financially stable and keep the locals out of trouble, Tooker took a more pragmatic approach - pay for your way to heaven. The church allows everyone who donates a diamond or cash to the Church a blessing and absolution of all sins. According to Father Tooker, all proceeds are returned to the community which is at least partially corroborated by the community - soup is widely distributed to the poor in the area even if the contents are more than questionable. Is this "patron saint of diamonds" as clear as the stones he asks of his parishioners? It is hard to make moral judgements in a town like Fleatown. He is at least trying to do something in a city that both the government and God have abandoned long ago. I have seen with my own eyes that the church wall was damaged, and I hope that the sums Father Tooker has gathered will be sufficient to repair this daring attempt at sacral architecture. What's next? We always try to follow the hot pulse of Grand Chien; however, recent conflicts are heavily influencing our production schedule, so we will update as soon as time (and safety) allows. Remember, no one can silence the Daily Chienne. Love, Cary Not subscribed to this newsletter? Click here to unsubscribe.

Happy April everyone. Cary here with the latest news from Grand Chien. Legion executes local on Ernie Island The Legion's cold grip on the heart of the nation does not seem to be relenting with a reported execution in the small town of Ernie, located off the southern coast of Grand Chien. We have received reports that a local was dragged from his home and killed in the center of town for "insubordination to the Legion". It appears that the lofty goals of the Legion certainly do not match their methods. Further clashes near Pantagruel Communist militias have clashed once again with Legion forces. Both sides blame each other for the hostilities and vow for revenge. Meanwhile, the Army continues its policy of non-interference, no doubt waiting for both groups to exhaust each other's supplies and will to fight. As usual, there was no comment from the government related to the recent events. Questions abound as President still missing It has been multiple days since the abduction of President LaFontaine by the Legion forces. While the Legion has publicly made several statements indicating they have the President, state officials are refusing to comment on the President's whereabouts and potential Legion involvement. There are several anti-Legion protests in throughout the country, but so far little has changed in the life of the ordinary citizens. We will continue to monitor the situation as more information comes to light. What's next? Hello everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Mining exports from Grand Chien expected to plummet As the political situation in Grand Chien continues to unravel, there are fears that the mining operations on the island will ground to a halt. Adonis, one of the few remaining corporations still doing business in the region, has publicly commented that they have taken "all possible measures" to ensure that their mines are still operational. Rumors are, the Legion controls most diamond mines but is losing ground to a faction or factions unknown. We will continue to follow this story closely. "We will not wage a war, but we will protect our assets and personnel" vows Adonis representative In a recent interview with the Daily Chienne, Adonis representative Corazon Santiago has reiterated that they will use force to protect their mining operation from the threat of the Legion and other rebel groups. Crocodile attacks on the rise. Farmers panic Crocodile attacks are at an all-time high this year. Crocodile-related accidents are threatening the livelihood of farmers in the swampier regions of Grand Chien, causing much discontent in the nation. "Rebels, Legion, and now crocodiles. Lead scientists claim that the recent climate change may have caused a crocodile population boom, which would explain the increased number of violent attacks. Hello everyone! Your next dose of truth and news by Cary is here. Pantagruel free from the Legion for now In a surprising statement from the local Maquis forces, it appears they have taken control of the city of Pantagruel. This is surprising, as the battles over the city were in a longstanding stalemate with little hope of either side managing to gain an advantage. It is unclear what has tipped the balance in favor of the Maquis (apart from the claims that communism will always succeed in the end), but the locals tell of additional armed forces under no banner that joined the fray. Will Maqui control of the city continue or will the Legion regroup to take back the city? Only the future holds the answers at this point. Maquis prisoners Numerous reports of a number of Maquis taken prisoners by Legion forces have emerged with the liberation of Pantagruel. Local Maqui forces are furious as their comrades are still held captive and no rescue operation is planned as of yet with the precarious state of the city. "They are our brothers and sisters! The Legion has no right to keep them captive, which only proves their corrupt capitalist ways!" is a popular sentiment among the local fighters. Curiously, a new local myth of a communist superhero nicknamed "The Unyielding" is keeping the pressure in check. According to the whispers, that alleged superhero is able to withstand any torture and is a shining beacon for all proper communists. While there is little to support this story, it has soothed the fears of the Maquis about the fate of their comrades. "If the Unyielding is left unbroken, our brothers and sisters will be safe. We must persevere as communism will surely defeat capitalism in the end" said a happy soldier by the name of Anne. A night at Le Lys Rouge Paid article> I was offered a free night at Le Lys Rouge - one of Pantagruel's highlights, according to some. The establishment called by many a brothel is slightly more expensive than its competitors, but sports a modicum of cleanliness rarely seen in such quarters. The clients seemed happy with the services rendered and the drinks are more decent than one would expect. Le Lys Rouge has three-tiered system of services called "Look, Touch, and More". I was able to sample only the first two tiers before feeling the urge to vacate the premises and can assure you they offer exactly what it says on the tin. While Le Lys Rouge is not for everybody (this reporter included), it remains an institution in Pantagruel that is worth the visit even if for the drinks alone. What's next?
