Text: That's daft. It will only give me away.
Context: VoiceResponse Red AimAttack_LowStealth VoiceResponse AimAttack_LowStealth - When aiming and there is very low chance of hitting. Used while Sneaking - voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: Running low on ammo. Kinda important, ammo. Ye ken?
Context: VoiceResponse Red AmmoLow VoiceResponse AmmoLow - Played when there is less than 25% of clip size or a full reload cannot be made

Text: Got a wee beastie here.
Context: VoiceResponse Red AnimalFound VoiceResponse AnimalFound - Enemy animal spotted.

Text: There. That will keep yer blood on the right side of your body.
Context: VoiceResponse Red BandageDownedUnit VoiceResponse BandageDownedUnit - When a downed unit is bandaged. Played by the unit that does the bandaging

Text: This willnae go well. With my luck they will spot me.
Context: VoiceResponse Red BecomeHidden VoiceResponse BecomeHidden - Played when entering Sneak mode. Voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: Deadly and quiet, like my farts after good haggis.
Context: VoiceResponse Red BecomeHidden VoiceResponse BecomeHidden - Played when entering Sneak mode. Voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: Aye, I'm working. Don't you be worrying about that.
Context: VoiceResponse Red BusySatView VoiceResponse BusySatView - Played when merc is in an activity for more than 8 hours. Students and Patients excluded. Played once per activity.

Text: (climbing)
Context: VoiceResponse Red Climbing VoiceResponse Climbing - Emote. When unit is climbing over fences, on cliffs, etc.

Text: (climbing_2)
Context: VoiceResponse Red Climbing VoiceResponse Climbing - Emote. When unit is climbing over fences, on cliffs, etc.

Text: Of course, there's more about. We couldda be finished by now, but nooo. They have to stroll about and make a nuisance of themselves.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatEndEnemiesRemain VoiceResponse CombatEndEnemiesRemain - There are no more aware enemies but there are still enemies in the sector.

Text: Dodgers. They did an offski. Just us here now.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatEndEnemiesRetreated VoiceResponse CombatEndEnemiesRetreated - All enemies have retreated

Text: Ach, looks like I got out alive from another one. Mind you, with my luck, I will probably get into another fight just five minutes from now, so this is no cause for celebration.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatEndNoEnemies VoiceResponse CombatEndNoEnemies - All enemies have been killed.

Text: Och, aye..
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovement VoiceResponse CombatMovement - When ordering movement in combat. Up to one full sentence or two short ones.

Text: Dinnae shoot at me, ya bastards!
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovement VoiceResponse CombatMovement - When ordering movement in combat. Up to one full sentence or two short ones.

Text: All right, I'm moving.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovement VoiceResponse CombatMovement - When ordering movement in combat. Up to one full sentence or two short ones.

Text: Yeah, yeah.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovement VoiceResponse CombatMovement - When ordering movement in combat. Up to one full sentence or two short ones.

Text: Quietly now, Red.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovementStealth VoiceResponse CombatMovementStealth - When ordering movement while sneaking. Voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: I hope they don't see me.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatMovementStealth VoiceResponse CombatMovementStealth - When ordering movement while sneaking. Voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: Of course they bloody saw me. They couldda be lookin' at funny clouds or summat else. But noooo... They look for the only freakin' Scot that's mad enough to be prancin' about here.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatStartDetected VoiceResponse CombatStartDetected - When enemy detects a merc who was hiding.

Text: Let's shoot guns, kill each other, and have a pint later.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatStartPlayer VoiceResponse CombatStartPlayer - When player initiates combat with shot.

Text: The wee complication has been sorted. I'm proud of ya.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatTaskCompleted VoiceResponse CombatTaskCompleted - When the Combat Task issued by the merc is completed

Text: This team is bollocks! Can't even handle a wee complication.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatTaskFailed VoiceResponse CombatTaskFailed - When the Combat Task issued by the merc is failed

Text: I think we should add a wee complication to make things interesting.
Context: VoiceResponse Red CombatTaskGiven VoiceResponse CombatTaskGiven - When the merc sets the player a new Combat Task

Text: So, that's it then? Well, can't blame ya for cuttin' this old highlander loose. Best of luck to ya!
Context: VoiceResponse Red ContractExpired VoiceResponse ContractExpired - when the mercs contract expires and the player has not extended it

Text: That one was a prude and a Dane but I still feel a wee bit sad. Just a wee bit, mind you. At least I'll no have her criticizing mah laundry!
Context: VoiceResponse Red DeathDislike1 VoiceResponse DeathDislike1 - Played on the death of Buns.

Text: You get sloppy, you get killed. Hope that gets some of ya more serious about what we do here.
Context: VoiceResponse Red DeathGeneral VoiceResponse DeathGeneral - Played when a character that is neither liked or disliked dies

Text: Well, at least now we'll finally have some peace and quiet.
Context: VoiceResponse Red DeathLearnToDislike1 VoiceResponse DeathLearnToDislike1 - Played on the death of character who became disliked - Livewire.

Text: Ach, just my luck. It's locked.
Context: VoiceResponse Red DoorLocked VoiceResponse DoorLocked - When a attempting to open locked door

Text: Ach figures. It was only a matter of time before they got me.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Downed VoiceResponse Downed - When entering Downed state. Voice should be as if losing consciousness

Text: Need ma sleep. I'm no good to ya like this.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Exhausted VoiceResponse Exhausted - when the merc becomes Exhausted

Text: Of course, when Miss Perfect makes a mistake, I will be the one on the receiving end.
Context: VoiceResponse Red FriendlyFireDislike1 VoiceResponse FriendlyFireDislike1 - Played on friendly fire by the unit hit if the hitting unit is Disiked - Buns.

Text: Don't shoot at me, you halfwit. I'm on your side.
Context: VoiceResponse Red FriendlyFireGeneral VoiceResponse FriendlyFireGeneral - Played on friendly fire by the unit hit if the hitting unit is neither Liked or Disliked

Text: Oi, Chatterbox! Look where yer shooting, will ya?
Context: VoiceResponse Red FriendlyFireLearnToDislike1 VoiceResponse FriendlyFireLearnToDislike1 - Played on friendly fire by the unit hit if the hitting unit is Disliked - Livewire.

Text: (coughing)
Context: VoiceResponse Red GasAreaSelection VoiceResponse GasAreaSelection - Unit receiving gas effect or starting round in one.

Text: Let's move, lads.
Context: VoiceResponse Red GroupOrder VoiceResponse GroupOrder - When movement ordered in follow mode or multi selected with other mercs.

Text: Aye.
Context: VoiceResponse Red GroupOrder VoiceResponse GroupOrder - When movement ordered in follow mode or multi selected with other mercs.

Text: We'll fuckin' go.
Context: VoiceResponse Red GroupOrder VoiceResponse GroupOrder - When movement ordered in follow mode or multi selected with other mercs.

Text: Ah, why bother? They will still get me in the end.
Context: VoiceResponse Red HealReceived VoiceResponse HealReceived - Bandaged by a merc or Metvirion used in Inventory

Text: I'm feeling about as well as could be expected.
Context: VoiceResponse Red HealReceivedSatView VoiceResponse HealReceivedSatView - When a wound is removed by a Sector Operation. Uses HealReceived if blank.

Text: Steady on, Red. Ya been in worse pickles.
Context: VoiceResponse Red HeavilyWoundedSelection VoiceResponse HeavilyWoundedSelection - Selected or autoselected with less than 20% health

Text: (heavy breath)
Context: VoiceResponse Red HeavyBreathing VoiceResponse HeavyBreathing - During physical exertion

Text: (heavy breath_2)
Context: VoiceResponse Red HeavyBreathing VoiceResponse HeavyBreathing - During physical exertion

Text: I wonder what's on the telly right now.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Idle VoiceResponse Idle - Play every 4 hours during which a squad has been inactive.. Played by any of the mercs in the squad.

Text: Ach. Now that's interesting.
Context: VoiceResponse Red InteractableFound VoiceResponse InteractableFound - A custom interactable (quest related etc), herbs or salvage material found.

Text: Bet we can do something with that.
Context: VoiceResponse Red InteractableFound VoiceResponse InteractableFound - A custom interactable (quest related etc), herbs or salvage material found.

Text: We ought to be checking this sector in my opinion.
Context: VoiceResponse Red InterestingSector VoiceResponse InterestingSector - Reached a sector that is marked as interesting. There is somethingin there the player should explore.

Text: Ma equipment's breaking down. I feel it in my bones. Also, we haven't done maintenance in ages.
Context: VoiceResponse Red ItemDeteriorates VoiceResponse ItemDeteriorates - Played when a piece of equipment deteriotes to the point when it is in the Needs Repair condition

Text: Och. I've donated better equipment to the Salvation Army.
Context: VoiceResponse Red ItemInPoorConditionEquipped VoiceResponse ItemInPoorConditionEquipped - Played in Inventory when player equips weapon/armor that is in Poor Condition

Text: (jumping over something)

Text: (jumping over something_2)
Context: VoiceResponse Red Jumping VoiceResponse Jumping - When jumping over small obstacles (e.g. puddles)

Text: Well now I'm going to have to live forever, as when I die, I will be placed in hell where I will be nagged at for eternity by the prudish Dane for killing her.
Context: VoiceResponse Red KillFriendlyFireDislike1 VoiceResponse KillFriendlyFireDislike1 - Played when a unit kills an ally with friendly fire and the dying unit is Disliked - Buns.

Text: Now you've gone and done it, Red. One little slip and I go an kill one of our own. The insurance forms will be a nightmare, they will.
Context: VoiceResponse Red KillFriendlyFireGeneral VoiceResponse KillFriendlyFireGeneral - Played when a unit kills an ally with friendly fire and the dying unit is neither Liked nor Disliked

Text: Well, I was right that all that chattering will get someone killed. Only, I didn't reckon on being the one doing the killing.
Context: VoiceResponse Red KillFriendlyFireLearnToDislike1 VoiceResponse KillFriendlyFireLearnToDislike1 - Played when a unit kills an ally with friendly fire and the dying unit has become Disliked - Livewire.

Text: Jesus, girl! Don't ya ever shut yer trap? Such a chatterbox, I have never known in all mah years.
Context: VoiceResponse Red LearnToDislike1 VoiceResponse LearnToDislike1 - Played when a character becomes disliked - Livewire.

Text: I suppose ya live long enough you're bound to get better at something.
Context: VoiceResponse Red LevelUp VoiceResponse LevelUp - Leveled up or a magazine is read. Only one played if multiple character level up.

Text: Let's take a look at that.
Context: VoiceResponse Red LootFound VoiceResponse LootFound - A loot container is nearby (e.g. dead body, crate,...) 10s cooldown

Context: VoiceResponse Red LootFound VoiceResponse LootFound - A loot container is nearby (e.g. dead body, crate,...) 10s cooldown

Text: What have we here?
Context: VoiceResponse Red LootFound VoiceResponse LootFound - A loot container is nearby (e.g. dead body, crate,...) 10s cooldown

Text: With my luck 'twill be naught but a box of wee jobbies.
Context: VoiceResponse Red LootOpened VoiceResponse LootOpened - Loot container opened. Supressed by ValuableItemFound

Text: Bloody hell! How did that happen?
Context: VoiceResponse Red LowChanceShot VoiceResponse LowChanceShot - Successful attack when the CtH is less than 20%

Text: Quite a lot of bastards in these parts. Feels like home.
Context: VoiceResponse Red ManyEnemiesSelection VoiceResponse ManyEnemiesSelection - Selected when the unit sees 5+ units in line of fire

Text: Let's have at it then.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MeleeEnemiesClosing VoiceResponse MeleeEnemiesClosing - When enemy in melee range. Needs further clarification!!!

Text: Aye that was easy. Fuckin' amateurs thinkin' they know bombs.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineDisarmed VoiceResponse MineDisarmed - Mine disarmed

Text: Well at least I got to play around with bombs today.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineDisarmed VoiceResponse MineDisarmed - Mine disarmed

Text: Tryin' to fool old Red with this wire, are ya? But I disarmed bombs like this when I was a wee toddler.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineDisarmed VoiceResponse MineDisarmed - Mine disarmed

Text: Ahhh... It's been jerried! I could take it apart.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineFound VoiceResponse MineFound - A mine (or other explosive trap) was found nearby

Text: Looks like the Big Bad Wolf left Red some presents from the basket. Fucking' explodin' ones.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineFound VoiceResponse MineFound - A mine (or other explosive trap) was found nearby

Text: Well, well, well. Someone's been playin' with explosives. Hope they knew what they were doing.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineFound VoiceResponse MineFound - A mine (or other explosive trap) was found nearby

Text: Well are you gonna let me disarm that or did you bring me here for my shining personality?
Context: VoiceResponse Red MineNearbySelection VoiceResponse MineNearbySelection - Selected when there is a trap nearby

Text: Bollocks! Did fuck all that did.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MissHighChance VoiceResponse MissHighChance - When a shot with 90%+ CtH was missed

Text: Och! They nearly skelped ma bollocks! My arse is hangin' in the breeze here!

Text: Won't be going to the Olympics again with shooting like that.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MockDislike1 VoiceResponse MockDislike1 - Played on a high chance miss by Buns.

Text: Looks like ma luck's rubbing off on ya.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MockGeneral VoiceResponse MockGeneral - 20% chance to play when another merc misses a high chance shot

Text: Oh what a surprise! The chatterbox forgot to take a breath and missed.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MockLearnToDislike1 VoiceResponse MockLearnToDislike1 - Played on a high chance miss by Livewire.

Text: Down ya go, bastards! Red will get ya by the droves.

Text: That's it! Come at me in droves and this happens to you.
Context: VoiceResponse Red MultiOpponentKilled VoiceResponse MultiOpponentKilled - When 2+ enemies are killed with the same attack

Text: Out o' ammo. See there's this thing called foresight. It's supposed ta help with these kind of situations.
Context: VoiceResponse Red NoAmmo VoiceResponse NoAmmo - No more ammo in the gun and no more bullets.

Text: Are you bonkers? Now's not the time for that.
Context: VoiceResponse Red NotNow VoiceResponse NotNow - When interacting with a NPC while in combat

Text: Enemy's about! This could be our Welcoming Committee.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentFound VoiceResponse OpponentFound - Enemy spotted.

Text: Oi! Enemies over ta' way.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentFound VoiceResponse OpponentFound - Enemy spotted.

Text: Fuckin' dead as a post. Maybe even deader.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilled VoiceResponse OpponentKilled - When opponent killed (unless OponentKilledCrit or OponentKilled multi isplayed)

Text: Looks dead. Might be fakin'.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilled VoiceResponse OpponentKilled - When opponent killed (unless OponentKilledCrit or OponentKilled multi isplayed)

Text: Yer dead, ya puddock-faced numpty. Yer dead!
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilled VoiceResponse OpponentKilled - When opponent killed (unless OponentKilledCrit or OponentKilled multi isplayed)

Text: ...What? You want a fuckin' speech every time I do ma fuckin' job right?
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilled VoiceResponse OpponentKilled - When opponent killed (unless OponentKilledCrit or OponentKilled multi isplayed)

Text: Now that's a dead munter.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilled VoiceResponse OpponentKilled - When opponent killed (unless OponentKilledCrit or OponentKilled multi isplayed)

Text: The wee beastie is dead.
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilledAnimal VoiceResponse OpponentKilledAnimal - When animal is killed

Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilledHeadshot VoiceResponse OpponentKilledHeadshot - Opponent killed with a headshot

Text: Oh, you didnae see that one comin', did ye?
Context: VoiceResponse Red OpponentKilledStealth VoiceResponse OpponentKilledStealth - Played when a Stealth kill happens. Voice should be shushed (except Steroid)

Text: Grand.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Order VoiceResponse Order - When movement ordered (out of combat) Should be very short (3-5 words)

Text: Fuckin' going.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Order VoiceResponse Order - When movement ordered (out of combat) Should be very short (3-5 words)

Text: Moving me arse.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Order VoiceResponse Order - When movement ordered (out of combat) Should be very short (3-5 words)

Context: VoiceResponse Red Order VoiceResponse Order - When movement ordered (out of combat) Should be very short (3-5 words)

Context: VoiceResponse Red Order VoiceResponse Order - When movement ordered (out of combat) Should be very short (3-5 words)

Text: 'Tis getting pretty bad here. Mind you, it usually pretty bad in general but it's getting really fuckin' bad now.

Text: They got a clear shot on me. That's it! Old Red's a goner.

Text: Argh
Context: VoiceResponse Red Pain VoiceResponse Pain - Hit by an attack (if surrounded SurroundedPain is played instead). Short. These are emotes - disregard the written text.

Text: Ugh
Context: VoiceResponse Red Pain VoiceResponse Pain - Hit by an attack (if surrounded SurroundedPain is played instead). Short. These are emotes - disregard the written text.

Text: Ach, the Great Dane bites as good as she barks. God help us all.
Context: VoiceResponse Red PraisesDislike1 VoiceResponse PraisesDislike1 - Played on a successful kill by Buns.

Text: Aye, women with guns always give me the willies. Especially when they know how to use said guns.
Context: VoiceResponse Red PraisesFemale VoiceResponse PraisesFemale - Played when a female merc makes a kill (20% chance)

Text: Oh great! Now we will be subjected to even more victorious yapping. Shut yer piehole, ya chatterbox!

Text: Nice one. You ain't half Scottish by some chance, are ya?

Text: This is the end of me path. What be in the plans?

Text: Aye.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Selection VoiceResponse Selection - when selected or autoselected

Context: VoiceResponse Red Selection VoiceResponse Selection - when selected or autoselected

Text: Red here.
Context: VoiceResponse Red Selection VoiceResponse Selection - when selected or autoselected

Context: VoiceResponse Red SelectionStealth VoiceResponse SelectionStealth - when selected or autoselected

Text: I be a wisp on the bog.
Context: VoiceResponse Red SelectionStealth VoiceResponse SelectionStealth - when selected or autoselected

Text: Don't know I'm here, do ya?
Context: VoiceResponse Red SelectionStealth VoiceResponse SelectionStealth - when selected or autoselected

Text: Well, isn't that grand?! I got more holes in me than a ladies' bathroom!
Context: VoiceResponse Red SeriouslyWounded VoiceResponse SeriouslyWounded - Unit is seriously wounded (3 or more wounds). Add a pain noise at the begining.

Text: Red's got something special for ye!
Context: VoiceResponse Red SpecialThrowGrenade VoiceResponse SpecialThrowGrenade - When throwing grenade

Text: I got a special delivery for ye, tossers!
Context: VoiceResponse Red SpecialThrowGrenade VoiceResponse SpecialThrowGrenade - When throwing grenade

Text: Huh?
Context: VoiceResponse Red Startled VoiceResponse Startled - Startled by hearing a sudden noise

Context: VoiceResponse Red Startled VoiceResponse Startled - Startled by hearing a sudden noise

Text: Ach! Come out and kill me already or be damned all of ye!
Context: VoiceResponse Red SurroundedPain VoiceResponse SurroundedPain - hit by an attack when surrounded. Situation should be very dire

Text: Let's try and not get hit too much. It's not a contest of who can get the most lead in their body, ya ken.
Context: VoiceResponse Red TacticalCareful VoiceResponse TacticalCareful - The other team is making gains during the battle (inflicted 2+ wounds during their turn)

Text: That's right. Waste ammo. It's not like we need it. I'm sure we will run into the ammo tree soon.
Context: VoiceResponse Red TacticalFocus VoiceResponse TacticalFocus - The team has missed  3+ times

Text: Things can still go south. Be prepared for the worst - it usually comes.

Text: Pay attention, this is how it's done commando-style.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SelectionStealth VoiceResponse SelectionStealth - when selected or autoselected

Text: I'm pretty banged up, chief. I could use a breather.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SeriouslyWounded VoiceResponse SeriouslyWounded - Unit is seriously wounded (3 or more wounds). Add a pain noise at the begining.

Text: I'm way beyond wounded. Don't think I'm gonna make it.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SeriouslyWounded VoiceResponse SeriouslyWounded - Unit is seriously wounded (3 or more wounds). Add a pain noise at the begining.

Text: Can't keep going like this, chief. I need a medic.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SeriouslyWounded VoiceResponse SeriouslyWounded - Unit is seriously wounded (3 or more wounds). Add a pain noise at the begining.

Text: Huh?
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Startled VoiceResponse Startled - Startled by hearing a sudden noise

Text: Wha-?
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Startled VoiceResponse Startled - Startled by hearing a sudden noise

Text: I could use a little help here, chief!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SurroundedPain VoiceResponse SurroundedPain - hit by an attack when surrounded. Situation should be very dire

Text: Things are getting kinda dicey!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf SurroundedPain VoiceResponse SurroundedPain - hit by an attack when surrounded. Situation should be very dire

Text: Get behind cover! Keep low!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalCareful VoiceResponse TacticalCareful - The other team is making gains during the battle (inflicted 2+ wounds during their turn)

Text: Steady! Watch for target opportunities.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalFocus VoiceResponse TacticalFocus - The team has missed  3+ times

Text: Awoooo!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalKilling VoiceResponse TacticalKilling - The team is winning the battle  (2+ units have been downed/killed)

Text: We're down to the last unfriendly, chief.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalLastEnemy VoiceResponse TacticalLastEnemy - A single enemy remains

Text: Taking losses, chief. Might be time to bug out.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalLoss VoiceResponse TacticalLoss - The team is losing the battle (2+ units have been downed/killed)

Text: I feel a howl building up.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalPressing VoiceResponse TacticalPressing - The team is making gains during the battle (2+ wounds have been inflicted)

Text: That's right. Be patient. Let them come to us.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalReposition VoiceResponse TacticalReposition - The team has not started shooting but is repositioning during the battle

Text: Don't get nervous! We gotta finish this fight or we all end up like that.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TacticalRevenge VoiceResponse TacticalRevenge - A unit from the team has been downed/killed

Text: Grabbing some cover.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TakeCover VoiceResponse TakeCover - Played when the Take Cover action is used

Text: This is a bad place to be, chief.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf ThreatSelection VoiceResponse ThreatSelection - Selected when under Pinned Down or in the area of an incoming explosion.

Text: I'm beat. I could use some sleep.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Tired VoiceResponse Tired - when the merc becomes tired

Text: Training always pays off!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf TrainingReceived VoiceResponse TrainingReceived - Training received in SatView. Uses LevelUp if blank.

Text: Nothing to report, chief. We're moving on.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Travelling VoiceResponse Travelling - When a squad is travelling and enters new sector that is not the final destination of the travel. Played by the squad leader

Text: Awww, come to daddy, beautiful.
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf ValuableItemFound VoiceResponse ValuableItemFound - Loot container opened with a valuable item inside

Text: This gun is toast! Get me another!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf WeaponBroken VoiceResponse WeaponBroken - When the player's weapon breaks

Text: Damn misfire!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf WeaponJammed VoiceResponse WeaponJammed - When weapon has jammed

Text: Taking fire!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: Damn, that stings!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: Well, I guess they ain't using paint balls!
Context: VoiceResponse Wolf Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: Die!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AIAttack VoiceResponse AIAttack - When attacking

Text: I'll kill you all!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AIAttack VoiceResponse AIAttack - When attacking

Text: Go to hell, you pig!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AIAttack VoiceResponse AIAttack - When attacking

Text: I'll cut you to pieces!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AIAttack VoiceResponse AIAttack - When attacking

Text: (coughing)
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AIGasAreaSelection VoiceResponse AIGasAreaSelection - Unit receiving gas effect or starting round in one. Suffocating. Emote.

Text: Am I the only one here who knows how to fight?!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette AITaunt VoiceResponse AITaunt - Played during the player's turn when the player has missed with 3 attacks.

Text: Better to die fighting pigs like you than live as a slave.
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette DramaticDeath VoiceResponse DramaticDeath - On death of special enemy/NPC. Do not use for normal enemies

Text: Agh.
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Pain VoiceResponse Pain - Hit by an attack (if surrounded SurroundedPain is played instead). Short. These are emotes - disregard the written text.

Text: Ouch.
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Pain VoiceResponse Pain - Hit by an attack (if surrounded SurroundedPain is played instead). Short. These are emotes - disregard the written text.

Text: Ugh.
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Pain VoiceResponse Pain - Hit by an attack (if surrounded SurroundedPain is played instead). Short. These are emotes - disregard the written text.

Text: You won't take me alive!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: I'd rather be dead than with you!
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: I'll fight to my last breath.
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Claudette Wounded VoiceResponse Wounded - Unit is Wounded. (When the Wounded VR is played, the Pain VR should be suppressed.) Add a pain noise at the begining

Text: Now this is the last straw! I demand you fetch me an ambulance! I'll be reporting you to... your... manager...
Context: VoiceResponse civ_Karen DramaticDeath VoiceResponse DramaticDeath - On death of special enemy/NPC. Do not use for normal enemies

Handguns, like pistols and revolvers, are very accurate at point-blank range and when targeting body parts. However, they are short ranged and are not effective against Armor.

Special attack: Mobile Shot
Handguns

Shotguns are destructive at close range but can be stopped by most body armor. They cause collateral damage in a cone in the direction of the attack, diminishing at long range.

Enemies hit by Shotguns are Exposed and lose the benefits of Cover.

Shotgun attacks inflict additional effects based on ammo type.
Shotguns
Assault Rifles offer high versatility without excelling at any specific thing. They offer decent stopping power, range, and armor penetration. They are highly modifiable.
Assault Rifles

Each piece of Armor protects one or more body parts, reducing damage and preventing Crits.

Armor in poor Condition offers less damage reduction. Some types of ammo can penetrate the armor, diminishing its protection.

Explosives ignore Armor; melee attacks always penetrate Armor.
Armor

Explosives are thrown projectiles that deal area damage (higher near the epicenter). The inflicted damage is based on the Explosives skill while the throwing range is based on Strength.

Explosives deal less damage against crouching and prone enemies but will bypass armor.

Mishaps may alter the trajectory of the attack. The mishap chance can be mitigated by having high Explosives skill.
Explosives

A Molotov cocktail creates a fiery area and inflicts Burning. Mishap - chance to deviate based on Explosives skill and item condition Throwing range depends on Strength Doesn't work in water Flames are difficult to traverse Flames lower the Energy of nearby characters
Molotov cocktail

Gas grenades impede ranged attacks and can inflict various negative effects.

<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Mishap - chance to deviate based on Explosives skill and item condition
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Throwing range depends on Strength
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Doesn't work in water
Gas Grenade

Explosive weapons offer unprecedented damage and anti-armor capabilities, but are limited by their ammo scarcity and tendency to blast friend and foe alike.

<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Mishap - chance to deviate based on Explosives skill.
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Area attack
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Bypasses armor
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Reduced damage vs crouching and prone enemies
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Highly destructive vs. objects
Grenade Launcher

Heavy Weapons deal area damage (higher near the epicenter). The inflicted damage is based on the Explosives skill.

Heavy Weapons deal less damage against crouching and prone enemies but will bypass armor.

Mishaps may alter the trajectory of the attack. The mishap chance can be mitigated by having high Explosives skill.
Heavy Weapons

Machine Guns shoot many bullets but each individual shot is not very accurate.

Machine Guns can be Set up to focus their threat over an area. Set and stationary Machine Guns can execute a limited number of out-of-turn interrupt attacks against enemies moving in the target area. The number of interrupt attacks is based on remaining AP.
Machine Guns

Melee weapons are deadly and silent. Their damage scales with Strength. Melee weapons penetrate Armor and will greatly benefit from Aiming.

Enemies hit by Melee Weapons are exposed and lose the benefits of Cover.

Melee weapons inflict additional effects when attacking the Neck body part.
Melee Weapons

Explosive weapons offer unprecedented damage and anti-armor capabilities, but are limited by their ammo scarcity and tendency to blast friend and foe alike.

<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Mishap - chance to deviate based on Explosives skill.
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Area attack
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Bypasses armor
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Highly destructive vs. objects
Missile Launcher

Mortars do not require line of sight. Projectiles have a delayed hit and scatter in an area around the target.

<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Mishap - chance to deviate based on Explosives skill.
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Area attack
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Bypasses armor
<bullet_tab><bullet_point> Highly destructive vs. objects
Mortar

SMGs are very accurate at point-blank range and can fire a hail of bullets. They are medium ranged and are not effective against Armor.

Special attack: Run & Gun
Submachine Guns

Rifles have good penetration against Armor and are very accurate when targeting Body Parts. They offer long range but very low rate of fire.

Special attack: Pin Down
Rifles

Thrown Projectiles, like glowsticks, smoke grenades, and Molotov cocktails, are various hand-propelled missiles. The throwing distance depends on the Strength skill.

Mishaps may alter the trajectory of the attack. The mishap chance can be mitigated by having high Explosives skill.

Health
Represents both the physical well-being of a merc and the amount of damage they can take before becoming downed.
Measures how well a merc reacts physically to a new situation. Affects the total amount of AP, free movement at start of turn, and how stealthy the merc is.
Agility
Dexterity
Measures a merc's ability to perform delicate or precise movements correctly. Affects bonus from aiming and Stealth Kill chance.
Strength
Represents muscle and brawn. It's particularly important in Melee combat, affects throwing range and the size of the personal inventory of the character.
Wisdom
Affects a merc's ability to learn from experience and training. Affects wilderness survival and the chance to notice hidden items and enemies.
Measures charm, respect and presence. Affects the rate for training militia and other mercs. Affects the chance for getting positive and negative Morale events.
Leadership
Reflects a merc's ability to shoot accurately at any given target with a firearm.
Marksmanship
Mechanical

Rates a merc's ability to repair damaged, worn-out or broken items and equipment. Important for lockpicking, machine handling and hacking electronic devices. Used for detecting and disarming non-explosive traps.
Explosives
Determines a merc's ability to use grenades and other explosives and affects damage and mishap chance when using thrown items. Used for detecting and disarming explosive traps.
Represents a merc's medical knowledge and ability to heal the wounded.
Medical

Diary

"Things have been tough since Josephine died. I came to Landsbach because I heard you could make decent money here.Work in the mine is tougher than I thought it would be, so I joined this Night Club to blow off steam. And let me tell you something - after just one week of fighting in the ring, I made as much as I make from two months of digging in the damned mines.Everybody respects me now, since I am big, have good reflexes, and win fights easily. They even started calling me The Bonecrusher! Yesterday, Bounce told me that Siegfried was interested in me and wants me to join his elite bodyguards. I guess I'm promoted now."
Wilcox's Diary

"I've been studying Wanda and her strange cult. They practice a form of Voodoo in the worship of something called The Old Ones. I've talked to them, attended their meetings, eaten their food, drank their ceremonial beverage, and studied their primitive language. I've seen other cults in my life, but this one tests the limits of my sanity!I wasn't surprised by their ritualistic slaughter of chickens nor by any of their many other pagan rites, but what did alarm me (nay - shook me to my very core) was the fact that I soon began to hear the call in my dreams. The call of... The Old Ones.Wanda has told me that those who do not listen will surely die. And then it started. People are dying! She plans to put special herbs in the water supply, so that everyone may hear the call of The Old Ones."
Letter For Xavier

"Dearest Xavier, I don't feel safe here anymore. They suspect I know too much. With all my findings, my notes, and even the feverish poetry and prose I was moved to write as I listened to the discordant chanting that seems to resound through my mind day and night - all this is preserved in my diary.In case something happens to me, please take it and make sure to expose them to the authorities of this country. I don't trust anyone but you, so I hid the diary and left you several clues around the village which will help you find it. Look for them in the places where we talked and laughed in happier times.Love,Roger Wilcox"
Torn page

"I've been a fool... How did I not see it? There is no curse! There's only that greedy monster Doc Robert. I followed him last night. He met with some rather rough-looking fellows in a secret camp not far from here. I hid and listened to them talk.The Doctor plans to infect some villagers with a strange disease and scare the rest into submission, at which point the thugs will march in and easily take over the whole village to use as a base for their smuggling operation!I must have uttered a gasp of surprise, for they paused and shouted into the dark. I ran all the way back to my cabin. Even as I write this, my breath catches in my throat at the memory of the terror I felt.I need to hide my diary and make certain Xavier can find it if the worst should befall me!"
12-gauge Breacher

FAUDA

For several years, Kevi and her brother Zoran were legendary fighters for the Peshmerga. After an ambush by Iraqi Nationalists left Zoran dead and Kevi traumatized, she was forcibly retired from active duty. Not ready to give up the fight, she joined A.I.M. and resolved to earn enough money that she could one day raise her own personal army and return to her homeland to avenge her brother. In combat, Kevi earned the name "Fauda" because she alternates between being recklessly aggressive and overly cautious. What never wavers, however, is her stunning ability with big guns and thrown explosives, both of which she wields with deadly effectiveness.
Peshmerga Deadly Dervish

Enough woolgathering. Get your head in the game.
Excellent! I've been looking for some fun.

It's always better the next time around, right? Right!

Grunty

A mercenary rapidly approaching his prime, Grunty has become one of A.I.M.'s most popular members. A solid soldier at a reasonable price, Helmut's congeniality and positive attitude make him a joy to work with. A versatile merc that is also skilled with heavy weapons, there are few tactical situations for which he is unprepared.

Although offered a position as senior military advisor to the restored monarchy in Arulco, the badly limping Tarballs reportedly turned down the offer because he wasn't 'a dang paper pusher'. After spending a couple of weeks helping to train a few squads of Arulco's new army in the use of heavy weapons, he grumbled something about finding himself a new leg and disappeared into the hinterland. As of this moment, he is still on A.I.M.'s active duty roster, but he hasn't checked his voicemail in months.

The daughter of Ukrainian coal miners, Kalyna learned from her grandmother how to hunt game in the wild countryside and repair the machines and motors that helped heat and power the tiny town where they lived. As soon as she was old enough, Kalyna left home to seek a better life for herself. With a natural aptitude for learning and excellent skills in both repair and marksmanship, A.I.M. welcomes her to its ranks with open arms.

Recruited out of high school directly into the military, Len has seen combat for most of his adult life. After being honorably discharged from the Green Berets, Len became a soldier of fortune and was one of A.I.M.'s first members. With elite skills in every aspect of soldiering and years of battling warlords and rescuing kidnapped businessmen, Len has earned a reputation as a revered leader and mentor to mercenaries and feared adversary to third world dictators the world over.
The Soldier's Soldier

An excellent outcome. Now, let's get back to the task at hand.

Livewire
LIVEWIRE

Born to Pakistani refugees in Indian-controlled Kashmir territory, Leili had a rough childhood. Although a gifted child - she was given a full scholarship to the University of Delhi - Leili always seemed to find herself running with the wrong crowd. In addition to writing papers, she was picking locks. By day she would learn to code and by night she would hack into secure databases. Ambidextrous by nature, she always had more than one thing going at a time. Eventually, someone took notice of her nefarious activities and Leili fled university in a hurry. She won't say exactly what went wrong and A.I.M. respects the privacy of its members.
Utterly Blameless and Completely Fabulous

fantabulousdiva

Congrats, Magic! Earl combines Olympic-level physical conditioning, stealth, alertness, and adeptness with a lockpick to be the foremost infiltrator among A.I.M.'s members. Take all that and combine it with exceptional marksmanship and you have a merc at the top of his game.

As fierce as she is profane, Norma Jessop is a woman not to be taken lightly. Omryn
OMRYN

Born and raised among the Chukchi peoples of far eastern Russia, Omryn began mercenary life helping M.E.R.C. track smugglers through the wilds of Siberia. It gave him a taste of adventure, so he left Russia and joined the French Foreign Legion, eventually claiming France as his home. His excellent marksmanship, uncanny perception, stolid manner, and mastery of English, French, and Russian languages earned him respect as well as commendations. Never an ambitious or energetic man, Omryn grew tired of full-time service and took the first opportunity to become an A.I.M. mercenary, working where and when it suited him.
The Very Hungry Hunter

After helping to liberate Arulco, Ron and his wife Charlene decided to take some time off and went for a cruise in the Red Sea. Their ship was attacked by Somali pirates, which turned out to be very unfortunate for the pirates. Using skills from his days as a SWAT team leader, Ron quickly instructed a number of young junior assistant pursers how to fire pistols and then proceeded to repel all boarders. Rested and relaxed, he and his wife are ready for assignment.

While husband Ron and others kept Somali pirates attempting to board their cruise ship pinned down, Raven used the cover of night to systematically kill one after another using controlled bursts from a captured automatic rifle. Reaper
REAPER

A man who has accepted that death is a part of life - or at least that other people's deaths are a part of his life - Reaper is the perfect assassin. His skills at stealthy movement and lock picking make it easy for him to reach his prey and his chillingly calm demeanor makes it even easier for him to eliminate them. He rarely misses and even when he does, he has the steely determination to make sure the next shot does not. Carl just finished an assignment hunting down a few especially slippery international terrorists and is ready for a new assignment.
Harbinger of Death

Other mercs like to joke that Ernie's been blowing up bridges for Scottish Highlander regiments since The Great War, but Ernie remains one of A.I.M.'s foremost explosives experts and effective soldiers despite his age.
Although he can often be dour and sometimes excitable in a firefight, Red makes planting and removing mines look like child's play.
Don't let his old-fashioned ideas about the world fool you, in the field of high explosives he's as interested in new ideas as anyone else.
The Scottish Tornado

SCOPE

Formerly with the British SAS, nobody gets into position quicker and makes the kill shot better than Scope. She once recorded six confirmed kills in one night-raid on an enemy military base, moving so quickly between buildings in the dark that the opposition thought they were being attacked on all sides. A consummate professional, Scope is also generous with passing on to other mercs her various tips and tricks.
Guardian Mother of the Battlefield

Hello. You have my undivided attention. Shall we start?
Alas, we got disconnected. How about we carry on?
I don't suppose we could speed things up? I've biscuits in the oven.

Pardon the intrusion but my contract is coming to an end. Shall we continue to work together?
Brilliant. Now that's settled, let's carry on.

Although he hails from the British Isles, considerable time spent catching waves down under has made Scully all but indistinguishable from an Aussie. Many mercs consider him to be perhaps the best soldier in A.I.M.'s ranks, although his friendly disposition no doubt contributes to his popularity. Regardless, there is very little this man can't do and do well. He excels at knife fighting but can reliably work with firearms and explosives as well as toolboxes and med kits.

Shadow
SHADOW

Practically the American mirror image of Scope, A.I.M.'s top sharpshooter, Shadow, excels at moving swiftly across the battlefield to set up for a perfect kill shot. But where Scope is friendly and trained in urban combat, Shadow is a quiet loner who prefers to use the great outdoors as his battlefield. His skill in using stealth and camouflage to hide from his target until the time is right for a lethal strike makes him worth every penny. Kyle has recently finished a three-week training program called 'Cleft and Chasm: The Art of Declivity Impersonation' and is ready for assignment.

Yes?

SIDNEY

The unflappable Sidney Nettleson can most often be found at the nearest bridge club, taking tricks and trading quips with the city's upper crust. That is, of course, unless he is working - in which case you can find him stoically staring down a hail of bullets while coolly dispatching his foes with throwing knives, grenades or any firearm within reach. Afterwards, over tea, he'll be happy to tell you exactly how he did it: with aplomb and a stiff upper lip, naturally.
Her Majesty's Humble Servant

fancy_chap

Text: Frightfully sorry, but I only commit myself to long term contracts. Bit of a bother doing short term work. You understand.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Sidney Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: Sorry. I don't mean to be abrupt, but I was rather hoping to catch the start of butterfly season. I suppose I could put it off until next year, but would it bother you terribly if I asked for a bit of compensation?

Text: I've heard you hired Scope. Smashing! Good show! I love working with her. Such a professional. Consider me as good as hired.

Text: Excellent! Looking forward to working with you. By the way, might I suggest you hire Scope? I believe she's available. You certainly won't regret it.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Sidney Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: Sidney Nettleson. I'm afraid I am indisposed at the moment. If this is regarding future employment, please don't hesitate to contact me again when I am on-line.
Sidney Nettleson. At your service.
Hello! Very glad to be chatting with you again.
Are you still there? The little light says that you're there, but sometimes these bloody computers lie.
We are in agreement. I shall be there without any unnecessary delay.
Sorry for the bother, but I thought I should mention that my contract shall be completed in full shortly.
Jolly good! I enjoy getting those minor technicalities out of the way so I can concentrate on the matters at hand.
Alejandro "Smiley" Diaz
Smiley
SMILEY

Alejandro "Smiley" Diaz came to Grand Chien as mercenary serving some unknown small group - which got totally obliterated by the Major a few weeks before your encounter with him. An Arulco native, he is eager to join up with you, as A.I.M. is held in great regard in the new order back at his home country.
Romeo in Combat Fatigues
Smiley
Smiley
SMILEY

Alejandro "Smiley" Diaz came to Grand Chien as mercenary serving some unknown small group - which got totally obliterated by the Major a few weeks before your encounter with him. An Arulco native, he is eager to join up with you, as A.I.M. is held in great regard in the new order back at his home country.
Maj. Spike Scallion
Spike
SPIKE

Spike is revealed to be the Major, fighting against the Santiago Corporation after realizing the nature of their activities in Grand Chien. Originally being hired by them, the sequence of events that led to Spike abandoning his lengthy contract with the North Koreans and joining the Santiago Corporation are unknown.
Bobby "Steroid" Gontarski
Steroid
STEROID

From fighting fires in Warsaw to winning firefights in Arulco, Bobby Gontarski uses his considerable strength and endurance to bend every encounter to his will. His skills with tools and gadgets are a nice bonus to his fine marksmanship and indomitable spirit. Steroid confronts every challenge with dogged determination, using his impressive stamina to always make sure his persistence pays off.
The Performance-enhanced Pole
bobby@aim.com
bobby
You have Ivan on your team? Then you DON'T want ME. I don't work with people like him.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: I do not work with Communist like Igor. I sooner work with Germans.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: Many peoples die for you. I am not a person with death wish. Perhaps you can improve offer, yes?
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatHaggle Lines ChatMessage

Text: This is not ideal job, but you have Grizzly and he is good fighter and work-out partner. All right.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: I need job, so I say yes. But you must understand that I do not like Ivan Dolvich. Please keep many trees between us.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: To be forced to work with Igor Dolvich does not make me happy. Please keep him and his stinky communism away from me.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Steroid Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: Robert Gontarski is, umm, unavoidable right now. Maybe I get in touch with you, maybe not.
This is Bobby Gontarski. Do you have business?
Back from your work-out? Me, too. Let us eat protein bars and discuss business.
Why so quiet? You getting in some reps?
I thank you for, umm, giving me the business. I see you.
My contract is almost at completion. Do you want to see more of what these biceps can do?
Very good! I am excited to pummel more bad people for you.
Omega Hyena

ber Soldat

Tex R. Colburn
Tex
TEX

With scripts for Asian-themed westerns drying up like the proverbial Kyoto tumbleweed, Tex has returned to the mercenary trade. Not discouraged by this seeming reversal of fortune, the irrepressible Colburn loves showing off his ambidextrous skills and fancy pistol-twirling for his fellow mercs. 
On the battlefield, you can find him with the sun at his back, squinting a steely glare out from under his ten-gallon hat.
Cowboy of the Rising Sun
cowboydirector@aim.com
cowboydirector
Very sad, partner. I have big scene coming up. Very hard stunt. I am working 24-hours a day. Try again another time.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Tex Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: Fox is there? She should be fighting in big movies, not little battlefields. She is so talented! I will be honored to work with her again. I will change schedule for this.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Tex Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: You have reached Tex R. Colburn - professional actor, stuntman, and mercenary. I am shooting a movie right now. Big scene, lots of special effects. I will reach you later. I may even give autograph.
Arigato. This is Tex. You are gathering a posse to fight?
Let us continue discussion, partner. You were saying?
I have a lot of autographs to sign, partner. Do not make wait.
You have got yourself a deal, partner. This here cowboy is coming your way.
I have many calls for work, partner. If I continue saying no, we must make new deal.
My six-shooter is ready, partner. Let's return to Dodge city.
The Beast
The Hog Lady
The Major
Thor Kaufman
Thor
THOR

Just returned from a two-week chi-cleansing retreat in New Mexico, Thor reports that he has two things: a groovy recipe for an avocado smoothie and a thirst for adventure. Kaufman's new age lifestyle makes him a natural healer and his balance-focused conditioning allows him to move about with stealth and grace. His Zen-like demeanor makes it easy to overlook his fighting skills, but in hand-to-hand combat there are few that can match him. Thor also possesses an extremely inquisitive intellect, meaning there are few skills he can't pick up while on assignment.
Positive Thinking as a Deadly Force
positivepower@aim.com
positivepower
Unfortunately, Mercury is in retrograde right now. This bodes ill for starting new contracts. I am sorry. Let us talk again when the stars are better.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Thor Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: I'll have to say no. I need a C.O. who inspires confidence, not caution. The recent deaths in your team make me uneasy.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Thor Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: Ice apparently thinks highly enough of you to be on your team. So, I think if you're good enough for him, you're good enough for me as well.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Thor Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: I still have more to learn from Omryn. Every moment around his wisdom makes me a better man.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Thor Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: I'm looking forward to working for you. Also, Ice is the kind of man I'm proud to serve with. Why not contact him and hire him for the team?
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Thor Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: You've reached Thor, Cassandra, and Fenrus. We may be asleep or busy just now. I'll get back to you when I am able. Thank you!
Hello, I am Thor Kaufman. I am always open for new adventure. What are you proposing?
I am very glad to hear from you again. I just had a bowel cleanse and am ready to talk business!
While we wait, do you want me to do your horoscope?
I'm looking forward to working for you.
When my contract expires a short time from now, will you want to keep me on as part of the operation?
Your aura exudes positivity and confidence! I'll be glad to stay.
Watchman
Foreman
Tough Watchman
Badass Watchman

Victoria "Vicki" Waters
Vicki
VICKI

A crack shot with pistols, the ambidextrous Vicki Waters is an asset to any team. She's currently working as a mechanic for James "Skyrider" Bullock, keeping his helicopter flying while he offers aerial tours of Arulco. The rumor is their partnership isn't just financial, but Vicki has informed A.I.M. she is ready for action should a good contract come her way.
The Maven of Mechanics and Mayhem
deadly_vicki@aim.com
deadly_vicki
No thanks, man. I hear it's a boys club in your team. I will not be doing this to myself again. All them boys acting like teenagers around me.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Vicki Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: No thanks, man. There are some nasty rumors flyin' around about you. I need to make some calls before I can trust you. Call me another time.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Vicki Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: I don't trust you, man. You be having some dead mercs and that's a red flag. I am good enough to survive but you'll be payin' me extra.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Vicki Text MercChatHaggle Lines ChatMessage

Text: You need to be payin' me more as a fine for having hired a creep like Smiley. That boy needs to be taught some respect.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Vicki Text MercChatHaggle Lines ChatMessage

Text: Well, I be tellin' ya, I've had better offers, but it will be nice to work with women for a change. It's an all boys clubs these days. I guess I'm in.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Vicki Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: This is Vicki Waters. I be either on assignment or at the shop. So, leave me your vitals, and I be getting back to you as soon as I can.
Vicki Waters. Who I be speaking with?
Back again? Good.
Come on, mon, spit it out.
Good to come to an agreement with you! I'll show you how a real merc performs.
My contract be almost up, mon. Would you be wantin' to renew it?
That's right! You get a taste of Vicki Waters, you always come back for more!
Villager
Villager
Villager
Villager
Villager
Wanda
"Restless Spirit"
Lami the Witch
Wlad the Tinkerer
Peter "Wolf" Sanderson
Wolf
WOLF

After taking a short leave of absence to run a highly specialized (and highly lucrative) paintball retreat for Fortune 500 companies, Wolf grew tired of teaching fat, middle-aged men how to pretend to kill each other. Especially exhausting was the week-long minicamp "Oh-Dark-Dirty" where he attempted to instruct them in Night Operations concepts and tactics while making sure everyone was wearing safety orange. He reports he's ready and very eager to return to mercenary work. One of A.I.M.'s most well-rounded members, Sanderson is highly sought after by clients looking for a merc who is capable of doing everything and is willing to do anything. Best to hire him as soon as he's available because he surely won't be without a contract for long!
Jack Of All Trades, Master Of All
howling1@aim.com
howling1
Fox and I... We had a thing. And now she's gone and I blame you for it. So get out of my face, I won't work with you now or ever.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: I would love to work for you but my mom just got in town and then I gotta do this other thing. I got a life, you know. Maybe some other time.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatRefusal Lines ChatMessage

Text: Your record so far is far from stellar, judging by the coffins brought back. I would need a little extra if you want me.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatHaggle Lines ChatMessage

Text: New contracts, new rates. Figure I'm worth a few extra dollars now.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatHaggle Lines ChatMessage

Text: If the Fox is on your team, then you bet your ass I am too! I'm in.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatMitigation Lines ChatMessage

Text: You know, it would be good to spend some more time with Fox. How about you give her a call as well?
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: Just a thought. Now I gotta go and pack.
Context: UnitDataCompositeDef Wolf Text MercChatBranch Lines ChatMessage

Text: This is Wolf. I have a PoundShedders thing right now, but I'll notify you when I'm free.
You got the Wolf. If you've also got the cash, we can do business.
We got disconnected. Let's give this another go.
Hey! Talk to me!
I guess I'll be packing my bags then.
My time's almost up. I need to know what your contract intentions are. I've got people waiting.
Looks like you got the Big Bad Wolf all to yourself for a little longer.

BACK
This is Emma LaFontaine. Thank you for agreeing to help me find my father. I don't have much time to talk. I've been told it's no longer safe for me here, so I'm preparing to leave.
I can't believe a city that only a few months ago was filled with joy and hope is now a place of fear and suspicion, but perhaps that tells you just how important my father is to this country.
You see, Alphonse LaFontaine is much more than just the president - he is the symbol of my people's faith in a brighter future for Grand Chien. Since his abduction, that faith has been shaken.

Things like law and justice are fragile concepts here and the political enemies my father made are already calling for emergency powers to be invoked. I don't know if they are behind the kidnapping, but I am sure they are planning to take advantage of it.

The person who took my father calls himself the Major. I haven't been able to find out who he really is, but everyone knows what he wants. He has demanded the entire Adjani River Valley be given to him.
His followers, who call themselves the Legion, have already seized most of it, but he has vowed to execute my father should the government attempt to intervene.

I've wired the money you requested. Please, assemble your team and come meet me on Ernie Island at Corazon Santiago's villa. She is the Adonis representative I told you about in my email - her diamond mining operations can help with additional funding should you need it.

My car is here. I have to go.
I'll have more details for you when we meet.

[<name>]
TWO MONTHS LATER Hello! Sorry for the lapse in communication, but I've been busy putting out fires.
Your actions helped shape the changes that are happening in my country and you certainly deserve a full report.
Thanks to you, Father came back to the capital just in time to prevent the military coup.
Without Colonel Faucheux, the battalion commanders who intended to join him instead attempted to flee the country. My father made certain they did not.
My father enlisted him as a special military advisor and he worked day and night to disband, and in some cases destroy, the last remnants of the Legion.
There are many reasons I am glad that the Major is dead, but perhaps chief among them is that I wouldn't want him having any further influence on my Pierre - I mean, my people.
He has proven himself to be a noble and compassionate person. I think he always was, he just fell in with the wrong crowd. I believe I - I mean, we - helped him to change into a better man.
As for the Major, he will never again be allowed within the borders of Grand Chien. I don't want him having any further influence on my Pierre - I mean, my people.
Pierre helped restore order to the Adjani region.
My father enlisted him as a special military advisor and he worked day and night to disband, and in some cases destroy, the last remnants of the Legion.
He has proven himself to be a noble and compassionate person. I think he always was, he just fell in with the wrong crowd. I believe I - I mean, we - helped him to change into a better man.

I worry that Pierre spends too much time playing chess with the Major when he visits him in prison, but that man no longer seems to have the same hold on him he once did. I guess it is possible he has changed as well.
Although it was difficult, we finally restored order to the Adjani region.
My father proclaimed the Legion a terrorist organization and offered rewards for the death or capture of its commanders.
This resulted in many Legion commanders being turned in by their own troops, especially after they learned the Major had committed suicide in prison. The Legion officers now await their trials.
We are still having trouble restoring order to the Adjani region.
The army is making steady progress towards destroying Legion units, but it will be some time until the Major's evil influence has been completely eradicated.
Thanks to you, Father came back to the capital just in time to act against the military coup.
Unfortunately, Colonel Faucheux managed to rally many of the army's battalion commanders to his cause. The country began to descend into civil war.
Father appointed me Provisional Governor of the Adjani. It became my responsibility to safeguard the lives of the citizens of this region until the crisis passed.
Thanks to you, Colonel Faucheux is dead, but the trouble he caused has outlived him.

Without my father's influence, the government was on the verge of collapse. Only the threat of civil war was holding it together. Thankfully, without Faucheux to lead them, the battalion commanders in open rebellion were not united.
I was appointed Provisional Governor of the Adjani. It became my responsibility to safeguard the lives of the citizens of this region until the crisis passed.
That's why I accepted the help of your friend Pierre and his Ernie Rangers.
This conflict might have lasted for years - but thanks to his bravery, the renegade forces were defeated and we averted a prolonged civil war.
However, he paid the ultimate price and died a hero to his country. I wish I had known him better.
I had hoped that your friend Pierre and his Ernie Rangers would help us, but... he did not answer our requests for aid.
I heard he was busy hunting down and killing the Major. The man certainly deserved to die, but it was selfish of Pierre to pursue his vendetta while his country needed him.
As a result, the rebellious army battalions could not be isolated and the country has descended into civil war.
I was given permission to make a deal with the devil. I offered the Major the opportunity to earn an official pardon if he agreed to fight on our side. He accepted.
He fought bravely and lead our troops to many victories before dying from mortal wounds. Thanks to his sacrifice, the renegade forces were scattered and we averted a civil war.
I awarded him a posthumous pardon and waived all criminal charges against the Legion. I dislike the injustice of that, but at least there is peace.
When you killed the Major, his Legion turned him into a symbol of resistance - wearing T-Shirts and tattoos of his face, burning villages in his memory.
With the Legion rampaging, the rebellious army battalions could not be isolated and the country has descended into civil war.
And the situation in the Adjani region is a disaster.
After completing his service to you, the Major slipped out of the country unnoticed. His Legion, however, remained. They scattered into small bandit groups and resumed terrorizing the region.
With so much instability, the rebellious army battalions could not be isolated and the country has descended into civil war.
I'm certain we will emerge victorious in the end - but it will take years and many will die before that happens.
Despite my best efforts to rally support against him, Colonel Faucheux's coup has succeeded.
He managed to convince most of the battalion commanders to join him, and with Father dead, no one dared try to stop them.
They established a military junta, suspended the Constitution and introduced martial law.
But sometimes help comes unasked for, and heroism is shown when not expected. Your friend Pierre has proven to be a true hero to his country.
He was one of the very few who openly opposed the junta. During their very first military parade, he smuggled a gun past the checkpoints and assassinated Colonel Faucheux.
He paid for his defiance with his life, but his sacrifice united those who were once mortal enemies - the Adjani Militia and the remnants of the Legion.
Even now they fight against the usurpers. I help them in whatever ways I can, but I do not think this civil war will end anytime soon... or well for us.
I had hoped that your friend Pierre would lead the resistance, but he was preoccupied with his foolish vendetta against the Major.
Fractured and leaderless, the uprising was easily crushed by the junta's forces.
Soon after the coup, the junta began arresting and killing all dissidents, starting with the Legion.
To make an example, Faucheux had the Major publicly executed by a firing squad, and Legion soldiers everywhere ran for their lives.
But with the Major dead and no one else to lead them, the fractured resistance was easily crushed.
In a remarkable act of bravery, both the Adjani Militia and the remnants of the Legion chose to defy the usurpers.
But since the Major slipped out of the country unnoticed after completing his service to you, there was no one to lead them. The uprising was easily crushed.
My father's supporters were arrested and thrown in prison. I barely managed to escape. I fear I will have to live the rest of my life in exile.
Thanks to your efforts, it has been contained and the production of a vaccine has begun.
Dr. Kronenberg was awarded a posthumous Grand Chien Medallion of Merit for her sacrifice. Her peers vow to continue studying ways to combat the disease in her honor.
Thanks to your efforts, it has been at least partially contained. There is even talk of producing a vaccine, but it is still in development.
The work of Dr. Kronenberg was left unfinished and more research is needed. In the meantime, the disease continues to spread at an alarming rate.
Grand Chien has suffered not just from the fighting but also from the Red Rabies epidemic.
This horrible disease has spread all over the country and there are reports of outbreaks all over the world.
The WHO has officially labeled it a "pandemic" and is issuing confusing and often contradictory safety recommendations every other day. In the meantime, people are dying.
Of course, none of this is your fault. I blame myself for focusing entirely on my father and Grand Chien. I did not even notice there was a worldwide threat until it was too late.
Speaking of health risks, I was alarmed to discover that someone had been experimenting on my people with combat drugs!
I am glad that you stopped the production of Diesel in Landsbach. The only "super soldiers" my country ever needed were your mercs.
Speaking of health risks, I was alarmed to discover that someone had been experimenting on my people with <em>combat drugs<em>!
It seems that those reckless people in Landsbach have created some kind of biolaboratory dedicated to making super soldiers.
Of course, it was not a problem you were ever expected to solve. Still, I wish you were here. I can't think of anyone better to deal with "super soldiers" than you.
The two of them are already organizing the next Pantagruel Carnival celebrations and they plan to turn it into a world-class event!
There will be drinks, dance, fireworks, and a honor guard of female Red Maquis to keep the peace. I think you would like their uniforms! They are very... eye-catching.
One bright spot to emerge from the darkness of the Adjani hostilities is the marriage of Maman Lilliane and Mr. Chimurenga! It has made many people very happy.
The two of them announced Pantagruel to be a free city and the Maquis fiercely defend it from any armed forces who would say otherwise.
Le Lys Rouge has become a shelter for refugees and wounded.
One thing is certain - the Adjani valley will never be the same. Much has been lost.
One of the most heartbreaking examples of this is Le Lys Rouge in Pantagruel.
One night, a group of drunken Legion thugs set it on fire and it burned to the ground. I do not think the Carnival celebrations in Pantagruel will ever be the same... if they ever happen again.
...And 50% of the sum was anonymously donated to the Fund for the Restoration of Grand Chien!
Now I want to thank that "anonymous" person... or should I say "persons"? I love you all! You have hearts of gold.
You risked your lives for us, and yet you did something that no other mercenaries would do. You are so much more than mercs!
The seller was someone named Biff Apscott and he apparently spent all the money on a new boat, a luxury mansion for his mercenary agency, and a social network called "MercSpace."
I am livid! Do you know this person?! That diamond is an important part of my people's history. It belongs in a Grand Chien museum!
But enough talking about our troubles. Have you heard about a very peculiar green diamond that was recently discovered and shown at the Museum of the Adjani?
I want to thank you once again for returning it to us. The "Pride of the Adjani" is a symbol of my country and, thanks to you, it will help unite us even in our darkest times.
I love you all! You have hearts of gold.
But enough talking about our troubles. I heard that a very peculiar green diamond called "Pride of the Adjani" was auctioned for $55 million!
I am livid! That diamond is an important part of my people's history. It belongs in a Grand Chien museum!
Ah, but my attention is being called elsewhere, my friend. Let me just say one last thing. I learned that Corazon Santiago faced trial and you destroyed her in court!
My heart swelled when I saw that she was found guilty of war crimes, and that Adonis now faces law suits and falling stock prices.
I can only imagine what a blow to your reputation it would have been for you had you not won the case.
I'm sure that now you will have many new contracts - which means more opportunities to do good in your own unique way. Best wishes to you. Au revoir.
Ah, but my attention is being called elsewhere, my friend. Let me just say one last thing. I learned that Corazon Santiago faced trial and was exposed in court.
Simply exposing her for embezzlement and sedition is not good enough! She deserves to rot in prison for her involvement in the war crimes she pinned on you!
I can only imagine what a blow to your reputation that is for you.
I'm sure that the truth will eventually be revealed. I'll do what I can to help. Until then, you have my best wishes. Au revoir.
Ah, but my attention is being called elsewhere, my friend. Let me just say one last thing. I learned that Corazon Santiago faced trial but there wasn't enough evidence to expose her.
She deserves to rot in prison for her involvement in the war crimes she pinned on you!
I can only imagine what a blow to your reputation that is for you. I'm sure that the truth will eventually be revealed.
I'll do what I can to help. Until then, you have my best wishes. Au revoir.

WELCOME TO THE A.I.M. RECRUITMENT WEBSITE

This is the web page for the Association of International Mercenaries, or A.I.M. for short. Here you can browse and hire different mercs. For your starting squad it is recommended that you <style PDALandingEm>hire at least three mercs</style>, but do keep a watch on your funds. You will be able to hire mercs at any time during your mission, so do not worry if you currently lack the funds to hire the most legendary mercs.
Hit the continue button below to browse our catalogue!
Continue

It is with deep regrets that we inform you that McGillicutty's Mortuary website is out of commission. Our beloved founder and colleague, Murray "Pops" McGillicutty, has passed away, leaving us all deeply saddened. As a result, we are temporarily closing all our services to honor Pops' memory. We ask for your patience and understanding during this difficult time.

While our website may be down, Pops' legacy will live on forever in the mortuary of our hearts. We will continue to provide top-quality funeral and pre-funeral services in the near future.

Sincerely,
The staff of McGillicutty's Mortuary.

Introduction

The following test will put you in a series of hypothetical situations which may or may not be based on real information about you that could have been provided by our partners.

Please lay back and pick one answer for each of the provided questions. You are advised to answer as honestly as possible.

HeaderButtonId
Welcome to the institute for mercenary profiling (I.M.P.)

At I.M.P. we know the mercenary trade. We can offer you advice that will help you handle the pressures that a mission can put on you, and suggest custom tailored mercenaries for your team. We know you better than yourself!
What you get

I.M.P. analyzes you scientifically. We look at your personality, your physical abilities and your skills, and we give an exact measure of who you are and what you can do.
Right now we have 1 slot for a Personality Evaluation Test (P.E.T.) which can be taken by you or any person you want to field as your mercenary. No surprises! Guaranteed estimation of your abilities with scientific accuracy!
What do you need to do
You only need to fill a short survey of 10 questions: the P.E.T. The test can be taken as soon as you want, and you will get immediate results within the same hour. That's how fast our computers are!
